name: bo thuston
text: NEVER SHOWED UP OR EVEN CALLED ! Elizabeth was very friendly on the phone and gave me details about their work. But she and Josh (who she said was coming with her ) never showed up on Tuesday 5/11/21 at 9 am for their appointment. And still have not showed up or called or texted. Have not return my texts (3) or phone calls (2). The job was going to be 1-4 townhouses needing gutter repair and gutter guards My advice is to be careful relying on these two  -  they must have plenty of work. And I 'sugar-coated' this review compared to their reviews from other customers.

resp.text: Yes, we are very busy. However, we are very sorry that the appointment fell through the cracks yesterday. If you are still interested, please call or email (jandeservicesal@gmail.com). The phone number for the business, unfortunately, does not receive text messages.

name: John Gasser
text: AVOID these scoundrels. They installed gutter screens for me. The work was poor to unacceptable. It took several calls to get them to come back and remediate the job. Then I noticed one of the gutters they put up was sagging in the middle preventing the water from draining. I called Josh the owner I believe. He said to send pictures which I did and have a confirmation of receipt. When I tried to call him to confirm receipt he had blocked my number. The next day I called him from a different number he answered and said he did not get the pictures which I had confirmation of his receiving. I told him I would resend them. He told me his salesman Brandon would call me ASAP. I am still waiting for Brandon's call. There are many good honest companies doing gutter guard work. Why deal with dishonest unprofessional people like J&E. AVOID them like the Corona virus.

name: Lael Gore
text: Several issues initially...but this company followed up and completed the job to my satisfaction. I recommend and will use them again when needed.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Gutters were not installed properly,  but the owner Josh quickly corrected to my satisfaction.

name: Joseph Greer
text: Fast, great work, great price

name: Dennis Swancoat
text: Had them come out to repair gutter it still leaked so called back to have it fixed they said when I finally got a response after about a week they would be here next day haven't heard from them since and it's been another week?

name: Hamilton Duell
text: Based on my contractors recommendation I called Roof Savers. I found them professional and in line with the reasonable other 4 estimates I got.  Well under some other companies that seemed to be heavily inflated for insurance.  Roof savers came out quickly, provided a detailed estimate and explained every step of the process.  Once selected to complete the work they were on time and completed the work in one day working very efficiently.  They cleaned up during/prior to leaving and we love our new roof.  If you’re in the market for a roof replacement I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to leave us a review! We are so happy we were able to assist!

name: Brent Sexton
text: We hired Roof Savers to replace our very old shingles with a metal roof. The whole experience was great from the first call to the finished project. The guys cleaned the property and moved all of the patio furniture back where it belongs. I would highly recommend these guys!

resp.text: Thanks Brent!

name: jonathan hoover
text: I had fantastic experience with roof savers. The sales process was more of an education. At no time was I pressured. Ultimately, I felt lead to the best decision for my needs. The application process was handled in a timely and professional manner. I will definitely be a customer moving forward.

resp.text: It was such a pleasure doing business with you Mr.Hoover. We appreciate your time and are glad you have a better understanding of our product now.

name: Pam Bailey
text: Excellent in every aspect!  The crew worked like a well-oiled machine.  Communication with Kenny and Macey was excellent.  The crew foreman was informative.  Our 2200 square foot roof and clean up was completed a little over in two days.  A well deserved 5 star rating!  Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs.Bailey we appreciate your kind words and your review! We wish you and Mr.Bailey the best of luck moving forward with y’alls house adventure.

name: Cleo Holder
text: Kenny was very responsive and easy to work with. His crew was professional and timely. I would recommend them highly!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and taking the time to leave us a review!!

name: David hutzell
text: I highly recommend Roof Savers for any of your roofing needs! They are very professional and provide excellent work! It was a pleasure working with them and would recommend them in the future!

resp.text: Thanks David it was a pleasure doing business with you!

name: Pete Adams
text: Would use for future work. Very professional and reliable. They do quality work and at a fair price. Unlike others they will call you back and communicate throughout the process. I would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Pete! Give us a call at anytime and we will be happy to help if you ever need anything.

name: Mallie Johnson
text: Wonderful service! I called at 8am to get a quote, and Kenny and his team were out to my house and had my roof repaired by 11am. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Always happy to help!

name: Mallie Johnson
text: Wonderful service! I called at 8am to get a quote, and Kenny and his team were out to my house and had my roof repaired by 11am. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Always happy to help!

text: Kenny was very responsive and easy to work with. His crew was professional and timely. I would recommend them highly!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and taking the time to leave us a review!!

text: Very easy to deal with, they were punctual and did exactly what they said they would. Their quote was also the lowest of the other quotes I got and they were the only ones that did not try to up-sell us. Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you Tracy! We appreciate the kind words and I am glad you were happy with the services we performed.

name: Pete Adams

text: They showed up and got the job done!  I would definitely recommend using Roof Savers to everyone!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs.Caban! We are glad you are happy with your service!

name: William Burgett
text: Kenny was very professional and on time...did an excellent job at great price!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your business

name: Larry Cook
text: Good folks to deal with, they were on time, honest,  it was a pleasure to deal with them.

resp.text: Thank you Mr.Cook. We appreciate your kind words and your business!

name: Delores Parks
text: Great customer service and very knowledgeable about the product!

resp.text: Mrs.Parks, thank you for letting us come out and explain this product to you. We are happy you are a satisfied customer!

name: Travis Townsend
text: Very Professional and helpful

resp.text: Thanks Mr.Townsend!

text: It was so good I didn't even have to go.

text: Excellent job looking for these services I recommend them

text: God Job

name: David Marler
text: this place is great enough just on pricing .but its so great to go to a place and they show there belief in the lord by there actions and the way they treat others. my metal for my house was so unreliable cheap but they treated me like I was a very important customer .I was amazed. and will never shop anywhere else or recommend

name: Sonya Buchanan
text: Undecided on what color metal I wanted for my new roof, Zack offered to mail me a samples to help me decide. Fast shipping and great customer service helping me decide and pay over the phone. I appreciate the kindness and respectful tone he presented to a undecided first time homeowner. Thank you Zack!

name: Debora McCutcheon
text: Do not do business with the guys!!! They take your money and don’t finish the job!!! We’ve been waiting over a year now. And they will not respond to phone calls.  Terrible customer service!!

resp.text: Deborah, My name is Zac Smith and I am the owner of Agcor. Please call me at the office on Monday. I have never heard of you before but I will be glad to see what the issue is. My personal email address is zsmith@agcorsteel.com. I am sure I can get to the bottom of it in a few minutes.

name: Innovative Fence Solutions Cullman, AL
text: Great place to deal with. Best prices around and good customer service.

name: Tim Chambers
text: Great working environment and great benefits.

name: Robert allan
text: It’s sad to see an Company that shows favoritism as well as neglect To OSHA rules as well they Have machines that Leak oil no lights on them no safety guards an well say your the on safe one here

name: Evan Brock
text: Great place to do business. Owners are great people and they'll get you what you need.

name: Kevin Gaskin
text: Great group of people, easy going to get unloaded

name: shawn hudson
text: First time customer, shorted one sheet called and told them I would be there the next day to pick up.  Was told it would be ready by Zack, the owner.  Got there the next day and material was not ready, waited 30 minutes to get it cut.  Climb up on the roof to finish my job only to find the sheet is 3 inches too long.  Not the best experience.   The quality of the metal was good, service, Not so much.

name: James Glimpse
text: outstanding products. Agcor Steel produces top grade steel buildings. We are working to build a shop with living quarters. A dream come true.

name: Dean Mangum
text: They built a pole barn for me. They did everything they said they would...and more. Good folks to deal with.

name: Vinemont Welding
text: Great people and great pricing

name: Dike Moss
text: Best place in Cullman to get metal roofing and complete pole barn kits.   Price and quality are tops here.

name: Jennifer Workman
text:
Their a great company to work for or even if u need a roof done. Or any kind of construction work. They do it all..
Love it

name: Charles Gaston (chuck)
text: Professional roofers  great copper metal works best in town

name: Sharon Stevens
text: This company is an absolute joke. Two weeks to get estimate, the person answering the phone is totally clueless and unprofessional.

name: Myra Edwards
text: I do not recommend this company. I paid for a leak to be repaired, the same problem still exist they came back out saying they cant find the leak and asking for additional money. Chelsi Cleckler  review is a fraud she is the wife of the owner comany.I know this because I had to sue to get my money back and I won the case. Do not use this company unless you have money to donate, because they will not get the job done.

name: BILL J
text: horrible company Justin is nothing more than a scammer, roof leaked several times,, never would return calls,, now moved out of town

name: Morgan Ogilvie
text: David, Blake and their team are absolutely fantastic. They did a great job installing our new roof in a very timely manner. They were very easy to work with and provided top notch service throughout the entire process. Could not more highly recommend.

resp.text:
Morgan,
Thank you for the nice review. It was a pleasure getting to know you and your wife, and helping you with your roofing needs. Congratulations on that new and beautiful house.
DG.

name: Gloria McGee
text: I contacted David at DynoDry Roofing and Construction for an estimate on a full roof replacement. He came to my home and assessed my roof and provided an estimate with an affordable and reasonable price.  He provided the date and time the crew would come out to begin the work and had the materials delivered to my home the day before the start date. The crew arrived promptly at the time he advised and the roof work was completed on the same day. The new roof and the clean up performed after completion of the job were immaculate.  David is friendly, straightforward, extremely knowledgeable, and very professional. I would highly recommend that anyone in need of roof work contact David at DynoDry Roofing and Construction to have the work needed assessed and completed in a timely, efficient, and professional manner at a fair and reasonable cost.

resp.text:
Ms. McGee,
Thank you for the feedback and review.
It was a pleasure working with you to replace your roof. The style and color you chose look great on your house.
We at DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services look forward to working with you on your future home improvement projects.

name: Julia Bruce
text: David and crew did a great job and the roof looks great.  Very easy to work with.  Would definitely work with them again!

resp.text:
Julia,
Thank you for the kind review.
We look forward to working with you in the future on your next home improvement project.
Congratulations on your new home.

name: Lynn Crawford
text: I had an unexpected leak during a rainstorm.  David was very responsive and was able to get to my house the next day and make sure that everything was covered and waterproof.  After the work was completed, he came back several times to make sure everything was done perfectly and to ease my anxiety about water.  I highly recommend them for any of their services.

resp.text:
Dr. Crawford,
Thank you for the kind words and the 5 star review. It was nice meeting and working with you on your house to resolve your water intrusion issues.
The new roof, gutters and soffit renovations look great on your home. Nice job on your color choices!

name: Savanna Marion
text: Wonderful team! We love our new roof and the value it brings to our home. Very professional and easy to work with!

resp.text:
Savanna,
Thank you for the kind words, the 5 star review and trusting DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services to replace your roof.

name: Judith Carter
text: Outstanding service and workmanship.  Accurate estimate, on time delivery, maintained a clean and safe work place.  Professional roofing at its best.

resp.text:
Ms. Carter,
Thank you for the kind review. We at DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services appreciate your business. It was a pleasure working with and getting to know you and Mr. Carter.
God Bless you both!

name: Allan Casteel
text: The workers at Dynodry were very professional. They were excellent at keeping the site clean while they performed the work. I would use them again for sure.

resp.text:
Mr. Casteel,
Thank you for the nice review. Your project was certainly unique in that we had to get it done despite COVID restrictions and the delays it caused in getting some of the non-stocked materials. Our goal at DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services is always 100% customer satisfaction, regardless of the project challenges.
Thanks again and congratulations on selling your house.

name: Courtney Waldron
text: Happy to recommend David and his crew. They did a major project on our home and it turned out beautifully. He communicated with us throughout the project and his guys were always on time...every day! We so appreciate that. They also made sure our pool and lawn were protected throughout the project. Very happy with their work!

name: Lee Moradi
text: I highly recommend DynoDry for roofing and gutter work!  David Grill is very honest and takes time to answer questions.  He was very helpful to us and had several roofing samples for us to pick from.  His workers were kind and professional and put up our roof quickly with no mess.  There has been a lot of rain since the new roof was put on the house and we have seen no problems.  Our roof looks great and we couldn't be happier!

name: Janat Sapp
text: We highly recommend DynoDry for roofing!  David Grill is very thorough and answered all of our questions.  He was very helpful to us and had several samples attached to our roof so that we could pick out the color that looks the best.  His workers were kind and professional and put up our roof quickly with no mess.  Our roof looks great and we couldn't be happier!

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words Ms. Sapp.
That GAF Timberline HD shingle, in the Weathered Wood color you chose, looks great on your house.
You guys were a pleasure to work with on this project.

name: Janet Fred
text: It is really hard to explain how more than pleased we were to meet and use the services of DynoDry. David, the owner, came and met my 90 year old Mother and discussed the process of reroofing her house after storm damage. There was damage from leaks and he had his subcontractors come out and explain the process and give us a price. They were so kind and hard working and totally trustworthy. We have owned many homes over the years and have never had such a good feeling when a project was complete, truly thankful to have had such an honorable man and a wonderful company to do the work we needed at a very fair price. We would recommend them highly, and have already done so.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ms. Fred. It was a pleasure meeting your family and working with all of you to make all the necessary roof and interior water damage repairs at your home.

name: Brian Screws
text: Very happy with the work by the guys at DynoDry. I worked 1-on-1 with David (the owner) through the entire process of replacing my roof and repairing some water damage inside and outside of my home. David is extremely knowledgeable about his trade and answered any possible question that I could throw at him. Highly recommended.

resp.text:
Brian,
Thank you for the kind words and compliments. It is always our goal to do excellent work and communication with our customers is key throughout the project.

name: Karen Reeves
text: DynoDry provided mold removal in our master bath. We had black mold and could not complete our remodel until the mold and drying was completed. DynoDry did a great job in meeting our needs. They were prompt and extremely professional. I would recommend DynoDry to anyone needing their services.

name: Sarah Howard
text: David was very helpful as we navigated the insurance claim process and his team was fast and efficient with replacing our roof. We are very happy with the end result.

resp.text:
Sarah,
Thank you for the compliments.
It was great working with you and your lovely family.
Also, it's always a pleasure to help with active military families. Again, thank you and your husband for his service to our country.

name: David Harcourt
text:
Not quiet finished as yet , but if last 5% is as good as the first, I will be well satisfied.
On time, quality work ,and on budget.
The owner , David, suggested an upgraded shingle that we like very well. Worth the extra cost.

name: David Whitehurst
text: David and DynoDry responded immediately when we had a high pressure water line break at my office. They jumped right on getting the water out and then dried everything over just a few days. This helped avoid the moisture turning to mold inside the walls and ceiling. They also handled the repairs very professionally after getting us dried out. I highly recommend them.

name: Mike Whitaker
text: We were very pleased with the competitive pricing and professional work. We have received many compliments on our new roof. The new ridge vents should also result in lower energy cost.

name: Henry Raymond
text: They did a great job. Keep the site clean and keep us informed as progress was made.

resp.text:
Henry,
Thank you for feedback on the re-roof project we did at The First Presbyterian Church of Alabaster.  It was a pleasure working with everyone there on the building committee to get this project completed.  Also, we were grateful to be chosen to do the work on such an iconic, landmark Alabaster church.

name: Brianne Beane
text: Tony and all of his help at Impact Roofing were GREAT! Tony guided us through the steps of replacing our roof to every single detail. These guys are so professional and listen to all of your concerns. I hope to not have to use them again for another 20 years but if I happen to, these guys will be my first choice!

resp.text: Thank you so much Brianne! 🧡

name: Darryl Kegg
text: Impact did a fantastic job installing our new roof.  They were prompt, FAST and cleaned up every bit of mess after they were done.  If we hadn't been home, we wouldn't have even known they were there it was so clean and well maintained.  Tony Turner did a great job explaining the process, costs and helping us pick the right color shingle to complement our home.  He made 3 trips to the house just to meet with us and answer questions before we even decided on Impact.   Most definitely recommend Tony Turner and Impact Roofing.   5 star service!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Darryl!

name: brad Inc
text: We're very pleased to work with Impact Roofing. They are always professional, punctual, and perform excellent work. This is the company to go to if you need roof repairs or a replacement.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!!

name: Matt Taylor
text: Thank you for the great job you did on the roof of our back storage building. Matched the shingles perfectly with the house and garage! Absolutely no mess. I can’t even tell they were at our house with the exception of no holes in the roof. :) Jordan and Troy made the process so easy. Highly recommend giving them a chance at earning your business!

resp.text: Thank YOU Matt! Not only for placing your trust in IMPACT, but also for taking the time to share your experience with others. We truly appreciate it!

name: Desirae Austin
text: Having dealt with other roofing companies in the past, this was by far the most pleasant experience we have ever had. Impact Roofing was very professional and very knowledgeable about their products. They were very upfront and honest; no hidden agendas and so easy to talk to. The entire process was so seemless. I wish being an adult was this easy all the time! The new roof looks amazing, the crew left our yard and driveway cleaner than it was before they began, and they finished in one day! I highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thank you so much Desirae! We strive to make the process simple and even enjoyable, and truly appreciate you sharing the experience of your Dynasty shingle roof replacement in Guntersville, AL.

name: Jolene Bethke
text: Fast install. Friendly.  After, I reported a problem.

resp.text: Thank you so much! You truly have a BEAUTIFUL home! 🧡

name: DGS DGS
text: Our new roof installed by IMPACT ROOFING answered ALL our needs. Jordan and his team took the time to explain in details every step of the process. 100% integrity. They did a 130 mph wind resistant install with designer shingles. They respected our property, and cleaned as they worked. They filled all our requirements. 100% Integrity, Knowledge and Service. I will definitely refer friends and family to Impact Roofing. I felt my roof was cared for, not just worked on. A business that strives to be part of a community.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and for allowing us the opportunity to help you. It was a fun and challenging project with the bonus of a fantastic view over scenic Gurley, AL. We enjoyed meeting you both and are so glad you are happy with your new IKO Royal Estate roofing system in beautiful Taupe Slate!

name: Roy Fosnight
text: Troy Bivens and crew are top notch professionals!  Did a great job, punctual, great clean up and fantastic customer service and follow through!  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Roy! We appreciate the kind words!

name: Ashley Turner
text: Impacting Roofing did a great job on our repair! They were thorough and patiently explained everything they did to correct the issue. They meticulous cleaned everything after they were done, and there was no evidence left that they had been there. Highly recommend!

resp.text: We are glad we could help, Ashley! We thank you trusting us with this repair project and appreciate you sharing your experience.

name: Mary Sandlin
text: Tony was a great person to work with. A great supervisor and his people was very good at what they did and very professional.I would recommend them to anybody.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Mary! We love Tony, and we're glad you got the chance to see why!

name: Caleb Lawler
text: Jordan and his crew do an amazing job and truly care about what's best for the homeowner.

resp.text: Thank you Caleb! Service is one of our Core Values at IMPACT Roofing. It's just part of who we are. Thanks again for sharing your experience with our community!

name: Jim Lovell
text: If you're looking for someone responsive, hard working and trustworthy then give Jordan at Impact Roofing a call!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jim! Your support means a lot to us!

name: Will Lovell
text: This is a hardworking team that get’s the job done right and on time.

resp.text: Thank you Will! We are truly grateful for your support!

name: Edward Wissel
text: Hard workers and excellent clean up.

resp.text: Thank you so much Edward!

name: Don Crow
text: I can't imagine a more professional experience coupled with excellent and fast work! We had multiple companies look at our roof, but none of them were as thorough and responsive, especially dealing with our insurance company. When it came time for the actual work, the crew was on-site ready to go early and stayed late to finish ahead of another storm. I can't recommend Dunning Roofing enough!

resp.text:
Don, many thanks for the accolades!
As you know we work hard to make sure everything is perfect !
Thank you again!

name: bill hesseltine
text:
I called for a leak.  They came out quickly, but I asked for them to look and let me know what needed to be done and how much.  He went on the roof came down and said I'm done. Then he handed a bill for $540.00 for 30 to 45 minutes of time and caulking. First they should have talked before doing the work.  Second 540 for that little of work is insane.

They did give us a $200.00 refund and apologize for not discussing the price prior to doing the work.  We are good.  They are good to do business with.

resp.text:
Bill
Thank you for reaching out. Thank you for recognizing our fast arrival as we always make an exception for anyone who has an active leak and will arrive on site within 48 hours especially with the amount of rain this summer. Leaks can cause thousands of dollars of damage.
Prices are determined by scope of work, steepness of roof and distance to the jobs.
While you may feel that the charge is higher than expected , roofing companies are subject to some of the highest insurance due to the risks associated with this type of work. However, one policy that was not adhered to was a call to the office and explain to us what was needed so that we may discuss with customers prior to engaging work. The technician that was there is relatively new with us and did not follow protocol. Since that is not how we do things we will credit back to you $200 as our show of good faith and recognition of our shortcoming.

Your check was sent and appreciate the opportunity to help you!

name: Scott Slay
text: Contacted Dunning to assist with a roof leak around the chimney on the lake side. They were quick to respond. Unfortunately, the damage done by the leak was so extensive and having a nearly 16 year old roof we decided to replace the entire roof. They were very responsive to any questions, carefully documented (photos) the damage area and took the time and effort to make sure the replacement roof was properly flashed and sealed specifically around the chimney. A special thank you to Tiffany who was great to work with. The roof looks great.

resp.text:
Scott,
We appreciate the kind words and are very appreciative of your trust and business.
Tiffany spoke very highly of you and thank you again.
Best regards,
Andrew McGreer

name: Pat Bull
text: I had a severe roof leak, I contacted Andrew McGreer and I had a new roof within 7 days.  It would have been sooner, but they had to wait until it stopped raining.  The workmen were exceptionally polite and very professional. Their work was excellent. My house did not have a ridge vent needed for ventilation.  It does now. Dunning Development does exceptional work.  I came home from work to find a beautiful new roof and the guys did an outstanding job on cleanup, even blowing off my long concrete sidewalk.  Great job.

resp.text: You are very welcome! We enjoyed working with you!

name: Baylee Sanders
text: We were in dire need of a leak repaired on our roof. I had a previous estimate done from someone else and waited two weeks, with no word. I contacted Andrew and within two days of speaking to him, he was at my home assessing the problem. Three days later, his guys came and repaired the roof within one day. They were kind and informative. They cleaned up every trace they were even there. I highly recommend Dunning Development, Andrew is sincere and personable. It is obvious him and his crew care about their customers and the job they do.

name: David Borman
text: We were in need of a quick response to a serious leaking roof situation. Dunning Development sent people that day. Temporary fix was successful which then allowed time to plan  and schedule permanent solution. All work went very well. Communication with Dunning personnel during the project was excellent and very much appreciated.

resp.text: David , thank you very much for the business and appreciate the kind words

name: Dan Meeks
text: Dunning Development did an outstanding job on the first of our Home Improvement Projects.  The work was completed exactly as described.  The crew was prompt and professional .  I would recommend Andrew and his team for renovations and new home builds.

resp.text: It was a pleasure working with you and I look forward to your renovation project!

text: Hands down best experience EVER hiring contractor ! Never again will we call anyone else without giving these guys the opportunity to look at our needs. Lightning fast response time, outstanding quality work, super reasonable pricing...just wow, these guys are hitting it out of the park...definition of professionals

resp.text:
That's Awesome!!! George we appreciate that our customers recognize our fast service and how hard we work to deliver the highest quality and experience. I am very appreciative of you all and your business
Best regards!
Andrew McGreer

name: Scott Ridley
text: Friday the Blue Square crew showed up to install a roof. They were a quite efficient, very well organized & quite professional in their work. There were 8 & 9 guys up on the roof the whole time & they did not come down till the job was finished. The clean up was very thorough as well. The workmanship was very impressive & the transformation of the house was amazing. I went with the top of the line roof & love it! Very highly recommended. Thank you very much for a job well done.

name: Kristie Williams
text:
What an AMAZING crew!!  We had a couple of other estimates from different roofing companies and we chose to go with blue square roofing and construction because of their quality and warranty. Not only did they show up when they said they were going to, they finished our roof in A-day and a 1/2. They would have finished it sooner had it not started sleeting.  The cleanup afterward was nothing like I have ever seen before!!They raked our yard with a magnet. They also picked up every piece of shingle.  Jeremiah is probably one of the most honest hard working businessmen I have ever met in my life.

We had to have a 20yr old shingle roof removed and a new roof Istalled.

These guys were friendly, timely and professional.

While the roof was being installed if there were any questions regarding what I wanted, the project manager was ON SITE and made sure to come to me immediately.

They went above and beyond with customer service.If I ever need a roof on any other structure, this is the company that I am going to use hands down.

THANK YOU!!!

The price was only $200 more than any other estimate that I had gotten, however, for that extra $200 I also got a warranty that I could not beat anywhere else. I received new flashing instead of using the old flashing (like the other companies said they would do because it wasn't "necessary" to change flashing). BULL HOCKEY!!!

They removed old copper on my bay window and put rain/iceshield over the ENTIRE window, flashed it, rain dripped the WHOLE HOUSE (Because we don't have gutters) AND fresh shingles on the Window!!!

They installed rain and ice shield around ALL of my dormers. The original roof did not have flashing in the valleys and this company made sure to do it correctly.
They removed rotted decking and replaced it with new. What a great company.

name: Danny Patterson
text: Candy and I were  pleasantly surprised with Blue Square Roofing. Dustin, Lee, David, and Jeremiah were very honest & their work was very professional. I will tell everyone I see to call Blue Square Roofing. They were on time and did the work in a timely manner. They did and outstanding job, not only outside installing new roof shingles, gutters, but the inside as well where ceilings and walls had damages.  It feels like and looks like a new house. My wife was very pleased with their workers from the roofers, the gutter crew, and painter. I would call them today if I had problems. Thank you'll for making this so easy for us.

name: Kay Bryant
text: I highly recommend Blue Square Roofing..They are very professional as well as willing to help out in any way to fulfill your roofing needs. Thanks especially to Janson and Dustin for their help!

name: Fli Mi
text: I wait 5 wk'ng days for an estimate and all I get is a price with NO list of material. etc. The peeps that came don't know what they are doing. I verified with GAF after they left, about golden pledge requirements/ material and what GAF told me was some material I was told was theirs  is NOT,  as well as the nail pattern used would be incorrect. The price they gave me was  HIGHER for LESS GPW than what more experienced contractors coming  a long distance and who have been master elite for some years unlike this company who is a recent ME. I don't think they liked being asked if they use illegals since I will not permit them to work on my place and since E-VERIFY is mandatory in AL. They said they do E-VERIFY but why would they if they sub-contract... Guess I need to call the state and find out.

text: This was the worst experience that I had ever.  This company do not do good customer service at all. I order in February 2021 and my install date was April  8, 2021 a total of 9 windows with colonial grids. The installer came  with the windows  with no grids all plain windows  and we told the salesperson Robin 5 time we wanted  grids because we had windows install before like 2 years ago and we wanted these to match. For some unknown reason she fail to check the section with the grids on the paperwork.  And no, we did not let them install the plain windows because that's not what we order, but they got our down payment and said it will take  a couple of weeks to get grids and the windows install. It's July 2021 and we still have not got our windows installed  yet , I have called  and called and all I get is they been ordered and they should be here any day now. I call the install manger Dexter no responses, never. I will never ever use this company again. I thought this was a good reputable company.

name: Jennifer Campbell
text: So, we ordered windows 6 weeks ago for our house.  Our instillation day was last week.   We had called right after the sale to change the window color and spoke with the sales rep, who sold us the windows, as well as called the office to ensure the change had been made. We reinterred the change when we signed the paper for the 2nd measurement to ensure the color was corrected. When the installers showed up, one of our 4 windows was measured incorrectly and in addition the windows were not the right color. The installers remeasured (this is the 3rd measurement since sale) and stated someone would call us.  This was on a Thursday.... no call.  So we attempted to call on Monday and spoke with someone who stated they would put a note in and someone would call us back....... No Call.  So we called again on Wednesday......Same spill..... NO CALL!.... I have yet called again and was given the same speech and that they are unable to get any of the project managers on the phone, so they will send them a message to call back.  I find this to be a little ridiculous at this point.  The company has taken half of my money for the instillation and I have no idea if the windows are being remade or anything at this point.  I have no answers and I am not even sure if I can get a refund at this point because you can not get anyone on the phone typically.   I personally would advise anyone looking for windows at this point to check out a different company.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize for the delay you're describing. Please reach out to us directly in national customer care, so we can work with you to get this taken care of as soon as possible – 513-327-7338. Thank you.

name: Jennifer Campbell
text: So, we ordered windows 6 weeks ago for our house.  Our instillation day was last week.   We had called right after the sale to change the window color and spoke with the sales rep, who sold us the windows, as well as called the office to ensure the change had been made. We reinterred the change when we signed the paper for the 2nd measurement to ensure the color was corrected. When the installers showed up, one of our 4 windows was measured incorrectly and in addition the windows were not the right color. The installers remeasured (this is the 3rd measurement since sale) and stated someone would call us.  This was on a Thursday.... no call.  So we attempted to call on Monday and spoke with someone who stated they would put a note in and someone would call us back....... No Call.  So we called again on Wednesday......Same spill..... NO CALL!.... I have yet called again and was given the same speech and that they are unable to get any of the project managers on the phone, so they will send them a message to call back.  I find this to be a little ridiculous at this point.  The company has taken half of my money for the instillation and I have no idea if the windows are being remade or anything at this point.  I have no answers and I am not even sure if I can get a refund at this point because you can not get anyone on the phone typically.   I personally would advise anyone looking for windows at this point to check out a different company.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize for the delay you're describing. Please reach out to us directly in national customer care, so we can work with you to get this taken care of as soon as possible – 513-327-7338. Thank you.

name: Terri Del Conte
text: We had to hunt them down on our window installation that went from “8 weeks to install” to over DOUBLE that time frame (around 5 months!). Anytime you call you’re on hold for at least 20-30 mins to only get someone to pass the buck. I would go with a local family owned company. Champion windows were by far the most expensive quote we got, but we thought we were paying for quality and customer service. Not the case. Oh, and when they came to finally install we had to pay an extra $2,000 for them to complete the work. There has been no ownership or accountability on their end. They won’t do anything to remedy our situation. My husband and I have a big network and they all will know to go elsewhere.

text: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! We ordered multiple exterior doors in January. The rep measured them and then someone else came out to measure again. No return calls from the sales rep John( we were told he’s been fired), the manager Dexter (very unprofessional and unhelpful to say the least- I’d be better off talking to the incorrectly measured doors for better assistance) or the new rep Tyler (thinks a text message is appropriate over a phone call). This is the worst experience I’ve ever had with a “reputable” company that’s been in business for years. And before you reply with a “Covid excuse”, Covid doesn’t prevent you from knowing how to use a measuring tape or operate a phone and notify someone of what the heck is going on. I could’ve built the new doors myself in this time and saved myself all of this trouble.

name: Edward Griffin
text:
EDIT:
2021 Update

TL;DR We were so pleased last time, we decided to hire Champion to replace 4 doors in our home. I'm incredibly disappointed. Our order was managed poorly - the left hand doesn't seem to know what the right hand is doing - and we're still waiting 6 months later for 3 doors to be installed. From this experience, it's hard to say whether I'd recommend Champion again. I like the product a lot, but I'm very disappointed with the progress of this project.

We were so pleased with Champion before, that we decided to hire them for 4 new doors around our house. January, they came and measured the doors and told us they would be installing the end of Feb or beginning of March (can't remember exactly). They show up and one of the doors is just right, one door is the *wrong* door, and the other two were not measured or manufactured properly. Ok, mistakes happen, I get it. So they tell me they'll order new doors and get back in a month. It's a busy time or something, right? They tell me the doors won't be ready until May. May rolls around, nothing. I start calling in June and nobody knows what I'm talking about, I have to tell the representative what my problem is and she tells me she'll have to contact the local office, gives me her number, and tells me to call her the following week. I call her the following week and she doesn't answer. I call the HQ and the rep has to take all my information again because my record isn't clear to her. I call the local office, nobody answers. I call HQ again, nobody answers. I finally get a call in JULY that *one* door is ready to be installed. "One door," I ask, "we are waiting for 3 doors." The rep is confused. All he has in his records is one door. I'm contacted by another rep the same day who says she got in contact with the local office, who weren't able to tell her whether the door had even been ordered and, again, I had to remind the rep that we had ordered 2 other doors.

resp.text: Champion appreciates the feedback in order to improve our customer service. We also appreciate all the kind words and glad to see you enjoying our windows. Champion Customer Care

name: Christina Vineyard
text:
Previously, I left a really positive review. And said “Best deal in town! Mark, their sales rep, was professional and informative. Great deal on siding. Better than the other companies we have had come out. Answered all questions!”
Well, it turns out that after Mark got us to sign up for a certain price and we financed through their company, they told us actually is was $5000 more than the quote. After weeks of trying to understand, a third person came out to remeasure, who was very nice and said that Mark missed measured by 20 feet on each side of our house, but that he was going to have the rep “eat the difference”. A week later, we still could not get answers but the loan company wanted a payment because Champion already took $5000 from our loan. Mark then called back and said they would knock it down $600 bucks, but it still went up $4400. We now have had to file a dispute and complaint with the loan company against Champion. We have called every number we can to talk to someone and keep leaving messages with people at Champion with no response. They have our money, but have done no work. So here we are 6 weeks later, with a loan we don’t need, and Champion refusing to give us answers, only the sales rep who messed up the first time telling us there is nothing they can do.

resp.text: Thank you, Christina!

text: First of all I want to say that the siding done by Joe and his crew looks amazing  . I really appreciate all they did.  My issue is with the completion of the gutters. It’s approaching a month now . It has rained here quite often  with a lot more to come. I have had to pump and dig trenches around my house to try to keep the water out from my (crawl space) basement. It’s a losing battle. I chose this company over others for peace of mind and quality craftsmanship.  I did not expect this.  I am very disappointed and dissatisfied with this .  I went from happy to angry . Still no response or resolution .  I feel that they should not start another project until they complete a project . Smh

text:
I don’t know what to say about this company but beware and ask for the best installers upfront!! We had 6 windows replaced. Original installers showed up over an hour late. No call but quickly made work of removing and installing new windows. Everything was going ok at this point. After install they spay foamed around exterior of window. I had to point out a couple of places where I could still see daylight coming through which meant it wasn’t completely sealed. I was told the foam continues to expand and they were going to lunch. Came back and I pointed out same spots. They did fix it. Back on track. Metal around windows was terrible. Text their boss and showed pictures, walked outside to talk to them, just caulked it and send it. Ok, leave and I’ll complain.
Next installers come to fix metal. I would say metal looked better but not totally fixed like I was promised. Now I have a caulking mess on my hands!! I do mean mess. I wish you could post pictures. Will see how they respond. So far nothing from my contact.

text:

I wish we had handled things a little earlier in the process but you live and you learn. I can recommend Champion but as with any company, double check their work and have them address it right away.

Original edit: Service managers came out and reviewed issues with us after making a recent complaint (gave 1 star a few weeks ago). Champion has nice products but make sure you point out mistakes before the crews leave!  We feel bad for having them come out so many times to fix a few major (crooked siding on two windows, etc) and many minor (bad caulking in spots, corners not lining up nicely, etc) problems but we want to be able to be happy that Champion did our siding and windows.
After the last set of work is done I may change to higher rate.

Original post has been deleted due to all the work that’s been put in recently to make sure the job was done right!

text: Joe was very professional.

name: W. Shipman
text:
We had one of the factory representatives to come by our house to give an estimate on a sunroom. Almost immediately, he began to bad mouth the competitors - very unprofessional.  His job was to convince us why we should do business with Champion ... period. That was the FIRST MISTAKE.
We were not 100% on board with the decision to work with Champion and was told we could give our final decision by Monday (the visit was Wednesday evening). Now... with that being said, nothing was 'official'. However, the Rep took it upon himself to pull my husband's credit report WITHOUT permission. He never indicated he was requesting this information otherwise it would have been a immediate NO!  Fortunately, I caught him before he was able to pull the other two credit bureaus. He informed us that these pulls were soft pulls when in fact, they were hard pulls against his credit report. I was livid!!  This was the SECOND MISTAKE.
Lastly, I sent a CC email to AHOLSOMBACK regarding my cancellation and requested a call back to talk about the visit. I never received a call. I cannot speak on the quality of the work. However, I can speak on the service. That alone is reason to not recommend this company.

resp.text: We are very sorry for your experience with Champion.  We have sent the information over to the District Manager to have teaching experience with the Sales Department.  Thank you for reaching out and feel free to call us at 888-395-001  National Customer Care.

name: Emma Sartin
text:
Absolutely the worst experience and customer relations I have ever seen with a company. After paying and getting the measurements, it took 2 months for the windows to be installed. During this time there was 0 communication. We tried calling and left several messages with the receptionist, but no one ever returned our call. Finally, we called our sales rep and complained. Suddenly, the windows were ready to be installed.
The day of the installation, the company sent two workers who told me they would be finished by 1. The workers showed up an hour after we were told they would. After our old windows were removed, I overheard them talking about how our windows weren’t measured correctly. When I asked what was wrong, they assured me everything was fine. Later, the workers and their boss were screaming at each other over the phone about the correct way to install the windows, the result of which was another working coming to explain the correct way to install and why the windows maybe looked too small. At 4:45, I informed the workers that I had to be somewhere at 5 pm and was already going to be late. They left, and promised to return the next morning at 8 am to finish the installation. The next day my husband stayed home from his job to be there to let them in. At 9:15 they arrived and finished the installation.

The overall quality of the windows was fine, but I have never dealt with more unprofessional people in my life. We’re still waiting for our gutters to be installed (we originally measured everything the week of July 4th). Would not recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: We’re sorry for this experience with communication and installation, Emma. We take your comments seriously and will work with our staff to improve going forward. Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance to you. Thank you. -Champion Customer Care, 888-395-0041

name: Sam Monk
text: Hell will freeze over before I do business with Champion again. The saleman showed up on time and was more than happy to secure a 50% deposit. The length of time it took for the window to ne manufactured was about what was told us up front. It's been down hill since the install, which was not completed initially. Parts that need to be reinstalled are lying around in my kitchen. My "Thursday" appointment was scheduled for a Friday. It is now 3/29. The original install was 3/14. I had a 10:30 AM appointment for today and stayed home to get it handled. It is now 11:00 and I was told when I called that "the guy who was going to handle that didn't come it today." I now wait for another installer, who is apparently 50+ miles away, to "call me." It is a shame how a company with a good product can ruin its reputation my "don't give a damn" service. CHAPTER TWO: 1:00PM: Well, a nice young man showed up not knowing what needed to be done to complete the installation. I an going from frustrated to livid. Installers (not finisher) will need to return. WIll call and make appointment. The way it has gone so far it will be another 2-3 weeks - - - if then. Chapter 3 will be added as apprpriate.

resp.text: We are sorry your are having issues and would like to speak to you about those issues.  Can you please provide your contact information or you can reach us at 888-395-0041.  Thank you National Customer Care.

name: Bertha Warren
text: Very friendly, concerned and keep you informed. Great job.

resp.text: It is always a pleasure to work with customers like you! Thank you for your business and welcome to our GAF Golden Pledge roofing family.

name: Steve Kendrick
text: After some major hurricane damage, I had several large companies put me on a wait-list for months.  Then when they were able to inspect the damage, they said they couldn't help me because the damage was too big.  I called Restoration Services, not only did they order my supplies and had the delivered the next week but their team did all of the work in one day.  They even helped me deal with my insurance company on getting the most current prices for materials.  I would recommend their services and will be using them in the future.

resp.text: That's fantastic to hear! We are so glad we could be of service and we appreciate and value our customers. Let us know if you need anything in the future!

name: Norman Davis
text:
Restoration Services, formerly Davis Roofing, has earned my trust and continued business. Last year when a Hurricane blew through town, I had suffered roof damage along with many of my neighbors. Being fortunate and not actually displaced from my residence, I opted to wait a few months to solicit repair estimates while those who needed immediate help were being serviced.

When the rush had died down (or so I thought), I reached out to multiple companies for estimates. I quickly realized that getting someone out to even give me an estimate was going to be a challenge. Numerous companies offered to come out but none actually followed through. Until I found Davis Roofing! They arrived within a few days at the precise time I was promised. A detailed professional estimate was provided to me and my insurance company for a complete roof replacement.

Upon acceptance by my insurer, they asked me for my business.  At this point, they were the only company to respond. I took a chance with a single estimate, mostly because of promptness, professionalism and effective communication. I was not disappointed!

Driving through my subdivision, I have the best roof in the neighborhood! The price I was quoted was the price that I paid. An addendum was even sent to my insurance company (by them) for additional expenses to be paid to me. That was a pleasant surprise.

The efforts and communication of this group did not end when the job was over. I have been contacted multiple times over the last year with inquiries on my satisfaction. What more could I want? With this latest communication, I made mention of a single shingle that had slipped and looked crooked on the eve above my front door. The customer service representative promised to have the repair crew out to fix it. It happened the next day!

Folks, I don't do many Google reviews. It takes a lot to impress me! Suffice to say, Restoration Services has done so and has earned my business going forward. I like the fact that they have expanded their offerings to include electrical services as well. I know they will be there, if needed. They will be my only call! Thank you again for an excellent experience!

Norm Davis

resp.text: I am so appreciative of this most kind review of our company! It is such an honor that you took the time to express this sincerely generous compliment of our services and our staff. I took the time to share this with everyone in our company. It was such a boost for us all! I just can not thank you enough!

name: Glen Granberry
text:
Quick responsive roof repair.    Quality work.
Recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this review! We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Jamie Thomas
text: Doesn't get much better. Ron and Brian are great to deal with. Affordable, and easy to work with!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Harvey McCreary III
text: Owner setup a time for an inspection and didn't show.  I texted and he blew me off.

name: Melanie Williams
text: I had a positive experience prior so hired Kevin again. I tried to reach him to make things right and could not reach him via phone or text. My flooring was cut incorrectly. I have numerous spots where you can see the slab. Toilets were not correctly re-installed. House was left a total mess. Floors were filthy, grout and sand and debris left in my sinks and tubs. Trim was not replaced where it belonged. Hole was made in my bedroom wall, was repaired, not great. I felt I was taken advantage of regarding charges to remove subfloor. I questioned the high rate and was told it was because it could take days, it took hours yet I wasn’t offered any relief.

name: Alex
text: Kevin is prompt and very professional. He arrived on time and notified me in advance when he would be here and what he would be doing. He tore out my old plastic master shower and tiled in a beautiful new one for me. The only negative is my water bill is going to go up because I love my shower now.10/10 highly recommended for tile in shower work.

text: Kevin and his team recently replaced some laminate flooring in two rooms of our house with hardwoods. Kevin arrived on time and got the job done well within the expected timeline. We are very happy with how our floors turned out and will definitely be calling WCR in the future.

name: Lyn Quillin
text: Top notch, excellent company to do business with.  Answers questions, explains in detail about all the products that are going on your roof.  Friendly and knowledgable people to deal with concerning our roof.  Best thing I liked is there is an awesome demonstration given about the products, the costs, what each product does that goes on your roof and there is no pressure to decide what you want to buy.  The demonstration was thorough, very well detailed and explained and there was no doubt in my mind or my husband's mind as to what needed to go on our roof!  Sales person was friendly, had answers to all our questions, was in no hurry to rush us or push us into anything we might or might not want.  The display he presented showed us all products and their function and we could "handle" the material that went on the roof.  I especially liked the interaction and questions I had and the answers I got.  Our rep for this company was Kyle O'Toole!  Excellent in his presentation of products, all details answered.  Great experience.  Also a big thanks to Keith Burkes who was the supervisor on the job.  The workers did a hard day's labor and the roof was done in one day!  I would highly recommend this company.  Best experience ever on a roof!  We have been in good hands with this company!

resp.text: It is our mission to educate, inform and service each client .... thank you for noticing and sending those 5 stars. If you ever have a question or need our services, we are local and available for you. Thanks again, it's great customers like you who help us stay motivated.

name: Jason Hopkins
text: I called Thompson Roofing and Construction for a leaky roof for my 2018 build home, not knowing that it was a fairly minor issue.  I was actually expecting it to be a big deal given the leak made it all the way into my upstairs bedroom and seeing the decline in quality on new construction homes over the past few years. Darren did a brief inspection and informed me it was a minor issue with the sealant on my inlet/outlet vents (among other minor issues).  I was ready to pay the charge for whatever needed to be done, but Jamie showed up, fixed my issues AND cleaned my gutters (I didn’t even request that) and they just requested that I think of them next time I had a roofing need! No expense to me! That shows me these guys are committed to building a solid customer base because of the confidence in their superior quality and customer service. Outstanding! I definitely will be calling them again (although I hope I don’t have to)!

resp.text: Glad to be able to make your day and help. W are committed to being good neighbors and supporting our community here in the neighborhoods we work and live in at Thompson Roofing and Construction. Thank you for the glowing review. if you need us we are near and local.

name: Mark lapinskes
text: The experience has been very professional and timely from day one. From the initial visit by Marcus, then the immediate visits from Jamie to temporarily seal up leak issues (twice, for separate developing issues, one in the pouring rain!), through the complete re-roof by Angel and his crew, it all went seamless and smooth. They fixed all the underlying roof structural damage, flashing, and siding issues. Thompson even sent out a cleaner for my driveway to clean up after themselves. I truly believe that no other company would have been able to live up to their service. I couldn't even get professional repair quotes from two other companies, and the problems were incorrectly diagnosed by another. Since it ended up a complete re-roof, it was their loss. If I could rate Thompson 6 stars I would!

name: Gail Skinner
text: Inspector was very knowledgeable and professional. Work done was high quality. I highly recommend Thompson Roofing. You can tell they really care about their customers.

name: James Howard
text: I moved into my house five years ago; about two years ago I had a leak in my foyer.  I had a handyman come out and “fix” what we believed to be the issue.  This past September, it rained really hard with wind-blown rain, etc. and my foyer was leaking, again.  And my living room near the back of the house, too.  Frustrated, I called Thompson since they fixed a weird issue with my roof recently.  Long story/short, they charged me less than the “not-so handyman” did and fixed the front and back leaks, and replaced a few bad roof shingles with matching shingles.  It has since rained once again like the Biblical flood, and not a single leak.  Save yourself the heartache and wasted money, just hire Thompson.  They are effective and professional, what more can you ask for?

resp.text: We can only ask for more appreciative homeowners like you! Thank you for your trust in us and our custom solutions for your home. Call if you ever need us again.

Keep it up!

text: Everyone professional; very responsive to my initial inquiry and got us on the schedule sooner than expected.  Their quote was reasonable and they stood by it.  The roofers did an outstanding, quality job and cleaned up afterwards!  Highly recommend Thompson Roofing!

name: Follin Clark
text: Our roof was damaged by a large tree limb falling on it.  I got quotes from 3 roofing companies but Thompson was the only one who actually went in my attic space (which admittedly is more like a crawl space) and looked at the damage.  They were very professional, and offered us 3 roofing options and actually came to our house and explained the differences and showed us samples of the materials they would use.  They cleaned up very well afterward.  So far I have found only 1 nail.  When another smaller limb damaged a few shingles only 6 days after the roof was put on, they came back and fixed it at no charge.  I call that service!  Thank you Thompson Roofing!

resp.text: We never leave our post until properly relieved and stand by our commitment to not only provide quality local experienced workmanship but also service our customers as we would want to be serviced. Thank you for sharing your experience with others. On behalf of all of us here at Thompson Roofing and Construction, Thank you and know we are still "on duty" to service you if the need should arise. text: Outstanding and very professional job.  Extremely satisfied with finished product.  #1 in my book if needed again.
