name: Casey Hand
text: We had a great experience overall using Thompson roof! The only negatives were some damage was done in the process of getting some rotting wood replaced, not by Thompson roof but by the people they recommended. Love the outcome and can't believe how different the house looks with a better roof!

name: Justin Colar
text: We have just purchased a new home and unfortunately we have had some leaks that needed to be addressed. Thompson Roofing and Construction was put on the call to address our issues. Jamie did an excellent job in fixing our roof and was thorough in his explanations in what caused the leaks. I would recommend their services for all of your roofing needs.

name: Mark Unger
text: Great company to work with.  Great customer service!  Kyle insured the work was done to our satisfaction. We have had them do our roof along with other other projects. All results exceeded expectations. Keep up the great work.

name: Chuck Burch
text: We're relatively new to the area and the idea of replacing a roof that was probably 5 times larger than anything we had dealt with before was to say the least daunting.  So after we disposed of the "fly-by-night" guys (is there some unwritten rule that they all have to wear blue tooth head sets?) I asked around, got bids from 3 contractors and decided on Thompson - professional, price competitive, responsive - all the things I was looking for.  Immediately upon signing, I was given the nam of our  Project Manager and he held our hand guiding us throughout the lead-up and then the actual installation day.  I have never seen a crew so large yet so professional in my life and was impressed to say the least. 07h30 they were at the door and by 16h30 we had a beautiful new roof, the site was carefully "policed" for stray nails and other detritus and they were gone.  The next day Keith (our PM) came back to make sure things were done as he expected followed by our original "salesman" (that term is so inadequate) Kyle coming out the following day to walk the roof and the grounds and write up a final "punch list".  And within 24 hours we had been visited once again this time by a small set of the original crew who knocked out the punch list items in under and hour and then were gone again.  We are extremely pleased and would gladly recommend Thompson's to anyone else looking to replace a roof - large or small.  CB

name: Sandra Lyons
text: Very pleased with installation of my GAF Timberline HDZ roof by Thompson Roofing. They started as scheduled and were very professional. They cleaned up completely after the installation. Received GAF warranty afterwards as promised. I would certainly recommend to friends and family.

resp.text: It truly warms our hearts to look back at your wonderful review of our service to your family and your home. Thank you for sharing your experience with those that may be looking for a local, experienced roofing contractor and may consider our team here at Thompson Roofing and Construction. We hope this finds you and yours in the best of health and spirits and know we are here to service and stand by our workmanship if the need may ever arise. From all of us here, again, Thank You.

name: Miranda Murphy
text: I highly recommend Thompson roofing. Dustin (the owner) and Marcus (sales) have been involved in every step of the process with us. Marcus was extremely patient with us having some difficulties with our insurance company. They completed the work fast and thoroughly. We will continue using them in the future, when the need arises. I trust this company completely.

name: C
text: From the initial request for estimate to the final inspection, everyone I dealt with at Thompson Roofing was professional, respectful, great quality work and clean up, and every single person did what they said they would do, with no prompting or begging from me.  This was a great experience for me!  I would most definitely use Thompson Roofing again and recommend them with out hesitation.

name: Andrea Simpson
text: After months of trying to get help with my roof leak from various roofing contractors I was finally referred to Thompson Roofing. Several of these previous contractors would either, 1. never call back or failed to show up or 2. when they would come out I was being told over and over I needed a new roof. Thompson Roofing came when they said they would and fixed my leak in the concentrated area ONLY! I didn't need a whole new roof AND they were able to fix it in between all the rain.  They are truly a stand up company!

name: Pat Gatlin
text: Adam Lee was great to deal with. Easily explained work that was needed. The repairman was prompt and very polite. Work was completed in a timely manner and all trash was cleaned up afterward. I would definitely recommend Thompson Roofing.

name: DONALD KEY
text: I have been well pleased with the service of Thompson Roofing and Construction.  The sales representative Marcus Sanders was great to work with and the service was completed on time as scheduled.  The roofing materials were delivered as stated.  The roofing crew arrived at the time he said they would arrive.  I would highly recommend to anyone that need roofing service to contact Thompson Roofing and Construction.  You will be well pleases

name: L A
text: From start to finish it has been a displeasure working with the company. Scott and Jeremy were professional but the workmanship from this company wasn’t. I contacted them to repair vinyl and fascia as well in relation to the issues encountered from a previous company. They told me they didn’t need to remove he fascia because it was fine well a few months after the repairs the fascia now has problems after their repair was completed which appears to me that he repair needed was caused by their repair they made being cut too short. I had problems getting them to start due to internal issues that they were having with man power. After they finally came out they had to return more than once to fix what they were hired to do. I do not recommend this company at all and I do not recommend anyone use them. Their are better companies out there that will follow through and do what they say in a timely fashion and own up to any issues derived from a poor repair. Any previous decent reviews made should be disregarded. $3,924 for faulty repair. Save yourself the trouble.

name: Andrew Langefeld
text:
Thompson Roofing did a great job replacing my roof, and everyone was a pleasure to work with through the whole process. Scott Shaw explained the material and construction options available and answered all of my questions. A construction date was available shortly thereafter, less than three weeks later.

On the date of construction, the crew arrived and quickly had the roof stripped. They completed the new roof the same day with plenty of daylight to spare. They protected my yard and landscape and cleaned up everything. Scott did a follow-up inspection afterwards. The new roof looks great!

name: James Herring
text: I had roof leaks crop up on an 11 year old roof and had Thompson Roofing come out for an estimate.  The estimator checked in the attic as well as on the second story roof.  He provided pictures of damaged/suspect areas and described the proposed repairs.  I was impressed by his friendliness, knowledge, and overall approach.  The price was higher than a competitor (actually the original roof installer) but, based on a the info provided and contrasted with the plan of work proposed by the competitor, I was willing to pay the difference for peace of mind.   The one year warranty on workmanship also helped.  Unfortunately I wasn't available when the work was done, buy my wife said the repair tech set about his business and had it done in no time.  The original estimator visited after the work was finished (and after a good rain) to check for issues and quality of the job performed.  From initial proposal to final follow-up  I'd say we're quite satisfied with the work done by all.  I'd recommend Thompson for repairs or complete roof replacement.

name: Hillary Lenoir
text: Adam Lee, with Thompson Roofing, was very professional. He cake to our house and answered all of our questions and worked with us on our options to get just the perfect roof. The roofing crew delivered all materials before they started their work and when they came to work they worked until dark each night and cleaned up everything nicely after the job was completed! Adam came back after our roof was installed to make sure everything was installed properly and to make sure we were satisfied. Great company to work with for a new roof, friendly staff, and hard working roofers! They go the extra mile to make sure their customers are satisfied!

name: Kurt Knapp
text: Excellent and very professional service from estimate, determining options, upgrades, through installation and final inspection.  2 days to do 70 squares of roofing (tear off and replace).  Even corrected vent issues created by builder.  Crew was very professional and respectful of property.   They kept the area neat and did a complete cleanup before leaving.    This was my best experience with a contractor to date.  Flawless, painless, and excellent results.   The roof has never looked better.   Highly recommend.  Kyle from Thompson's Roofing is the professional to talk to if you need a new roof.

name: Kim Stiles
text: Thompson Roofing & Construction did a great job on my roof.  They answered my call within hours and was out to my house within a day.  As it is the rainy season it took several visits for them to estimate and repair the roof.  The young gentlemen came early in the morning and we visited for a few minutes to my questions, they went straight to work and were gone within a few hours.  The "Boss Man" called me the next day to make sure everything was OK and said they had found other repairs that needed taken care of which they did so everything was taken care of as we were having so much rain.  I can really recommend this company 100%  When it comes time in the future to replace my roof, this will be the company I call.  Or any repairs!!

name: Barry Britnell
text: Fantastic job by everyone on the crew. They were in constant contact with me and the job was finished quickly and professionally. I would easily want to work with them again. Give them a call!

name: Emily W. Plumlee
text: Thompson did a great job repairing our chimney. They even came back afterwards to check and verify it was water tight before a rainstorm. Always quick to respond when I reached out with a question.

name: Colin Pollard
text: I had a great experience with Thompson: they were timely, courteous, efficient, and clean.  The crew led by Pedro that put the roof on took one day to strip the old and put on the new; really fast team!  they cleaned up afterwards, too, which was excellent.  Thompson then came out, checked the work, and fixed the gutter guards that needed minor adjustment (free of charge).  For my first experience getting a new roof, I have to say I am very happy.

name: Mike Blocker
text:
Thompson coordinated the removal of a rock chimney, the removal of old felt and roofing shingle and the replacement with new on the  house and garage, replacement of all windows with Dura Pro energy efficient windows, removal of all Masonite siding from the house and garage and replacement with vinyl siding, replacement of two house doors and one garage door, and the  installation of leafless gutters.

Four  different sub contractors were involved - chimney removers, roofers, dry wall specialists, and carpentry/siding experts.  With no exception, each subcontractor was staffed with very skilled people who worked hard and efficiently from the time they arrived until quitting time.

My wife and I are extremely pleased with the final product.  We think our 40 year-old house now looks as if it were just built.  The work started the day Thompson said and the job finished on time.  The site manager was very responsive to our needs and very easy to contact and talk to.

I would definitely use Thompson Roofing and Construction again.

name: Aaron Anderson
text: Great service. Had a roof replaced back in 2013-14 and also one here in 2020. From start to finish A++ service.

name: Bama Dogman
text: Outstanding job, and I was also very satisfied with the subcontractor they used for a major portion of it.  Not being in the business, I relied on their expertise to pick the right sub, and I wasn’t disappointed.  I am always concerned about Workers Comp insurance, and Thompson covered everything in writing for me.  I had some bidders who admitted they don’t carry it.  Thompson was not the lowest bid; maybe that’s part of the reason that they did such a great job.  Also, what they estimated is exactly what I paid, no extras or surprises.  Special thanks to Jeremy and Kyle for working to meet our tight schedule.

name: Adrian Gimenez
text: Very professional and courteous overall. They responded to all my calls/emails promptly and showed up to all scheduled appointments on time. Roof was replaced within two days after start and everything was cleaned up very well afterwards. Would highly recommended as a contractor !

name: Jeff Archer
text: We had a great experience with Thompson Roofing. Adam Lee did a great job explaining our options after hail damage. Keith got right on the scheduling. Jeremy Burns was on top of the instillation process. Angel lead the team of installers. The work was professional, the clean up was thorough and the followup was courteous. We really appreciated Jeremy and Adam doing a followup inspection before we cut them a check. It's good to work with a company you can trust.

name: Therise Benford
text: I had a leak in my garage caused from the roof. Called several roofing companies, Thompson was the only place that agreed to come out that day and at least put a temporary fix because it was due to rain that night. They came back in reasonable time and permanently corrected the issue at a reasonable cost. Will definitely use their services again.

name: Michael St.Peter
text: Great experience all around. Quality work, and the customer service was outstanding.  Will use them again for any roofing needs I have.

name: Margie at the Beach
text: Beautiful roof! I interviewed five local roofing companies and Thompson was our final choice. They impressed me right from the start when the sales person came to the interview with his GoPro video of the top of my roof, zooming in on all the trouble spots their bid would cover the repair of. He did the same when the new roof was completed. Very professional. And, the actual roofers were tidy and very friendly.

name: A Todd Baker
text: Thompson Roofing and Construction was absolutely professional. We appreciate the GoPro video Kyle made while inspecting my roof to show us exactly what was wrong and the work that needed to be done. Everything was straight forward easy to understand, organized and put on paper. Communication was excellent. We highly recommend this company! This was not our first or second roofing experience but by far the very very best! OUTSTANDING WORK!!!

name: Latoya Adams
text: The employees at the company were very professional and kind.  They took the time to ensure that any concerns that I had were addressed and explained any delays in scheduling.  The only reason they've received a 4 instead of a 5 was due to some unfortunate issues with scheduling but otherwise they were a pleasure to work with.  Quality of the work performed were their main concern which I genuinely appreciated.  Great team!!

name: Mark Rocks
text: Adam Lee did a fantastic job giving me many different options along with education on the different options to choose from and I never felt pressured at all. He and the Program Manager Keith kept me informed at all times. The roofing crew did an amazing job and cleaned up after themselves. Great experience all around! Definitely have recommended Thompson to others

name: Michael Clayton
text: Workers were easy toward with.  They were professional and efficient and friendly. In the past we have never had any complaints with work done.  Very impressed with all the work done by Thompson Roofing and Construction.  Would recommend them to anyone without reservations of any kind.

name: Nancy Picogna
text: From Kyle first coming out to all the people who worked on our enormous project to Kyle coming back to wind things up, this was a top-notch experience. Their work ethic is THE BEST (hard to find these days!) and Keith was great about always staying in touch about what was happening, when they were going to be arriving to work, etc. Could not have asked for a better experience. Thanks, Thompson Roofing!

name: Dave Hargrave
text: Installers did a great job and were pleasant when I wanted to switch up the ends of the gutters.  Work was done well and looks great!

name: James Sewald
text: They gave me  a bid on a roof and gutters. They were very good, on time and did a very nice job. Would use again.

name: David Dunaway
text: They showed up exactly when they said they would and got finished when they said they would. Even did a great job of cleaning up. Very professional. Will always highly recommend Thompson Roofing.

name: D S
text: Excellent service from the time they provided the estimate to well after the re-roof. The service after installation was equally as impressive. We received  a follow up call to check on our satisfaction and inform us that the warranty paperwork had been completed with the manufacturer. All around very professional operation and a great experience!

name: Pat Kelly
text: We are very happy with the roofing work. The employees covered every possible problem on the roof.  The job was very clean. Confidence came with the  first contact where we asked for an estimate and continued to the end. Scott answered every question and kept us updated on each step in the process.

name: Melanie Winland
text: I wish there was a no star option. 2 months of trying to get my roof repaired, after multiple revisits and the leak hasn't even slowed down! Now I'm having a different company come out to do the work that should have been done in the first place. I wouldn't recommend this company to anyone.

name: Wesley Viall
text: Great company to work with. Ask for Marcus Sanders and he will not steer you wrong. Thompson roofing has been great to work with and they replaced my roof in one day.

name: Wade Pettus
text: From start to finish, my experience with Thompson Roofing & Construction was outstanding. Communication throughout the entire process was excellent and the workmanship is top notch. I've already recommended this company to several folks and if I ever have any roofing needs in the future these guys will definitely be the first ones I call.

name: Carmen Williamson
text: the gentleman Caleab that came out to check my roof was very nice and polite. He was very informational on the process of what needs to be done with my roof. I rated this review at 4 because the young man was suppose to contact me with an estimate of my roof with 24-48 hours and its been a week now and no contact.

name: Mike Alexander
text: I contacted Thompson Roofing after noticing a leak in my roof that was starting to damage the sheetrock ceiling of an upstairs bedroom.  I went outside and saw what appeared to be a couple shingles missing.  I searched for contractors and was impressed by the reviews Thompson Roofing had received.  I put in a request for contact.  Thompson Roofing was professional from start to finish!  Scott came out to inspect the area and provide the estimate.  He did a thorough inspection including providing pictures and video so I could see the issue 1st hand.  It was quite a bit more serious than a couple shingles missing.  He also patched the roof so it would not leak anymore!  He followed up with a detailed estimate spelling out exactly what they would be doing!  I accepted the estimate and a few days later two great young men - Sammy and Jamie - came out and took care of the job!  From what I could see they did an excellent job  I figured I would receive the bill and pay, and I would be happy with that.  It was much better than that.  I received a follow-up call to see if I was satisfied.  On top of that Scott called and scheduled a walkthrough.  He came out, climbed back up on the roof and took pictures of the final job and provided them to me so I could inspect the job.  Working with Thompson roofing was a great experience!

name: Amir
text: These guys are the upmost professionals!  Outstanding attitude and second to none crew... Your hard earned money will be well spent with these guys. Thank you for taking such good care of our home 🙏🏽

name: Mary Fuller
text: The staff was prompt and. professional. The job was completed  ahead of time and Adam Lee was great at explaining the process of repairing the damage and the financial side as well. I am completely satisfied with my repairs to my roof and garage.

name: Donna Russell
text: Removed  fireplace  chimney ,  repaired  the roof  to stop leaks .

resp.text: Got a great review on that work, sending a thank you back. Hoping that you are happy dry and enjoy that leak free fix for many years to come.

name: Rick Hays
text: I am very happy with the whole experience with Thompson Roofing. They were on time with all appointments and did an extremely good job with the reroof. I highly recommend them.

name: Daniel Walter
text: The best roofer in north al

resp.text: As a family-owned local business, we sure do appreciate that review more than you know. It's customers like you that help keep us driven. God Bless

name: Warren Schoenknecht
text:
Scott was very professional and friendly, he did a complete investigation of my roof problems. he explained what the problems were and what had to be done to correct them. He provided me with a complete estimate to perform the repairs. I agreed with the estimate and we scheduled a day to perform them.  The repair crew did a very neat professional repair on my roof, we have had two heavy rains since the repairs were completed and there were no leaks
GREAT JOB!

name: Denice Kirby
text: Thompson Roofing repaired our roof just in time before all the rain came.  We love working with Thompson Roofing because they show up on the job and do quality work.  Thank you Thompson Roofing!

name: Kevin Redmond
text: Despite some delays in our small project due to some understandable personal issues, the team at Thompson was very professional and communicative.  They were easy to get in touch with, always called back when they said they would, and they did a great job with our repairs.  Will definitely use them again in the future for pretty much any construction project they can help with.  They'll be our first stop!

name: Kaz Watanabe
text: Great customer service.  Very attentive and on top of things.  Highly recommend.

name: Brian
text: Finally finding a great roofing company after dealing with a bunch of duds over the past couple years can really do a lot for your stress level, wish I would have gone with them for my workshop.  This experience started with Kyle coming by and going over all the options, the measurements and pre-inspection (satellite and drone based respectively, cool stuff).  We settled on what we wanted and got on the schedule.  The materials were delivered a day before and I noticed that the supply company sent the wrong decking (I asked to special order a specific type), Kyle and the job foreman, Keith, came out first thing the next morning and swapped out the decking in their own trucks before the roofers even needed to start using it.  Finally, after it was all done Kyle came back for a post inspection. He found some corners in these uncommonly-designed window wells I have that needed a bit more flashing to make sure water would never get in there again.  He sent out his repair guy Jamie, who knocked 5 windows out in 2 hours.  I am so happy with my roof.

name: James Gates
text: I needed a new roof on a shared-townhome in Madison, AL. Thompson Roofing and Construction were professionals, honest, reliable, and affordable. They were able to do the project on my timeline, and the communication I received while working with them was top-notch. I will absolutely be working with them in the future, and recommend them without hesitation.

name: Clinton Herbert
text:
I am pleased with the work and professionalism I recieved from Thompson Roofing.

Unlike any other roofing business in Devatur or nearby, this company actually has a website to inform us of the work they do. That was my main reason for choosing this company for my roof leak. The process of getting an inspection to work completion was effortless. I will further do business with this company if I ever have roofing issues in the future.

name: Hoyt Jones
text: Sales Rep (Scott Shaw)went over and above to make sure my family was taken care of. Especially nice as we were a small job that many wouldn't even give us an estimate on our emergency repair. Now  we are planning on doing the entire roof and will be calling Thompson.

name: Terri Garlen
text: Excellent folks to work with. Would recommend them for any job.

name: Seyed Sadeghi
text: We have a very good experience with Thompson Roofing and Construction. They are prompt, professional, and on time. We are happy with our new roof and the quality of the work. We recommend them strongly.

name: R Henson
text: Great company to do business with.  Very honest and do what they say they will do.  Highly recommend to anyone.

name: Rick Austin
text: Thompson Roofing & Construction did and excellent job of reroofing and vinyl siding our entire home, garage, and shed!  Also, they did a great job of replacing screen, hanging new shutters, and exterior painting.  It was a very pleasant experience working with Kyle, Keith, and Jeremy.  If and when I need work done in the future  I will certainly think of them first!

name: Anita Dillaha
text: This company did an excellent job on my roof.  Arrived on time and cleaned up very well.  Scott Shaw was very professional and explained everything to me.

name: Robert Scites
text: I'm well pleased with every aspect of my interaction with Thompson Roofing and Construction. Their communication was excellent, pricing fair, and my repair seems to be of good quality.

name: Gordon Wilkerson
text: Thompson Roofing did a great job replacing our 3 leaking skylights.there was a lot of unseen damage to the roof decking that hey also took care of. I was pleased they took the extra time to repair all damage. I would recommend Thompson Roofing to anybody in need of a roofing repair.

name: Bobby Graham
text: From beginning to end our experience with these people has been superb for a business. Adam Lee has been special, and the workers were dedicated to doing good work. I doubt that you’ll find this kind of operation very much.

name: Chuck Lindstrom
text: Marcus and the staff were great to work with.  Could not even tell that they had been there when I got home from work.  Would highly recommend Thompson roofing.

name: Will Harmond
text: Thompson roofing was the obvious choice for our family. Customer service was over the top, the care and concern for our home was refreshing, and the multiple options of coverage and design made our difficult decisions much easier. We can't thank Kyle O'Toole, our customer service representative, enough for assisting us every step of the way, and making Thompson Roofing the best experience for us before, during, and after our roofing experience.

name: Sharon Tate
text:
Great Job and it looks wonderful!

Thank you!

name: Austin Graner
text: Thompson Roofing did a great job on my roof and completed the job in just over a day.

name: Travis Key
text: Thompson Roofing met my needs in roof repair. From the initial contact from Marcus Sanders, all the way to roof completion, Thompson Roofing made sure everything was done in a timely manner.

name: Lori Kamus
text: Very thorough inspection (with photos), 30 year workmanship warranty, and a great crew with supervisors providing progress updates are among the reasons I’m impressed with their quality service and superior professionalism — great products, and even better people!

name: Kenny Cagle
text: Definitely would use again, but don't think we will need to after the excellent job! Adam is the best for sure!!!

name: Jessica Weber
text: Very personable and accommodating!  We had a very frustrating leak that kept coming back and Thompson Roofing was very persistent! Leak is fixed and they replaced our attic fans! Amazing people and very reasonably priced! We are a forever customer!

name: Deborah Smith
text: The level of professionalism was excellent! Really answered all my questions and were quick to get the job done in a timely manner! Just AWESOME!

name: Sharon Williams
text: Professional, courteous, and excellent work.  Very satisfied!

name: Nicole Farmer-Landry
text: They did a fantastic job repairing our roof and dormer windows! They were also very professional, organized and communicated with us from beginning estimate to closing invoice.

name: Burley Garrison
text: was very helpful through the whole process. Did not pay anything until both Thompson rep Kyle and I both was happy with the final results. I hope to work with them again in the future.

name: Fli Mi
text:
Owner says they do business in my area....estimator comes out...calls me today stuttering for words and says project manager doesn't want to come this far. Bunch of BS! Someone doesn't know what they are doing...glad I DID NOT USE THEM since honesty is NOT there strong point!
Well to your reply..
You tell me one thing, state another, renig on the end result=TELLING ME ON THE PHONE (RECORDED)ITS TOO FAR AND THIS REPLY  TELLING ME SOMETHING ELSE! Would not recommend you to ANYONE...DONT LIKE LIES!

resp.text:
Dear Fly Y,
Our business model is to be up front with all our customers and always take the time to explain the work, our process and provide detailed estimates of scope and cost. We have great relationships with our clients, indeed much of our business comes from referrals and past customers. In your case, we did not believe we could satisfy you so we thought it best to decline the work.

name: Mark Stone
text: Replaced 20 year chimney cap and flashing and rust stained chimney siding at a fair price.   Good work,

name: Doris Boston
text: They did an excellent job replacing my roof after hail damage. They were very professional. I would highly recommend this company.

name: Jon Wooten
text: Love my new roof!  Thompson Roofing and Construction did an awesome job. You couldn't ask for a better company.

name: Karen Morris
text: Very easy to work, dependable and did a great job.

name: Helen Massey
text: Pleased with job. Very professional.

name: Adam Christiansen
text: Came out quickly and did a thorough job!

name: Jeff Meyer
text: I had a storm repair which damaged about 6 shingles and some siding on a chimney. They repaired the shingles and cleaned up on Easter Sunday, after missing Saturday repair because of rain.  They we're a little pricey @ 600 dollars for about an hours work.

name: Lewis Lemon
text:
Thompson Roofing did an excellent job replacing my roof after some spring hail damage to my roof. They did a very good cleanup job.
The workers arrived on time each dat (two days) and did not leave a mess between the two days.

name: Russell Sage
text: This was a small repair to replace some shingles that were ripped off by high winds.  The repairs were were completed promptly by skilled professionals.  I recommend Thompson roofing and construction.

name: sheralyn goins
text: They did an excellent job with my roof and replacing my rotted trim! I couldn't be happier! Everything looks amazing!!

name: Trent Heard
text: After a severe hail storm came thru wreaking havoc upon our community, Thompson Roofing was there to take care of things and see that the job was done right with not only the roof but with our other damaged property as well. Start to Finish this was a great company to do business with!

name: Paula Stone
text: Everyone that I dealt with  were friendly and very professional. Excellent workmanship.

name: Eric Lumpkin
text: TR&C did a great job of installing pipe boots. Its been a couple of months and there are no visible leaks inside. Communications is an area for improvement.

name: Laura Gummel
text: They did 2 roof repairs. Free estimate and prompt professional service. Site was cleaned and Adam was a pleasure to work with. Will call them for any future roofing needs.

name: Joseph Jones
text: The staff is awesome and does whatever it takes to make the customer happy!

name: Jeffery Klein
text: Glad for the trouble shoot and quick repair for my roof

name: Brenda Gray
text: Thompson Roofing personnel did a excellent job re-roofing my house.

name: Carly Lee
text: Great team of people to be associated with!

name: Robert Cook
text: Great Communication, On Time, Great Job

name: Matt Richardson
text: Good workers

name: Casey Bowden
text: This is a family owned company that's been in business for nearly 50 years. Their professionalism, and attention to detail is absolutely remarkable. I highly recommend them!

name: Dona Raines
text: If I could give zero stars I would. I can not recommend Thomas Morris Roofing (aka Tommy Morris as the building inspector called him).  Your roof will leak.  They did come back out TWICE (you'd think they would have figured out the problem) but the third time we called, all within a year, they wouldn't come and rain was pouring down my blinds inside in my den splashing on the back of my TV. We had to hire another roofer because Thomas Morris wouldn't come fix his mistake. We called the city inspector to inspect the problem, he came right out. He called "Tommy" and "Tommy" was hunting and did not come fix our roof.  Nothing was done to Thomas Morris roofing. Tomas Morris Roofing shingled over a large area of rotten wood and did not replace flashing around the chimney.  I thought the city inspector would revoke his license to do business in the city? Why do we have to pay for a building permit then?  If I'm not mistaken, the city inspector is supposed to be our advocate with contractors and make sure the building code is followed.   Both are a joke.

name: Jamie
text: Quickly responded to my phone calls. He was upfront and honest. Would recommend.

name: James Irby
text: No call back?

name: Matt Richardson
text: Good

name: John Doe
text: I am very happy with the work Shelby roofing did. My roof looks fantastic and they threw in some free upgrades that other contractors wanted too much for. They have a great and very professional team and the transaction went smoothly. Would definitely use them again.

name: A Smith
text:
I will start off by saying all roofing companies are a for profit business and their sales persons are great talkers. All will say they will do your roof at “insurance proceeds and will demand the quote given to you by the insurance company to base their quote and or price.” Needless to say BCR started out great with my roofing process, their communication was lacking at times and I felt I had to beg and follow-up to see when I would get my roof put on. I was then contacted at the last minute by their office manager due to a cancellation and I agreed for the appointment date and time. I was not briefed on exactly what would be taking place besides the fact that the materials will be dropped off at 7a.m. I remember during the initial sales meeting I was informed that a project manager would be on site during the roofing process to oversee the work , that did not happen. As I was proceeding to get my day started and walk out of my house, I noted that I was not able to access to exits out of my home (i.e. front door, back door or garage) I entire yard was a complete mess from the roofing. I phoned Mr. Majors and informed him their cleanliness was not professional at all and asked where was the project manager. Thinking if project manager was present, the amount of debris blocking exit/entrance would not be. I was greeted with hostility and then told with sarcasm that “you are getting a roof put on”. Understandably, however, your team
Is not structured and or organized as it relates to my job. After much complaining, a “project manager” showed up and agreed that the roofers was disorganized. Fast forward during the roofing process, I am asking question as it relates to installation and was basically told a project manager will not be there through duration of roof as they had other appointments but will follow up. Again, I voiced my frustrations to Mr. majors and they was simply over look. Needless to say, I can’t confidently refer anyone to this company due to their lack of professionalism and work ethics of the individuals they sub-contract their work to.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about this situation. We will have someone from our local office reach out to see if we resolve it immediately . Here at BCR  we strive for customer satisfaction. Feel free to reach out to our corporate office at anytime at info@bestchoiceroofing.com

name: Chilton Peach Labs
text:
I was extremely disappointed in their supervision of their workers and their workmanship resulting in a very poor installation on my 88 year old uncle’s roof and my roof. When I checked the roofs after installation there were numerous nail heads showing that should have been covered by shingles, his flashing on his chimney was almost 3/4 inch away from the chimney allowing water to run behind it, along with torn shingles, nails sticking up from under the shingles that were not removed, and many other items. I really wish I was allowed to put pictures on Google.

The next 2.5 months were a back and forth between the owner and myself in which they would come and fix the roof and then I would check and either they would not have done what they said they would, torn other shingles, or I would find more issues.  A total of 4 repairs on our brand new roofs and we still had items they had “overlooked”. My biggest complaint is that I was finding the issues each time instead of a BCR representative making sure it was done correctly.

Finally, after I wrote a very poor review on Google and told the owner that after their next repair I was hiring a roofing inspector out of my pocket to check the roof because of all the issues I was finding they replaced most of my roof and half of my uncle’s roof and did a good job on those installations.

I understand sometimes there are issues with installations and if BCR would have checked it and made sure it was corrected this would have been a 4-5 star review. Because I was having to get on the roof each time and check the roofs and finding things that were “overlooked” it should have been a 1 star review.  I moved it to 3 stars because to their credit they did replace most of my roof and half of my uncle’s roof and supervised the workers when they did it, but it was a lot of discussions with the owner, many unsatisfactory repair jobs, and sleepless nights for myself and my uncle to get to what we should have gotten to to start with.

If you use BCR make sure you check your roof.

name: Nathan Pee
text:
We had storm damage to our roof and decided to use Yellowhammer to replace our roof. I don't recommend them. The only Yellowhammer employee that will show up is the salesman. They sub-contract the work out to various crews and it is apparently the luck of the draw on how good the crew is. Our neighbors used them at around the same time and their roof looks great. It took them two days to do our installation. The first day, they stripped our old roof and then left us overnight without any roof covering. The next morning was foggy and we had a lot of condensation on the roof deck. Some of that water then dripped through and stained our living room ceiling. When I contacted them, they said let's observe it for a few weeks and make sure the new roof is not leaking. Once it was established that it was not leaking, their idea was not to repair my ceiling, but to attempt to contact my insurance company and claim it was storm damage. They showed up with the wrong color drip edge (my neighbors also got the wrong color) and the installation was not professional looking. The installation of the shingles was also done with a less than professional  look (uneven edges, curled shingles, gaps between ridge shingles etc.).  I had plastic strips sticking out from under the shingles all over. They did a less than stellar job of clean up and even left tools behind. I had them install ridge vents and they left a mess in my attic. I supposedly had the option of keeping my turban vents, and I chose to keep them, but they removed them anyway. I contacted them and they did come back and repair some of the work, but I still have plastic strips sticking out and my ceiling has not been repaired. I feel as though I will now have to pay more money for a third party inspector to come out  and see if the installation is properly done.

I will update the review if/when my ceiling gets repaired and they return to finish cleaning up the little plastic strips.

Edit:
Yellowhammer sent the same guys that installed the roof back for their second attempt at fixing the deficiencies in their install. Luckily, I was able to leave work early and catch the guys before they left. After a brief glance at the roof, I could still see plastic strips sticking out. I had to stop the guys from leaving and literally point things out to them. One of the installers even had the nerve to act like I was inconveniencing him by having him come back a second time to fix the roof. So far, they have repaired issues that I can easily spot from the ground, but the entirety of my roof is not visible from the ground, so I have no confidence that there aren't issues on the places I can't see.

Since the owners comment that " they will do anything possible to fix my concerns", I have not been contacted by them. I wish they would send someone out to audit the installer's work. If they think that this is acceptable, then I  invite them to take pictures and use them as examples of the "quality" that you can expect from Yellowhammer. They still have not fixed my living room ceiling. I will update if anything changes.

resp.text: Mr. Pee, we apologize about this and we will do everything we can possible to fix your concerns.

text: Can not recommend Yellowhammer Roofing highly enough.   I had damage from Tropical storm Zeta. David Norris with Yellowhammer Roofing was one of the people recommended by my State Farm agent. text:
Yellowhammer Roofing and my salesman Dalton Simrell have provided me and my family a new roof and a peace of mind I can't put a dollar figure on. The team of installers finished the job within the day, and with a professionalism you don’t find every day. They cleaned up during and after the job, leaving my yard and gutters clean and pristine! And to boot, the roof is beautiful!

Dalton walked me through the process of insurance, lender paperwork, and my to-do list like a pro. Made it effortless. He was knowledgeable of the high-quality materials they'd use, the benefits of upgrades and all the warranties I needed. He has a zero-pressure approach, and I have never been so confident and reassured in my choice of roof and the contractor that installed it.  They stand behind their product AND their service and I commend that!

Don’t wait for Dalton or his team to knock on your door-- Call them today!!!

Thank you Dalton, and thank you Yellowhammer Roofing!

name: Vander Hill
text: I highly recommend Yellowhammer Roofing. My roof had some leaks for some time and on my way home from work, I'd been seeing some signs for Yellowhammer, so I took down the number and gave them a call. David Norris came out and inspected my roof, looked in my attic, showed me where my leaks were actually coming in, and took some measurements for a quote. He got back with me and went over the entire process, which was very impressive. These guys take some good steps to ensure your home is properly sealed. I'd got a couple other quotes, but the time David took to explain the process stood out to me and convinced me they were the roofer to go with. The other two seemed a little standoffish and didn't give me thorough answers to all of my questions. I'm very happy with the finished product, it looks great, the crew was very professional and considerate of my bushes, and cleaned up very well. I would recommend David and Yellowhammer to anyone reading these reviews, top notch company.

They do quality work that I don’t think you can get elsewhere . Definitely recommend them when anyone needs a new roof.

text: Yellowhammer Roofing did a great job roofing my home. Dave Norris followed up immediately, came and measured my roof, and had my roof installed in about a week. It was a much easier process than I expected, and I would recommend David and Yellowhammer to anyone. Thank you for a great job!

text: Had a new roof installed in August, David Stout was awesome. Very satisfied with the job done buy Yellow Hammer Roofing. In fact I went to work for them.

resp.text: Thanks Edward!

name: Laurita Miller
text:
Yellowhammer roofed our house around 17 months ago. 10 Year warranty? Only if they take responsibility for a problem. A leak was discovered this last week  which has resulted in mold damage.. A representative came to check it out and just left. He claims the problem has been going on for years. Well isn’t that why we paid for a new roof 18 months ago? Shouldn’t that have stopped it? He further claims the problem is not the roof but the guttering. Well didn’t they take all the guttering off and put it back on? He claims the guttering didn’t extend quite far enough and they didn’t put it on incorrectly in the first place.”Not our responsibility.” Well weren’t they the professionals on the roof 17 months ago? Didn’t they handle the guttering? . As professionals shouldn’t they have told us so we could have had the guttering extended at the time they put the roof on? The representative said it would have cost about $300, which we would have gladly paid had we been advised. (I’m 70. I Couldn’t be on the roof.) Instead we are having to pay thousands for mitigation and repairs. Hopefully our homeowners policy will help some but have already said they are not responsible for the shoddy work of the roofing company which we selected.Funny thing. THEY selected US. Knocked on the door to help us after tornados we’re through our county. Thanks a lot!! We are going to try and  talk to Yellowhammer owners Monday. Hopefully they will do the right thing and take some responsibility. I’ll keep this updated and if they take responsibility I will post that too.

I said that I would give an update to be fair. A team from Yellowhammer came today to further evaluate. They were great and did a very thorough job and said the roofers had failed to do some important caulking and so Yellowhammer would be taking responsibility for the repairs. They said they would return in a week after more rain and determine if the problem has been remedied and if so they would call a contractor to make necessary repairs to the interior. I will further update if there is no follow through but I believe Yellow Hammer is going to do the right thing! THANK YOU Yellowhammer!!

text: I chose Yellow Hammer roofing company because of their reputation with the BBB of Birmingham, AL. When the representative Dalton Simrell came out he was very professional, courteous and knowledgeable about the issues I had with my roof. My roof was replaced within one day and I was elated that I chose Yellow Hammer roofing to perform the work in my roof. Mr. Simrell is an outstanding representative of the company and ensured I was satisfied. That is a very important aspect of good customer service and I will refer anyone in need of a roof to Yellow Hammer because of the experience I recently had.

He also met my adjuster and reviewed the damage with him, got my roof approved, and had it installed all within a couple of weeks in time for the closing! name: Agsi Wesa
text: About a year ago we purchased a “handyman special” home and property.  I could do most all the work except for roof that was well past its prime.  I had all but given up hope; I looked at the wife then looked skyward and said it’s up to you God.  About 30 minutes later the wife came got me to watch a commercial for Yellowhammer Roofing that we had never seen before!  I was skeptical about calling but I did and Mr. Taylor Sherer called and made an appointment to come inspect our roof and see what he could do for us.  I must say I was impressed with his “home town” professionalism.  It was as if he was the “does anything for you” neighbor next door talking to us instead of a contractor.  Afterwards we sat down to discuss getting the new roof and explained to him about the hospital bills, tight budget, and other issues we thought would stop us from getting the help we needed.  Taylor walked us through the entire process, and much to my surprise got us approved within 15 minutes and a payment plan that fit our budget!  Three weeks later we had a new roof installed with Taylor’s supervision from start to finish.  The Yellowhammer crew did a fantastic job of tare off, repair, installation, and cleanup!  I only had one small problem after the installation, but Taylor himself did the minor repair on his last visit to us.  Thank you Mr. Taylor and Yellowhammer Roofing you made impossible possible for us.  I can now sleep soundly at night during a rain storm and not worry about leaks, such a blessing!

text: David Stout did an excellent job for me in getting a new roof put on my house. It was a huge house with a complicated roofing system and they did a beautiful job. David was a pleasure to do business with.

name: Christopher Allison
text: I'm going to give this company a 1 star rating due to attempted insurance fraud. Before I begin, let met state that I have had two roof inspections done since Yellow Hammer's employee Dalton came out to look at my Dormer!  Dalton, from yellow hammer roofing, came out to give an estimate on a dormer repair.  However, I was not given an estimate for a repair on our dormer siding, but instead was informed that we needed a new roof and given a thirty minute sales pitch. I was presented with drone footage of our home and photos of marks on our roof and vents.   When i asked what this had to do with the dormer repair i had initially requested, Dalton replied with,"oh well i didn't even see that".  Odd, since i had sent him photos the previous day  of the dormer and that was the entire purpose for the visit; not anything to do with our roof. This employee marked all over the visible part of our roof with chalk from the road, but not other areas...only areas we could visible see from our driveway.  The next roofing company said the places he marked were just typical marks from pulling the shingles out of the pack and totally common, but definitely not hail damage as the yellow hammer employee, Dalton stated. Dalton from Yellow HGammer Roofing wanted me to sign paperwork giving him power of attorney to let .him negotiate with our insurance company.  I kicked him out at that point.  This is an insurance fraud company, or their employee, Dalton is at the very least

Mainly the brick because it has a unique chipped pattern in the brick is actually beige to some brown in it.

I have had four homes roofed in my life time. Most of the projects took two days for about 3/4 less area of what this roof is.  Yellowhammer roofing with Dalton Simrell did an excellent  job and they cleaned up the area rather well. I would highly recommend them as a AAA +++ service.

name: Celina Cameron
text:
I had made several calls to different roofing companies and had left messages and even spoke to different people YellowHammer roofing was the only one out of approximately 10 different companies to return my phone call . The receptionist was very pleasant on phone and could tell how discouraged I was and she assured me someone would be in touch . David contacted me and was so professional through the whole process he did everything he said he was going to do and went above and beyond in staying in touch with me during  process of my estimate .  I was very pleased with the estimate he gave me and if I decide to do my roof I will make sure Yellow Hammer does the work !!!

Thank you David👍

text: The crew from Yellowhammer Roofing that replaced my roof was a marvel to watch.  A model of efficiency, they worked hand in glove, with each member in constant motion.  Less than twelve hours from start to finish, including clean-up!  Cole and the crew leader (can't remember his name) were good to work with and answered any questions I had.  The sales rep David has been friendly and extremely available, returning any calls in record time.  So far so good as far as leaks so I guess they did a good job.  The only ding - the cost.  Expensive compared to other roofing companies.

name: Kyler Orndoff
text: Dalton Simrell was very helpful getting us our new roof. He worked with our insurance company to ensure our end was covered.

text: Brock Smitherman with Yellowhammer Roofing worked with us after the roofer we had hired couldn't get a permit to install the roof on our rental property.  He explained our options thoroughly and got us out of a bind.  We will use them again and definitely recommend them.

text: David Norris, was very helpful an attentive as we went through the process of replacing our roof. I am very pleased with the work, and have recommended him to a neighbor and a friend. Lcraft

name: Karen Boland
text: I was under the impression they would come in and repair water damage inside but that was not the case.  The one contractor they gave me was a nightmare.  Still looking for a contractor.

resp.text: Mrs. Boland, we have noted your concern and we promise to reach out to you within 24 hours to make sure that your concerns are answered and fixed. Please do not hesitate call us at our office at 205-988-3337 if you have any questions between now and getting your concern fixed.

name: damario kendrick
text: Dalton Simmeral is and awesome guy if you ever need a roof go to yellow hammer and ask for Dalton.

name: Henrietta Torrance
text:
David Norris of Yellowhammer Roofing was able to help me when no one else would.  When I was having problems with my roof two other roofing companies came by and couldn't help me because they say my insurance too hard to work with. I had gave up and one day I decided to search for a roofer to give it one last try and come across yellow hammer on the internet so I gave them a call. They sent out a inspector name David Norris. He looked at my roof and told me I had storm damage all over it so we called my insurance. Two times my insurance try to just do patch work on my roof but David didn't give up and insist to them that my roof qualified for a full replacement. They sent out a third guy who finally agreed. I can't thank yellow hammer and David enough for their help. My roof is replaced and it looks great. I recomend them to anyone just call and ask for David Norris. Thank you.
Henrietta Torrance

name: Neil Kramer
text:
So we get one of those Alabama storms where the winds and rain go wild and CRASH! - good sized tree limbs fall through the roof. Nobody hurt, luckily, except for poor Ms. Roof.

After research into the countless vendors in the area we come up with a great prospect...Yellohammer Roofing Inc.

We call and set up an appointment for inspection and estimate. Enter Dalton Simrell of team Yellowhammer.  This dude knows his stuff. He did the inspection, took the time to explain his findings and go over our options, a total pro. He even put a tarp over the punctures from the limbs.  We signed the contract and within a few weeks we had a new, high quality roof.  The installation team was on target, did a great job and took the time to do an exacting clean-up of debris from the demolition and installation.

For what its worth, we highly recommend Yellowhammer Roofing and hopefully you will be lucky to get Dalton as your rep. Thanks Dalton and thanks Yellowhammer!

Alicia and Neil Kramer

name: Nick Pissanos
text: Brock from Yellow Hammer roofing was professional and worked well with my insurance.  I highly recommend him.

name: Zaina Emaish
text: I am giving a 1 star to Yellow Hammer due to the fact that they have tried to commit Insurance Fraud on a family relatives roof. My family relative called their insurance to file a claim and Yellow Hammer was the contractor to come out and do the inspection. At the time of the adjuster appointment their insurance stated the damage was vandalism and was in fact man made. My family relative is currently trying to figure this out with their insurance so I warn you do not go with a contractor who is willing to get up on your roof and cause damage only to make a check off of you!!

resp.text: Mrs. Emaish, I believe you have us mixed up with another company. We only have one homeowner with the last name Emaish in our system in which he had given us a 10/10 on satisfaction when completing his roof. Committing insurance fraud is a crime which we have never committed in our 10 years of work. Our BBB record and Platinum Preferred Certification vouches for the integrity we use with each and every inspection and project we do here at Yellowhammer Roofing. We take pride and stand behind everything we do at Yellowhammer Roofing. Vandalism should not be tolerated or accepted and I hope that you find the right person or company that did this. Please have a blessed day!

name: Bruce Weaver
text:
At first impression the presentation is great. The salesman even told me he'd pay me, not the company, a $100 for every referral. Being a Contractor I occasionally know people who need a roof so I said; " Great". I referred him to my mother. After she signed the contract I saw on FB a post by a Realtor looking for recommendations for a roofing company other than Yellow Hammer. I mentioned it to the salesman. He said he'd contact her. It appears they have little communication between the delivery people, installers, the home owner, and salespeople. No coordination at all. The job was expensive for the type of shingles installed. It looks good though however they left marks on the house and garage door. They also punctured the screens on the screened porch. The referral fee that I was promised is still in the salesman's pocket. I see now why the Realtor posted ; " other than Yellow Hammer."
You've heard; "Where's Waldo?" I'm wondering; "Where's Benjamin?"

9-20-18 update. I can't believe after they read my review it happen again. Yesterday my mom said some guy was knocking on her door. She waited until he walked back towards his vehicle and opened her door to ask what he wanted. He said he was from Yellow Hammer, but nothing to show that he was, and came to look at the needed repairs. She said; "They're around back". She thought he was walking down the driveway to the rear of the house so she went back in to walk to the back porch. She said she heard something as she was opening the back door and was startled to find this guy in the house, standing behind her. She never was notified that he was coming and the scared by him being in the house uninvited. Still a lack of communication in this company. Good thing this 88 year old lady didn't have a gun in her hand. The salesman did call me a couple of days ago wanting to know how he could rectify me changing my review. I don't have an answer for that other than issues that continue can only be rectified from the top management down the chain of command. Sounds like some goal setting with a plan of action is needed.
9-23-18 Update. They showed up on Sunday, unannounced. Seems to be a pattern. My mom had been gone and came back,  unaware they had been there and that they left over a dozen nails in the driveway, she drove over the nails. Not sure if any are in her tires yet. They did get the black marks off the house and replaced the screen.
Update 11-1-18 The Salesman obviously  didn't tell the truth. He never gave me the promised referral fee. NO MORE REFERRALS. I could have sent many.

name: Doug Morrison
text: Had a slight glitch that was taken care of.  Quality work, good cleanup afterwards.  Referred to our Church and they took care of two buildings. Would use them again.

text: My husband Joe and I met David Norris at Lakefest.We arranged a meeting and found  damage to the roof. The roof was removed and replaced. The roof is instaled and looks great. I would recommend this company to my friends and family.

text: Would have been 5 but waiting to have work completed. Servicer was understanding and helpful.

name: Cathy Carlisle
text: Dalton Simrell and Yellowhammer Roofing replaced my roof due to storm damage. There was a problem with the company sending a few packs of shingles the wrong color. Whenever I called to see where we were at with the problem, Dalton always took my calls and kept me informed about the problem. When they did come out to fix it, they called to let me know when they were coming and what to expect. All the workers were courteous and they cleaned up all the mess. My roof looks great. I would like to thank Mr. Simrell for taking care of everything. He is a very honest and professional salesman.

name: Roxanne Stephenson
text: I had just loaded up kids to go to football practice when Dalton pulled in my driveway. I was resistant, but politely heard him out. The whole time he was talking I assumed I would be adding his card to the stack of 14 other roofing companies I thought weren't legit or a scam, until he said "I bet there is a brown spot on the ceiling in that front room. I can see the damage on the roof from here". And that is the moment he had my full attention, bc there was a brown spot! I decided to let him come that week to assess the roof and go over his plan. Within days I had recieved a check from my insurance adjuster! Once funds were all clear, he had his amazing crew at my house that same week. This crew tarped the entire perimeter of my home, never made a mess, and removed the old/installed the new roof, cleaned up and rolled out at 8pm! I couldnt say enough good words about them! Every step Dalton was in contact, walking me through everything. Aside from his excellent knowledge and professionalism, he is very accommodating to my schedule and the fact that I have loud kids and barking dogs on the background. I have been approached for a few years by 14 (I counted the cards) different roofing companies and this is the only company I even considered! My new roof looks so good and we know quality products and workmanship will have us taken care for a very long time! So, give Dalton Simerell with Yellowhammer Roofing a call and you won't be disappointed!

name: joyce jackson
text: Thanks Dalton, for solving my roof problem. I thought I had to replace the whole roof, he found the leak and fix it. I will recommend all my friends and family are who ever I hear of talks about needing a roof, I will refer them to yellowhammer😀😎😎

name: Cedric Brown

my issue isn’t with work being done on my home my issue was when I worked for them and in one year I did over $400,000.00 in door to door sales, they fired me with no reason and didn’t pay me on multiple jobs.

text: Bar B was fantastic to work with!  Jeremy was incredible... excellent integrity.  I live in an old Victorian home with a very complex roof and Bar B was able to finish the job in less than a week.  They also did an expert job of putting a new final on the spire over the porch.  The crew worked very hard in terrible heat.  I would highly recommend Bar B.  You won't be disappointed!

name: Mandy
text: After some storm damage, we had this company do an estimate for our roof. This company got way too involved with the insurance adjuster handling our claim and was attentive in trying to find out what price would be quoted. We kept on being told that an estimate would be sent "later today", "I'll send it Sunday Morning", excuse after excuse. Finally after waiting several days, we received an estimate the same day the adjuster quoted their portion. The estimate was extremely expensive. Bottom line, we did not go with this company and went with another company that charged much less than what Bar-B wanted to charge. We did not like how involved and secretive this company was with the insurance adjuster and the prices were not fair for what this company estimated.

name: Staci Coffey
text: Fantastic experience! I highly recommend them for your roofing needs.

name: Ashley Wilson
text:
Where do I start? After months and months of fighting with Allstate to replace my full roof after a storm came through and ripped up every home/roof in the neighborhood, they would only agree to pay for half of my roof. I had to get an attorney and everything but that's another story for another day.Well as you know no roofing company want to replace half of a roof. I called a few places and got a few estimates and everyone was so expensive. I'm talking 15k - 20k. After months of praying and crying, Bar-B roofing was recommended to me by a relative.

I called and the receptionist was sooooo nice and welcoming even over the phone. She had Daniel Cook (the contract manager who is amazing might I add) at my doorstep within 2 days. It would have been 1 day but it was raining. Mr. Cook gave me an unbelievable estimate. I mean the best estimate you will probably receive in the State of Alabama. I signed a contract that day and a week later my roof was fully replaced. Everyone was so nice and understanding. Their crew was very professional and worked diligently to get the job done as quickly as possible. They even clean up really well after. I don't leave reviews unless it is deserved. BAR-B roofing did a phenomenal job. My roof looks amazing. Please don't look any further. Call them today!!!! Thanks DANIEL :) I will be referring all of my friends, family, co-workers, and associates.

OHH and if you have Allstate drop them NOW. I am warning you! I wouldn't let them insure my pinky toe!

name: Susan Rhoads
text:
10 out of 10 Stars for Bar-B roofing Jeremy and the crew that re-roofed our house.
Jeremy gave a competitive estimate and was present when our insurance sent out a kid with a camera to take photos of the damage, so not a true estimator.  Jeremy went up on the roof with him, but saw that he would need to call our insurance adjuster.  We kept in touch by text, which was very helpful to have all information in one place.  The crew got to work very quickly and did efficient work with limited daylight in early January. They had head lamps on while they were making sure all the nails were out of the yard.  The next morning another employee came back and did another sweep and even picked up the small pieces of cellophane that fly all over even on a calm day.  We have moved a lot and this is the 4th house that has needed a roof.  Only one other roofer has been as professional as Bar-B.

name: Wes Couch
text: If you need a new roof or roof repair, then look no further. My main point of contact, David Bentley came over within 24 hours of my first phone call, and I had an estimate within 48 hours. They did a complete tear off and re-decked, then re-roofed the entire house in a day and a half. They did an amazing job, and we're thrilled with the end result. We were just as impressed with how the crew cleaned up after themselves, as we were with the job they did on our new roof! That is a very important part of the job. Call David and he'll take great care of you!

name: Lin Estes
text: This is by far the best roofing company I have ever worked with.  These guys were fast and gave me the best estimate and service.  The cleanup after they were finished was immaculate.  My roof looks great after suffering from some storm damage and I didn't have to mortgage it again just to pay for the new roof.   Mr. Shaddix was very attentive throughout the whole process, letting me know the status of each step of the job.  I hope to not need another roof any time soon but if I do, this is definitely the company I will be calling.  Definitely recommend to anyone needing roof repair or replacement!

name: wendy murray
text: They are great,  they came out inspected our roof damage, explained everything, helped us get financed and did the work all in week. Definetly recommend them. We will be getting a quote from them for windows too.

text:
I Absolutely 100% and more would recommend BAR-B Roofing Of Oxford For any Of there work. Jeremy has represented his company pass expectations. VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE! I love the fact that he set the appointment time and was very prompt. Also took time out of his schedule to help me with the Insurance inspector. Was also on time waiting for the inspector who failed to show up on his(inspector) appointment time. Jeremy did not have to do that. He has gone beyond expectations and that alone is very hard to find in a company anywhere.  Company was very responsive and work is already being completed in my damaged area by this company.
Thank you Jeremy for All you have done! You and Bar B Roofing is very appreciated on this end....

name: Judy Rowe
text: Bar-B Roofing just replaced the  roof on our house and detached garage. We are highly pleased with the service they provided. Jeremy Shaddix was the project manager and he was fantastic. The roofing crew had to return three times in one week due to all of the rain we had that week. On the day it finally stopped raining, they started roofing at 10:00 am and were here until it was dark around 8:00 pm. I highly recommend Bar-B Roofing.

BMcElhaney

name: NOT ME!!
text: I Called the office to have someone to come to my home & give me a estimate for a roof... The receptionist said give me your email and we will get back to you. I told her i would call someone else that can work with me, i dont want to go through emails and i ended the call. She called me back and said i will have someone to call you.  2 days later i got a call and the next day a project manager came and gave me a (very High) price for a 3 bed 2 bath house.  As we were talking about different options between shingles and metal, i ask if you have ILLEGALS working for you... he said YES. About 50-50.... needless to say Bar-B roofing will not be paying any illegal person with my money. I want my home to be roofed by hard working American Citizens that can speak english. communication is very important in every aspect!!.

Most of our Sales Reps have worked for Bar-B Roofing 10 + years. Most are highly respected by manufactures like GAF and Owens Corning, whom routine visit our office. Our goal is to provide exception service and how our reps treat our costumers is greatly as important as the services we provide. So it's important to us to know when we have failed a custumer(s). text: Since this company has started a few years ago. I have recently found out that this is not a real company. This company sales leads pretty much to the highest bidder gets the job so you will never know who really is going to show up at your house. Could be a company that has a 5-star rating could be your backyard roofing company you never know. So just be careful when calling this company out.But I can usher you that you want be signing a contract with Calhoun county roofing! Be careful

resp.text:
Justin Barksdale and Jonah Shaw own "Better Boys Roofing & Construction, LLC", a competitor of Calhoun County Roofing Contractors. They have nothing better to do than to post negative reviews of a competitor that they rank BELOW.

Posting negative reviews of a competitor's business is against Google's Terms of Service, so these reviews should be removed and their account should be banned.

See screenshots for some of the nasty text messages that this business owner sent: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LNlDVJCGb5jD1e-oEWLo2Dkll30xzK3S/view?usp=sharing & https://drive.google.com/open?id=1lSbn8fMJaO46XaxYpAdr-xiIbs3NjEFa

Sometimes in life (and in business), you partner with the wrong people. This is definitely the case with "Better Boys Roofing and Construction, LLC". It didn't matter how much success these people would have gotten, they would have never been happy. I don't have anything negative to say about them but after being cursed and threatened, I won't be doing business with them anymore. They are just taking their anger out on the company has sustained their business for the last 1.5 years.

This review should be flagged as inappropriate as a "Conflict of Interest".

name: dee m
text:
The quality of work is awful! They did a tacky job on my roof. It seemed as if their primary concern was getting done quickly and going to the next pay day. They didn't remove shingle tape from the roof, knocked off my vinyl siding, and did a horrible job in the corners. If you have a simple flat roof this is the company for you but if your roof has any height stay away!!!
Repairs were addressed as requested but I'm still not really satisfied.

resp.text: I’m really confused. I bent over backwards to satisfy this customer. The tape she is referring to is a thin clear sheathing that is on every shingle installed & will dissolve with the first rain. It was about two inches long. We did not knock off her siding. However, we did snap a small piece back together for her. It took 30 seconds. We install hundreds of steep roofs each year and have had very few complaints. When a customer has a problem, I do my best to take care of it. I addressed her issues promptly and thought she was satisfied.

text: Greater Roofing is the company to choose for any of your roofing needs. The team took the time to answer any and all questions to make the process as smooth as possible. I highly recommend you use this company for all things roofing.

name: Beverly Holt
text:
If there were 10 stars available I would give this company 10 stars. We had almost given up on our Wind insurance willingness to pay for our damage from hurricane Sally. We had a very large deductible which we knew we would have to pay but the estimate that came back did not include all of the damage that we felt needed to be repaired.

Fortunately Jason Johnson Representing Greater Roofing happened to stop by our house to talk to us. He inspected our roof and looked at the other damage that we had that needed to be repaired and with our permission took charge and got it all done. Not only did he hire excellent roofers, but he also engaged the fence builder and the drywall company to repair the inside leak damage. He handled the details with the insurance company. When the roofers came to repair a roof we were extremely impressed. There were at least five people at all times working on our roof. The team he brought were some of the hardest workers I have ever experienced. They put a tarp around the house and covered our bushes and they put on our new roof to the new Alabama wind code.  Their cleanup was impeccable. Using a magnet they cleared excess nails. We have only found 3 nails from the whole project.
Most importantly, Jason was available by cell phone at all times. He returned calls immediately and kept us informed of arrival times of material and workers. Impressive!

The drywall repair company provided by Greater roofing was also excellent. Texture and paint in the ceiling look great.

Finally the fence builders came. They were prepared when they arrived and 2 of them completed the job by mid afternoon. They did an awesome job too.

Thank you Jason Johnson and Greater roofing for getting our repairs done well and quickly. We are so happy Jason dropped by.

name: Englysha Perkins
text: If you’re in need of a new roof, I highly recommend Greater Roofing’s services, especially Stefan. He assisted me from the beginning to end.  Because of my schedule, I was grateful Stefan was able to speak on my behalf with the insurance company and adjustor.  Though it was a bit noisy, as expected, the work his crew performed was excellent and without issues. They also cleaned up so well that there was hardly a trace they were even here.  Thank you Stefan for your professionalism and keeping me informed throughout the entire project and staying on top of things.

Greater Roofing did a great job on our roof after the damage it received from hurricane Sally. They made sure that we had no leaks prior to the roof replacement by placing tarps over places with missing shingles. They handled dealing with the insurance company in getting the depreciation reimbursement and extra expense for required code work that was not included in the original insurance damage report.

After the roof replacement they made certain that all debris was removed and that we were completely satisfied with their work.

I would most definitely recommend them if you need any roofing work done.

text: We absolutely love our new roof! My favorite part of this job was Mr. Billy!! We were able to send pictures back and forth so everything was handled at top of the line professional levels! I'm very please with this young man's skills and courtesy at his age!! name: Brandon
text: Mobile Roofing and Construction did a good job replacing my roof. The crew that came out replaced my 4400 sqft roof in a day and a half, appeared to be hard working and efficient, and did a better job than I expected at cleaning up. Billy McLain was my project manager, and his profession of faith in Jesus Christ was primary reason for using Mobile Roofing and Construction. Out of all the companies that I talked to, Billy was one of the youngest project managers, but he was very ambitious, polite, honest, detailed, and did his best to satisfy all of my special requests for things like additional flashing and different pipe boots. I would definitely recommend to others that are looking for a roofing company to give Billy a call and see if he is a good fit for you. I'd give a rating of 4.5 stars based on my higher than normal expectations. Billy, as a fellow believer, I would like to share the following scriptures as an encouragement, as they also do the same for me in my daily walk. 1st Corinthians 10:31-10:33 and Matthew 5:13-5:16. Thank you.
