resp.text: Thank for the kind words

name: shauna Roberts
text: hired this company to do my roof. They did a fabulous job and got it done very quickly. very reliable company they come much recommended!

name: Phillip Edens
text:
This company is as incompetent as it comes (see pictures). I was initially quoted 4 days, but it ended up taking them 7 and a half weeks to completely ruin my roof. I have walked the roof and personally counted 138 screw holes in the metal that were left open when a screw was put in the wrong place then backed out. There is trim that is put in backwards and allows water to run under the metal instead of over. There are unsealed holes the size of dimes at every corner of the dormers and at the top of the valleys. The ridge is screwed on crooked, even after they "fixed it" once already. There is literally a water dam in one of the back valleys where metal was folded up at the end, creating a blockage and not letting water drain the way it is supposed to. No corner on the roof is sealed and instead of doing it right they put "ornamental" trim on to cover up the fact that they didn't do it right. The roof has leaked from the day they showed up on the job, plus they never came back to fix it or the water damage that they caused by not sealing it up. I have over 200 pictures, an inspection report, all of the texts between Matt and I and between myself and his incompetent workers, and I'm waiting on a quote for a complete roof replacement. I have also contacted my lawyer to begin the process of filing a lawsuit due to their extreme incompetence and shady business practices, and filed a complaint with the Better Business Bureau in Birmingham. Matt is quick to take your money, but he's in no hurry to make good on his word. I've also added some pictures to let others know the lack of quality that comes along with hiring Mobile Roofing and Construction.

Update to your response: I made a side deal with the crew? I called YOU. YOU sent that crew out here. The quote is a carbon copy with YOUR business name on the header and the truck that showed up had YOUR business name on the side of it. The check was written to YOU. And now you're trying to put the blame on someone else? The reason you didn't get paid in full is because YOU reduced the price since it took your workers almost 2 months to do a roof. Just yesterday you responded to a text and said that I told the crew how to put the roof on and that's why it was installed incorrectly. Since when does a customer tell a roofing company how to install a roof? I'll even post a picture of the text so people can see just how shady you are.

resp.text: I’m sorry you made a deal with the workers on the side and not with me. Now I am the bad guy? Having to fix all the problems, no problem I’ll help you and We sent a crew out there to fix some small details, and do the siding for free, plus the crew never got paid in full.  Im sorry just can’t  make everyone happy. We have been helping our community for years.

name: Leslie Jackson

name: rgcvols98
text: The roofing crew did quality work.

resp.text: Hello From Matt, the manager Please call me and I can move it immediately. I wasn't aware they left it.  Very sorry to hear about the situation there with your mother in law. Will act fast.   251-277-1546.   Please Allow us to make it right.

name: Michelle Lane
text: Brandon Furry responded back quickly to my message.  He communicated with me by phone and message on when he would be here.  He quickly evaluated my problem and fixed it in a timely manner.  Brandon was professional and friendly.  I highly recommend him and I definitely will be calling him again if I have more problems in the future.

name: Carl Dekle
text: Matt Allen at Mobile Roofing does what it takes to earn his customers’ loyalty!  It is easy to give a contractor a 5 Star Rating when everything goes according to plan, but what sets the outstanding contractors apart from the rest is how they handle themselves and respond to conflict and adversity. Matt cares about the reputation of Mobile Roofing and about his personal integrity. We encountered some unforeseen issues on our roofing project and Matt stepped up to the plate and resolved all issues professionally and his crew did an outstanding job on our new “Certified Fortified” roof. Call Mobile Roofing and ask for Matt!

resp.text: Thank you Carl, for the kind words. Glad we were able to help with everything. Thanks again

name: James Edwards
text: Very impressed with Brandon..Very responsive, honest, professional and made a difficult project almost enjoyable! Also a high rating for his assistant,  Carter. BIG THANKS to you and your team!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words.

name: Peace & Love
text:
****Update-July 7, 2020****
Mr. Allen with Mobile roofing came out and apologized; this is huge! He also came to assess what needed to be done and has put forth every effort to make things right. I am satisfied with the outcome and I am very thankful!

Previous post:
It is going on a year now with numerous promises from Mobile roofing to come back and complete repairs. Their staff removed paint from the side of my house when cleaning up from throwing shingles down off of my roof. They came out after the job was completed to take pictures( Mr. Allen). This was arranged by Mr. Terry then shortly there after, Mr. Terry calls me saying that he needs to come out to take pictures. I had to remind him that Mr. Allen just recently came out to take pictures and he knew this! Now they’re saying they had pictures taken before the job began?? Integrity?  I had nails and shingles all in my pool which I had to pay to have removed from the bottom of my pool. They did not cover my front lawn properly damaging my lion statues and shrubs. Though they came out to try and clean out my pool but there was so much debris remaining.  They removed paint from the side of my house when cleaning off the black marks on my siding/trim from the roof installation. I have a nail protruding through the ceiling of my family room ( eyesore). I was told by Mr. Terry and Mr. Allen that they would come back and complete the repairs. They came out once to touch up the paint that was removed from the front of my house with paint that I purchased but they never follow through to complete the job even after I contacted the Better Business Bureau. After one response from Mobile roofing denying any error on their part to the BBB they have not responded. Although, I have emails, video from my cameras (showing the mess and damage being made) and text messages from them saying that they would be back to rectify these issues.  The BBB SAID THE BUSINESS WAS UNRESPONSIVE!! See BBB Complaint ID#: 85093873
Business Name: Mobile Roofing & Construction

****Update-July 7, 2020****
Mr. Allen with Mobile roofing came out and apologized; this is huge! He also came to assess what needed to be done and has put forth every effort to make things right. I am satisfied with the outcome and I am very thankful!

resp.text: I'm sorry, this is Matt Allen. I don't believe I have ever spoke with you before just through email. How can I help?

name: Natalie Black
text: This review is on behalf of my aunt and uncle....they contacted mobile roofing and worked directly with Terry Harrison. He helped them file a claim with their insurance company and was every informative and knowledgeable. He and his crew were very professional and easy to work with. They completed the job in one day and were very thorough, they didn’t leave any debris behind. It was like they were never there. Very pleased. I would recommend him and his crew to anyone wanting a professionally installed quality roof.

name: Darryl Stabile
text: Terry and work crew were very professional.  Roof installation started on schedule and completed on time.  The quality of work was excellent. The site cleanup was also very good.  The cost was fair and reasonable, lower than other quotes I received for same work. If you are looking for a roofing contractor, I highly recommend considering Mobile Roofing & Construction.

name: Kelly DeFord
text: Are you the kind of person that wants to be treated like you matter? Do like prompt efficient service at a quality price? I can only speak of my personal experience with hands down the best roofing specialist I know, Terry Harrison.  He roofed my home recently with his crew that was there every time they said they would be. When my roof sustained hail damage Terry personally inspected it and handled my claim with my insurance carrier start to finish with me.   He was knowledgeable about the upgraded code associated with living on the coast.  We discussed the added value and extra discount available to my insurance policy by fortifying the roof as well.  It is very evident that he knows his work and is a very skilled professional worthy of a referral. I have personally recommended him to many of my own clients after the quality job he and his staff performed.  Even the clean up was pristine.   If you like dealing with the best this is where you can’t go wrong.

name: April SPENCE
text: Brandon is awesome to work with! I live in Kansas City but I have a rental home in Mobile and Brandon was able to take care of everything with the insurance company. Thanks Brandon!

name: Jennifer Gorum
text: We used Mobile Roofing to replace our roof in January, 2020. Terry made the process easier than I ever imagined.  Great communication, quality and punctuality.  They were in/out within 2 days and cleaned up so well it was as if they were never there.  Excellent roofing company!

name: Larry Terrell
text: Matt and his team are extremely professional and knowledgeable. They install high end products and stand behind their work. I definitely recommend them for anyone looking for an honest and skilled contractor!

name: kcantrell49
text: These guys were wonderful.  I worked with Mr. Terry Harrison and he worked very hard to get us the best roof, was always responsive, informative and respectful. He and his crew did a wonderful job for us. Definitly recommend that you give Terry a call if you're looking to replace or repair your roof.

name: Timothy Williams
text: Matt was really helpful in handling the claim with insurance; the crew was on time and finished quickly within three days. My only real complaint is that I specifically asked for a magnet to be run over the yard to pick up nails and metal scrap, and Matt agreed that it would be done. It was not, and after a nail in my riding mower tire and several more collected in my shoes I bought a magnet and combed the front & back yards myself. I found lots of shingling nails, metal roofing nails, and pretty big pieces of metal clippings. Overall I am pleased with the roof - 2 years later and it looks great, no issues at all.

resp.text: Sorry about the nails, I do apologize. I relayed the message to send the guys back out. Sorry if it didn't happen. We have 2 new magnets now and I have tried to get every nail.  Sorry again for the trouble

name: cathy mccain
text: Brandon Furry and his crew are excellent.  Roof looks great.  They arrived on time, worked steadily and cleaned up afterwards.  Very pleased that I selected Mobile Roofing.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind works. Glad we could help. Thank you

name: Glen Davis

Glen Davis.

name: Luke Jones
text: This company has a lack of communication.  I requested an estimate 3 times and was told a technician would contact me.  I never heard from anyone.  If you are looking a responsive company who cares about their customers, you better look elsewhere.

resp.text:
Luke,
Really sorry to hear someone didn't reach out to you soon enough, Sometimes our guys get real busy with the storms we have Had lately. Tarping roofs from falling trees and severe damage.
Sometimes it takes a few hours to a day longer during a storm. I said I'll have them call you as soon as possible.
I also heard from One of my guys today saying they tried to call you back on the 6th. And no response til yesterday.  I know you have a leak and we would to help you with it and I apologized were really busy because we're good at what we do. Your more than welcome to call around to other companies.
So with us being honest here , Does that really warrant a 1 Star review?

name: Robert Libman
text: I was very pleased with this company from the quote to clean up!! They were prompt and professional.  My roof looks great, and the price was reasonable.  I highly recommend these guys. Great job !!

text: We just recently had the roof torn off and replaced at our daughter's home in Mobile.   Mobile Roofing had been recommended to us by a friend. text: Came out and gave prompt helpful service.  Gave me a quote, but after the fact which was confusing and let to some issues.  They showed up on time and worked hard, including on Easter! name: lesley behling
text: OMG, I’m not sure words are enough to express how happy I am that I decided on using Mobile Roofing and Construction to replace my roof.  In this day and time it is so difficult to find a contractor who will follow through and do what they say they will do.  I can tell you that Mobile Roofing blew that out of the water.  From day one, until they finished I have been so impressed with their performance.  Mr. Terry Harrison, took on my project and handled everything including filing my insurance claim, meeting with the adjuster and managing the project.  He went way above and beyond, in my opinion, insuring that we were satisfied.  This man is everything that speaks customer service and I highly recommend him in handling your roofing needs!  I just wish I were able to use him for everything I need outside of roofing.  The owner of Mobile Roofing should be proud to have him as part of their team because he is exactly what so many companies are missing.  He takes pride in what he does, and the company, and truly is there to help the customer.  Thank you Mobile Roofing and Construction and a special thanks to Terry Harrison!

name: Jeff Hemfield
text: Highly recomend. Showed up on time, complete roof done in one day. Cleanup was excellent, couldn't even tell they were there. Terry did excellent job getting me through the insurance process.

name: Allen J
text: Easy to work with it. Honest, quick, very good at communication. Highly recommend.

name: chris hidalgo
text: Well first of all, I gotta say I was impressed with these guys, they got the roof bought through insurance and put it on within a week. They worked fast and helped us out a lot.  Very surprised and grateful.   Thanks

name: Ashton Leigh
text: Wanted to leave this here for Mobile Roofing, they do really great work, they care about about their customers, and the community.

name: Judi Wheat
text:
Review summary – Awesome work from first visit through work completion and clean up.  A big thank you to Mobile Roofing, Robb Harrison and George Fell.
Two years ago, we had a major leak on our porch “fixed”.  Recently the leak returned.  After getting one bid, Mobile Roofing was recommended to my husband.  I called, spoke to Matt and that afternoon Robb came to talk to us.  He was professional and appeared knowledgeable.  Robb said we needed a completely new roof and suggested we have our insurance look at the roof before we spent (specific dollar amount).

George came out to meet with the insurance adjuster, spending most of an afternoon going over the roof on the house and other buildings on our property.  The insurance adjuster agreed we needed a new roof but unfortunately, just wear and no insurance claim.

Robb and George came back to talk to us.  After measuring and figuring what was needed to do our roof, Robb gave me a bid that was less than $100 from the dollar amount he had mentioned on his first visit.  That showed me he knew his business.

On Saturday morning the crew was here.  George was here supervising and running to get additional material as needed.  They worked hard and finished everything but the flat porch in one day.  When they left the yard, porch and drive was cleaner than it was when they arrived.  George and the part of the crew that was needed was back on Monday and finished the job.

Spending this amount of money did not come easy for us and I was nervous, especially since we had wasted money on the other fix.   Robb put me at easy the first time he was here.  He was easy to talk to, listened and answered all of our questions.

Our roof is beautiful, and I am sure it has added to the value of the house.  I can’t say enough good things about our experience.  Would give them 10 stars if possible.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, if there is anything else we can do for y’all, please let us know.  Thank you again and have a blessed day

name: Serena Hubbard
text: They were very professional and efficient and we are very pleased with the roof! Hard working crew and good clean up! Matt was very knowledgeable and professional. Overall a very good experience and would highly recommend to anyone needing a roof!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. I'm glad we were able to help

name: Jessica Enslen
text: We had a great experience with this company. They handled our insurance claim for us and completed our roof start to finish faster than I expected.

name: Lexy Mooney
text: Awesome service! We had two leaks that required tacking and replacing a vent. The price was low for the wonderful quality of work. We are planning to switch to a metal roof next time, and we will definitely be using this company!

name: Belinda Phillips
text: PROFESSIONAL....RESPECTFUL......COMPASSIONATE!! You might be thinking that these words don't make sense for a roofing review, but, my 90 year old father had been scammed by another company that took his insurance money, they had pulled the shingles off and left my dad with decking and synthetic underlayment. For all of June my dad had no roof and no contact from the other guy. (He did have 5 inches of rain) A friend referred Mobile Roofing and Construction, Terry came out and met with my dad, he treated him with respect and courtesy and gave him a more than fair bid to finish the roof. Within 1 week the roof was completed, Terry and his crew did everything they said they would, the roof completed to code and with better shingles than he had before!! I urge everyone to call these guys, your home will be in great hands!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, it was our pleasure to help

name: Justin Rosa
text: These guys are true experts. Matt came to my office building and showed me cost saving options I had no idea existed. I am absolutely satisfied and will reccomend to all of my associates. Thanks guys!

name: Mark Wilson
text: We have had many roofs put on in the past, and this is the 1st time ive ever been really impressed! They came out on time and brought 9 guys. They cleaned up great, put the roof on up to code. These guys are Good. Use them. !

name: Makayla Shea
text: Service was good. I called and terry was very helpful. He came out and let me know what was the problem with my roof.

name: Richard Wilson
text: We had just a small repair job which was performed on time and at a reasonable cost.

name: Xal3nth
text: I had a leaking vent pipe boot so I called Mobile Roofing & Construction. I dealt with Matt who made scheduling promises he either couldn't remember or was too busy to keep so I posted a review detailing my trials and tribulations. The review garnered the attention of one of the owners, Chris, who contacted me and discussed the issues we were having with our roof and scheduling. After the call Chris had gotten a crew over and replaced all of the vent boots quickly and professionally. Based on the quality of work I would definitely recommend this business but I would suggest dealing with Chris rather than Matt. I will be getting additional work done on my house by these guys in the future.

name: Christina Cooley
text: These are Professionals. Our roof had two layers that had to be stripped off to put on a new roof. Mobile Roofing did a wonderful job. They arrived exactly when they said they would. A supervisor was on site the entire time. In my experience with contractors this is rare. They did the roof in record time, quality work and quality product. Clean up was important to us. We assumed they would clean up without asking.  Not only did we not have to ask, they actually left the property cleaner then when they arrive. Picked up and hauled away old roofing material, magnitized twice, leaf blew the entire property, made sure not a scrap of anything was left behind. It was like they were never here except we were left with a a gorgeous new roof. Oh, and they paid great attention to protecting the landscape.

name: Anne Edwards
text: Mobile roofing was with us through every step of a complicated insurance process. We were thrilled to have our entire roof replaced in one day.

name: Shane Nevin
text: I have had no problems and  I  Wanted a one year inspection and they were on top of it Call them that  day and they were here that night great crew and staff I will always call on them

name: K Allen
text: Had a section of the roof on our house that was rotten and leaking. Matt and his team came and had to tear out 3 sections of plywood, put down a waterproof fabric and then the shingles. I was impressed that he knew what type shingle and color it was  by just looking at it, and was able to repair it in one afternoon. They also fixed a nail hole leak in the back of the house at no extra charge. It looks great and  we have had no more problems.

name: Celia Stork
text: The new roof look's great.The crew  did a good job cleaning up the debris and nails. They were polite, and worked hard to get my roof done in one day.  Had one little problem. name: jessy Wilson
text:
Need a new roof?! Don’t know who to call?? MOBILE ROOFING IS WHO YOU NEED TO CALL!

I called 07/15/2019 and spoke with Matt on 07/19/2019 he send his best guy Adam to give me an estimate on full roof replacement due to hail and wind damages! We filed a claim 07/19/2019! Matt was on it and took care of everything for us!

On 08/09/2019 we got the insurance approval!

They ordered the supplies and best of it I got to pick my color, every woman’s dream right?

Today 08/15/2019 the crew showed up and showed out! 7:00am-730pm and my roof is complete! The crew was very professional, friendly and diligent!

They picked up every mess and even used a magnet to pick up nails! Because, well who wants a flat tire after getting a new roof!

Thank you so much for everything!

#oncemobileroofing #alwaysmobileroofing

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. Hope y’all enjoy your new roof.

name: Lindamae Mattox
text: Terry Harrison headed up my job and was done including clean up in one day! In my job as insurance agent I am exposed to many horrors stories of the cheap unprofessionals out there.. If you want quality work  call this team in!

name: Lee Freeland
text: Excellent service for complete roof installation with full ridge vents. Completed in one day with high quality. Thanks Terry!

name: Ron Sander
text:
Yesterday Terry and a crew from Mobile Roofing finished working on my home. In addition to replacing older shingles, they replaced the drip strips, added a ridge vent, replaced some sheathing, and reinforced a couple of rafters. There were a couple of rain delays (no one wants it to rain on a roof with no shingles) but Terry kept me informed every step of the way (even taking time, on one occasion, to call me late in the evening). The crew started work on time and remained diligent throughout the two day work project. They cleaned up well and left my yard looking like it had before the project started.
I am pleased that I chose Mobile Roofing for this job. In the past I’ve used other roofers in this area but I’m very happy I went with this company.

name: Zhalar yn B'Dahd
text: Professional and friendly.  They were very patient waiting while we went through taking estimates from other companies.  They were also the ONLY company to tell us to claim hail damage to our roof.  Scheduled us and came ahead of schedule to complete the whole roof in one day.  We couldn't be happier!  The price was very reasonable and even though extra work was required after they got started (due to damage that was hidden under the shingles they had to remove), it was still within our budget.  They also gave us an excellent selection of roofing shingles to choose from for our product.

text: Matt Is very professional. And did an outstanding job 👍🏽

name: bryan cates
text: Matt and his "renowned" roofer Beau patched 2 spots on my roof a few months ago. $2400. The roof continues to leak in the attic where they did work. The plywood patch that they cut out was not completely fitted by the new piece and continues to allow water to come through.  There were 5 men on the job that day doing the work. They left a mess in my attic and outside. Damage has continued to occur inside and when I asked Matt if he would repair the damage from an ineffective first job his response was "I'll support it"? No call or follow up since. During the initial job, Beau boasted that he was a "renowned" roofer that had been written about in magazines. I guess this is the quality of he and Matt's work.

resp.text:
Sorry to hear this review, I explained that this roof had many leaks in many areas. Although we went back and fixed the other bad spots, I still suggest a screw exchange on the metal. I'm pretty sure the crew addressed all the problems on their return visit.  Please call me if any other problems occur. We are willing to work with you anyway we can.
Thanks
Matt

name: Fredrick James
text: Theese guys were amazing! Came out gave us a quote, and were back within a few days to complete my roof. Definatly looks so much better and didnt charge over what my quote was! Very happy with your services and would reccomend them to anyone! Thanks again !!

name: Christina Garner
text:
UPDATE: A week after I posted my initial review, Matt contacted me saying he saw my review and wanted to apologize. He knocked $100 off the original quote and said his team could do the job the very next day. I decided to go with another company anyway. I can’t speak to quality of work Matt and his team do, though I have only heard good things. I just hope they focus more on good, prompt customer service in the future, and then their reviews will take care of themselves.

ORIGINAL POST: I had some minor damage from Hurrican Nate, so I called and gave them my phone number and email and scheduled an appointment for an estimate. The guy who came out showed up 30 minutes late, but he did a quick inspection, entered info into his phone, and gave me a verbal estimate. He said he would follow up with his interior guy and send me an email so I could have the estimate in writing and so that he could get me a quote for the additional work of repairing some leak damage on the ceiling.

A week passed, and I still hadn’t received an email, so I called to request it again. I had to give them my email again, and I was told I’d get an email right away. Another few days passed, and I still hadn’t gotten an email. I called and had to give my email AGAIN. Later that day, I got a text (maybe they lost my email again) with a screenshot of a quote that was nearly double what I had been originally told. When I asked why it was so much higher and if it included the estimate for the interior repairs as well, I never got a response. Every time I called, they acted like they didn’t even know what I was talking about. It’s been over three weeks since I first called them, and it doesn’t seem like these guys communicate with each other.

I know it’s a busy season, especially with the storms and rain, but how hard can it be to contact a potential client? Or at least call and say that you can’t take the job right now so i’m not sitting here waiting. Not happy with the lack of service I received, and I’ll be going with another company who has their stuff together.

name: Jeff Williams
text: We replaced our roof in Nov 2019. Called several roof contractors but Cody was the only one that responded in a timely manner. He came out and inspected the roof, explained the options for the replacement, and provided an estimate. If you need a roof replacement or repairs this is the company to contact. Superior Roofing is a GAF Master Elite certified roofing contractor. They provided quality materials, removed the old roof, installed the new roof, cleaned up the area, and ensured the work was supervised throughout. This company (Superior Roofing) has over 30 years in the roofing business. You want quality work and people who care about their business then this is the company to select. Mr. Dykes was on site during the second installation date and ensured the roof work was completed correctly. The roof looks great and the quality of the installation is of high quality. I highly recommend the company. They have great reviews and their work matches their reviews. We also had some carpentry work completed (chimney repair and fascia board replacement) work completed. Once again their company provided quality work. The overall experience with Superior Roofing was outstanding. I will use them in the future for any roof work required and recommend them to others in need of roof repair or replacement.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Williams I greatly appreciate you taking the time to write this review! - Cody

name: Jonathan Bonham
text:
I was very pleased with Prime Roofing & Restoration throughout the whole process of replacing the roof on my house. They were very knowledgeable, helpful, and just a fantastic company to deal with. I would recommend them to anybody that is looking to have any type of roofing repairs done.

My roof was looking worn, and I knew I needed it replaced at some point. I had no idea how bad the shingles were on my roof until Bill Spencer with Prime Roofing explained to me that the shingles on my house were defective. I did some research on my own, and what he had told me was absolutely correct.

If it wasn't for Bill Spencer and Prime Roofing, I would be facing a lot more areas of my roof that would have been damaged as a result of the defective shingles. I am thankful that Bill came by when he did, so that we were able to get the required repairs that our home desperately needed.

text: Such a pleasant experience working with Bill Spencer of Prime Roofing & Restoration. I was having a LOT of trouble getting approval from my insurance company to cover the hail/windstorm damage. Bill and his crew worked 12 hours a day installing my roof on time. I had an Ins Endorsement for a Fortified Impact Resistant roof and Bill took extra measures to make sure the proper materials were ordered. Bill worked with the insurance inspector making sure each step of the install was to their strict guidelines for meeting their approval. I call Bill and his expert, hard working crew the SUPER ROOFERS! The most experienced and hardest working roofers you'll ever want installing your roof!

name: Robert Amaro
text: Absolutely amazing people. I'm a framer who has decided to roof their own shop. Show up for my materials and start chatting with the gentleman helping to load my trailer. Let him know I've not done this before and he spends about 30 minutes teaching me the ins and outs of metal roofing, while walking about the facility and showing me examples of how to trim. He notices I've missed some trim pieces that I could have purchased from them- then he tells me how to do a professional job without those exact pieces (talked me out of buying more product). Went in to buy the trim pieces, since I intend to not get a hard time from my wife, and find out the gal ringing me up was the guy's wife. Same story- spent extra time to make sure I got the correct sealant strip and she even put one of the two I had selected back, as I didn't need that quantity. Keep in mind, I spent less than $450. Drive the distance if you need to, this is the only place to buy metal roofing.

text: I had Pedro to build me a back screen porch, with a concrete floor. He did a great job and even save me some money. He will work with you and build exactly what you want. Me and my wife is enjoying our porch. Thanks again Pedro.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Tamara Lee
text: We commissioned Gallardo Roofing to work on several areas of our house exterior. We had them replace our gable vent, rotten portions of the fascia boards, shutters and even our complete roof. Our house looks completely different now and it is all thanks to them. All of the work that was done was done in a timely manner and done the right way. They were also honest about the materials used. In one instance we ordered more material than was needed so they refunded us the portion that wasn’t used. Pedro’s honesty, work ethic and expertise impressed us beyond belief. We would highly recommend them for any project around your house!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are happy to hear you were satisfied with our service.

name: JOSHUA HAYWOOD
text:
Recently had Mr. Gallardo install my roof, paint my house, repair my house siding and some minor interior repair. He was always punctual and professional, his work on my house really help to solidify the sale of my rental property.
I would and will in the future refer any one I know to Mr Gallardo for work that they may need done, thanks for all your hard work.

resp.text: Thank you. It was my pleasure

name: Debbie Little
text: The personnel w Gallardo Roofing are very professional and did an awesome job. They were on the job at 8am as scheduled. The work was done on time, looked great and they cleaned up everything before leaving. They also previously replaced the roof on our dock and replaced decking and facia board. I highly recommend this company.

resp.text: Thank you for the good review! It was a pleasure working for you.

name: Bryan Little
text: Pedro does quality work, is honest and is very dependable. I have hired him for a few different projects, including a new roof, and he has done a great job every time.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Elite Offroad And Performance
text: Great very professional service and on time would recommend to anyone!

name: Josh Balch
text: Came out and did a free roof inspection and helped me handle getting a new roof replacement very professional.

name: glen roberts
text:
These fine people came when they promised and did the work as agreed.
Many contractors don't treat us that way.
Thank You. Best Regards Glen Roberts

text: The Ivy League of Roofing Contractors

name: Karla Green
text:
He's a professional con artist scammer he uses people then tosses them like a piece of trash,he pays them like it's 1920, and I can say a whole lot more but I don't have time he needs a lot of prayer, I don't care if your baby starts if you starve if you have a home electricity or whatever as long as he's got what he wants and enough money to wine and dine his Party Pals that's the type of person he is he's all out for himself and he screws every one that he nos, he's screws people over and blames it on somebody else.
I first took up for him 2 or 3 times I said that nobody can be like that but I was so wrong she was way worse than I heard I can't stress enough don't anybody let him do your roof or any kind of work for you because if you do you'll be sorry

name: Dj Simmons
text: Thank you van for setting me strait. I'll be there Thursday to get my check. I hope my insite helps.

text: Don't know!

name: Dr.David Callaway
text: The worse roofers around. They take weeks to complete. The owner has Alot,Alot,of anger issues. They Will steal what ever is not bolted down. This is one of the fly by night places. Don't  use.Next will be the BBB complaint. (Not a honest place).

name: Jasmine Nicole
text: UNPROFESSIONAL AF. Was suppose to come out and give an estimate but NEVER showed. No call/text No nothing!

name: Chris Myers
text: Replaced roof for us a few years ago. No problems with it since except for a small amount of storm damage which they were happy to come repair for us. They came in under budget and got finished faster than we were quoted. Highly recommend!

name: Felicia Perry
text: Professional service.  Excellent service.

name: William McHenry
text: Mr. Moore and his crew roofed two houses for me. They did everything in a very professional way and cleaned up far more than I anticipated. He roofed each house in a days time. I recommend him all the time.

name: Scott Young
text: DEFINITELY RECOMMEND  APEX Restoration for any and all mitigation needs. Colby and the DKI water mitigation team did an outstanding job from start to finish.  I can't say enough about their professionalism, courtesy, care and concern for our home.  We had significant water damage from a attic mounted Air Conditioner.  The came in assessed the damage a provided us with not only a estimate but walked us through the process. They worked diligently to get our home restored as quick as possible, despite the fact that the temperature in the house was over 100 degrees.  Glad to have professionals of this caliber on our side in our time of need.

name: Richard Weaver
text: Colby and the DKI water mitigation team were rockstars!!!! They were Johnny on the spot when the city sewer backed up into our house. Very professional, very courteous, and they were very thorough. The fact that they are good at what they do is a bonus as well. Glad to have professionals on your side in your time of need. 10/10 would use again. Don’t want to HAVE to use them again, but should the need arise, they’ll be my go to.

name: Lisa Grupe
text: After Hurricane Sally damaged my new condo, DKI Apex Huntsville (Colby Swaim) was assigned to do the mitigation. Mr. Swaim was knowledgeable, personable, thorough, attentive to detail, and empathetic. He answered my questions in person, via text, on the phone, and via email. He always did what he said he would do, and he went above and beyond by sending me photos when I couldn't be present and by working with me on saving some custom cabinetry.  In a time of stress, his calm presence was very beneficial. Other condo owners expressed similar satisfaction with how neat and clean this firm was in the mold removal and water damage cleanup.  Thanks Apex DKI Huntsville!

name: Dee Dee Bond
text:
My Kitchen caught a fire in Oct. Apex did a great
Job in cleaning things up. They have 2 employees that are great works. Their kind ,organized , very hard workers. Mike and Zack are the nicest young men. Can’t find people like that these days.

name: mike smith
text: Like the others have said....if I could give a zero I would.  I have no idea why my insurance company uses Apex, other than they must be low cost.  I'm not going to waste any more of my life on these guys writing a review, but since I use google reviews I will tell you don't, just don't

name: Cameron Galbreath
text: Do not use this company. They cut corners and just want checks signed whether it's done correctly or not. There was a problem (that I personally noticed and pointed out and it was never brought to my attention by the contractor). It could have been easily fixed during the repair process but was not addressed and work that was completed now has to be undone to fix this. In addition, they have acted like this is a total inconvenience for them when they failed to notice the issue (or ignored it) in the first place. Use any other company but this one. They billed for several services they did not provide  It took over 3 weeks for anyone to even come out and evaluate/fix the issue after it was pointed out to them (they already had all of their large checks signed at this point).  And their "fix"was more like a bandaid and try and tell my wife there wont be any issues with it. Slow response times. Poor customer service. Their "customer service" team that is supposed to regular check in with you called 1 time at the beginning of the job and never heard from them again. This job was a 2-3 week job and is now on month 3. If you want repairs done timely and properly look elsewhere.

name: Amber Rausch
text: Let me start at the start of my process. I explain to them what the job was going to intel. But yet for some reason they were not listening. It took them five time coming out to my home to understand the full detail of what needed to be done. They put my repairs on the back burner as long as possible, stating that they would start this day but when it came to that day their employees were at another job. When they did come out, I was told that x y and z would be complete that day by the project manager, will only x was explained to the crew that came out and they were tasked with other jobs so they could not finish when I asked why they were not completing that days work. I was never provided samples and they wanted to charge me more for what I wanted because I had to go out and look for my own flooring, never provide with vanity or tub style before they installed them, and they claimed they did more work to the insurance company then the actual done, I fired them and finished the job for them.

name: Chest Rockwell
text:
Absolutely horrible experience with a small restoration. My insurance company recommended this company, and I'm not sure why. They are incredibly disorganized and communicate even worse. They show up when they aren't scheduled and don't show up when they are scheduled. In one case the workers just didn't show up and the PM didn't realize it until the next morning!! Too many issues to list. TERRIBLE project management and I would NEVER pay them on my own. I'm firing my insurance company (USAA) over this debacle.

Please find another restoration company if your insurance provider recommends these people, then find another insurance provider.

resp.text: Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. Please get in touch with me so I can learn more about the problem and so I can address it. I promise you, this is NOT how we do business at Apex. My personal cell is 931-434-4706. Thank you, Michelle Keller, Customer Care

name: Christina Williams
text: I worked for them for two months. They never got materials on time. They jack the work order up to make more money for themselves. Their project managers were sloppy and smelled like old onions first thing in the morning. They tried to fire us but we quit before they had a chance. How can you work for someone when you know more than the so called managers? Before you hire those guys, you'll come out better doing it yourself! If have USAA insurance,  they prey on you. Go small if you want it done right. They don't do background checks, so you might have a murderer in your home. STAY AWAY FROM APEX! DKI!

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Tyler Jackson
text: Fired Apex DKI today.  My insurance company and I caught them in lies so that their slow movement towards ordering materials wouldn't look as bad.  They have known of my job since February 20th, and have been paid since February.  They started work the last week of APRIL.  Their contractors are poor communicators and likely to misinterpret instructions.  We were stood up by contractors twice in 5 days.  I fired Apex DKI today.  This has been the worst experience that I've ever had with any company.  So bad that I'm going to change homeowners just because they recommended Apex.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Randy Little
text: So far so good, I pray now when the work begins on restoring my house they continue to do as good a job as they have done getting everything in place contract wise!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Randy Little. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Apex Restoration DKI - Huntsville

name: Kevin Breuers
text: Cant give a zero, but would if I could.  Not very organized.  Recommending to Insurance Company to not use this organization.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: TR
text:
APEX started our bathroom in May 2016. They said they would be done i n 7 to 10 days. As of July 20th they still had not finished. We had a vacation planned and upon our return, the unprofessional work ethic and attitude continued so we fired them.
The problems:
They have installed the tile flooring incorrectly, it is very uneven, has to be removed and replaced. The tile was uneven, grout lines not the same and tile was crooked. They chipped floor tile trying to fix the mistakes they made.
They rebuilt the shower walls but made the shower to large. The cabinets now do fit in place. The shower walls have to removed as does the mud bed for the shower.
The tile work they did on the shower had to removed because they had a 1 inch bow i n the wall. The bow in the wall was due to APEX's contractors putting inch of thin set or mortar behind the tile, inch thick!
The floor pan was not sealed or glued correctly. This was pointed out to me two other contractors who have given us bids.
APEX also did not install the left counter properly so they cut the stone back splash and side splash to try to make it fit. They cut the back splash uneven.
They broke fixtures in the bathroom.
I had to make them put insulation back in the walls.
Apex did paint behind the counters in the bathroom.
Apex contractors would show up and work for a couple of hours and then leave to g to another job. At times they didn't even show up.
I was told not to worry about the job in progress but the end result. If your foundation on the job is not right the finished product will be junk!
APEX would lie to us about job finish date. They would tell us we will be done by this Friday, but the tile had not been ordered or was not going to in till the next week.
The contractors would sit out back and smoke under my Gazebo! One of the guys had his girl friend hanging out all day. They did fire him after I brought this up.
I had to tell them to not smoke under my Gazebo, don't put your stuff on my grill, do not smoke on my porch, do not turn on my outside fans and for them to clean up after themselves.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Meghan Burns
text: Horrible, horrible!!! Do terrible work, and tell you they will be there at a time, then not there.. and no contact.

name: soule64
text: First off, a 1-star rating is too good for this company. Apex was referred to me by USAA for a water damage insurance claim that occurred in early December, and they just now finished. This was not a huge project - about 8 sheets of drywall and 2 doors, and I elected to paint, yet it still took nearly 4 months to complete. The drywall work was so bad that it took me an entire weekend to prepare it for paint. Debris was dumped in my trash can despite them billing for removal. I voiced my concerns with a quality manager, but heard nothing else after. Communication with Apex was frustratingly bad. Calls to project managers would go to voicemail and would not be returned. Weeks went by without updates despite my numerous calls and texts. I don't know how these guys are still in business, but I do plan on voicing my concerns with USAA to at least get them off their recommenced list so this never happens to another veteran.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: DelAnn Sundwall
text: These young men were very friendly. The problems were, they didn’t return very often (nor when they said they would come) to check on the progress of drying out our home, we had to change positions of fans because they would not returning for long periods of time. Apex was careless in how they performed their work, the equipment was running so long (unchecked) that it killed a large section of our grass. We finally had to move around the equipment in the yard to keep from killing more grass. They finally picked up all there equipment 30 days later.  After job completed we had a heating and air person check in crawl space, only to find Apex left some duct work torn. We are insured through USAA AND ALL THIS HAS BEEN FILED WITH THEM. I PLEADED WITH USAA TO NOT USE APEX FOR FUTURE WORK.  I hope this helps anyone in search of a restoration company.

name: Krystina Teal
text: I would give zero stars if I could. This company is so unorganized and couldnt keep anything straight. I gave them our information multiple times and they could never keep it straight. After aeveral attempts to talk to the person they sent out to look at our roof, I decided to go with somosom else .

resp.text:
Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue, Krystina Teal. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. Please get in touch with us on (256) 883-6000 and we'd be happy to help you out.

Cheers,

Apex Restoration DKI - Huntsville

name: Kimberly Flynn
text: Great experience working with APEX. Would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We strive to have all of our customers feel this way about us. Please let me know if there is anything that we can do for you in the future.

text: Few workers. Only worked couple days a week. Caused extra expense on other contractors. Expected job finally completed within a couple of months. Insurance discrepancies during particular job.

name: Renita Knight
text: They called back and promised to complete an estimate.  We will see how they work out.

name: Neil Howe
text: Great work guys! Your crew does a great job. Very polite and communicated well. Also, did a great job cleaning up. Thanks!

name: Joe Sturtevant
text: Very high quality roofing company.  Best in town!  Don't even bother looking for a different roofer. Awesome work and super professional.

name: Eric Gender
text: I had a very good experience, they helped me with a better price than I thought was possible. 5+ stars

name: Richard H. Clark
text: They've done 4 roofs for me 3 shingle 1 tin ,1 complete rebuild on a 150 year old stucture .numerous repair jobs.great work best price .get it done right and save $$$

name: Randel Whitt
text: Quality work at a fair price!!! We have almost 7000 roof repairs and roof replacements since 2002. Our top goal is customer satisfaction.

name: Rod Lyons
text: Budget roofing done my roof in 2016 . They done a good job and nice price. They are now my go to people for roofs , vinyl siding, facial boards or anything dealing with a house. Give them a call and u want be disappointed.

name: Megan Carter
text: Would absolutely NEVER recommend this company. Our roof has been leaking every time it rains for a year after they supposedly fixed the problem a year and a half ago. They have made appointments and they have been a no show 5 times. 5! They finally came last week and supposedly fixed the problem. We made it through one rain storm before it started leaking again. They, of course, were a no show, again, after that when they were supposed to come reevaluate. Frustrated is an understatement.

name: Carol Ellison
text: Amazing roof,respectful team,on time,great price and would recommend to all😁🤗

name: Felisha Wynn
text: They did an excellent job on the roof but the clean up was non existent. Roofing nails were all over my property. My son stepped on one and I found one in my flat tire. I'm afraid that my Grandbaby might step on one after swimming in the pool. I called them to come back and clean up. I'm still waiting!

name: Amanda Hutchens
text: Budget Roofing saved my butt. I had severe damage after some storms, I could see the sky from my couch. I called after hours and the owner came out after 8pm (during the storm) and dried in my roof until the rain stopped. The very next day he quoted me a very fair price and had a crew there that day. They finished and you could never tell any damage was done, and on top of that, the owner was a great guy and worked with me the best he could on the pricing. All businesses get busy during storms and may miss a call or have to deal with customers that are not happy with anything, but I do have to say I feel they went above and beyond for me. I will call them with any further work I need done on my roof!!! Thanks Budget Roofing.

name: Heather Marie
text: We have called them every day about repairs that were already scheduled to be completed. They will schedule, not show up and then ignore phone calls for days. Very unprofessional and not reliable. Don't waste your money or time. It may be the cheapest quote but you will get cheap work and workers that do not show.

name: David Neely
text: I had alot of hail damage and several leaks and they came and replaced my roof and solved my problems. They did a great job at a great price and wouldn't use anyone else for my roofing needs!I will definitely refer them to anyone I know!Thanks Randall Whitt and Budget Roofing!

name: S
text: Budget Roofing, called me back, showed up and gave me a quote within a few hours, and had the work done in less than 24 hours (on a weekend no less). Pricing was good. Budget Roofing is a contractor that does what they say, does it on time, and does it on budget! I would totally recommend them for roofing work.

name: Wayne Nechy
text: I called Bugdet Roofing after the storms on April 3. My grandmother had 3 holes on our roof with water coming in, tbrough my drywall cieling. i am disabled as she is elderly and live alone. I called Budget Roofing, the owner himself came out , Mr. Randel Whitt. He had a generator and hit my power going so all my food didnt spoil. he then went on the roof and  stopped  the holes,  covered and stopped the leaks. the next day he had a crew out there and had all the problems fixed completley. i haven't had a problem since. He came back to check on me a few days later, very nice man. i would highly recommend this company to anyone who needs anything done as far as roofing and repairs.

name: Jane Dough
text: Really nice people ,they've done 2 roofs for me no problems what so ever,and great prices

name: Jeff Knight
text: Did a great job fixing with other contractor had messed up.  Great price and Great work!

name: kenneth Oliver
text: I was refered to budget roofing and at the moment my roof is leaking and with the storms on there way he came and covered the spot for FREE!! And a Free quote tomorrow. They got my business!

name: Kristin Posey
text: We tried for days to get in touch with them. After three days, they finally called us back and set up a time for a roofer to come out and give us an estimate. No one ever showed up and no one answered. I am flabbergasted by the fact that anyone runs their business this way. If this is how they handle this side of their business, I can only image how the roofing side is handled.

name: Audie Craig
text: Signed a contract and then never showed up!! Voicemail is full so you can’t leave a message. Had to track down another company!!!

name: JOE ROBERTS
text: Terrible!!!  Could not fix leak, roof rotted.  Had to hire another roofer to replace rotten roof plywood and shingles. Worst contractor that I have ever used.  Budget installed the roof originally.

name: Masao Williams
text: 5+ star rating for Storm hunters roofing, on time very professional and good price to do my roof.

name: Branson Yost
text: Super service and on time!!!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Greg Robinson
text:
I worked with Cole Jones in getting a quote for our roof.  Cole was responsive, on time, and thorough with his appointment, inspection and sitting down with us about the condition of the roof and options for a roof replacement.

Sandy followed up with scheduling the roof replacement and all the paperwork which was in fantastic order.

Blair showed up on the job, arranged for good weather (just kidding) and did what they said they would do when they said they would do.

The knowledge, expertise and quality was evident at the end and we are very satisfied with our roof.  It has been four months and not a single leak and they also replaced our gutters.

It was a pleasure working with them.

name: Ian Thomas
text:
We had a great experience with Blair. I did my homework and got quotes from 5 other companies, but Blair blew us away with their authenticity, local roots and competitive pricing. After getting a lot of quotes, it was clear that at our price point, all the windows were essentially the same quality with the same bells and whistles; it was the install that would really make or break the project.

I was confident that our windows would be installed correctly and if any issues were to come up, that Blair would resolve them. The install went smoothly, a little over a month after buying. We had metal windows and the guys took the time to cut them out by hand and ensure our new windows went in seamlessly. Instead of just throwing up wood surrounds, they capped the windows with custom aluminum before sealing it all up.

From beginning to end, Craig Blair was very patient in walking through everything with us and ensuring we were informed and comfortable. I feel very confident in being able to receive service if anything goes wrong in the future. I highly recommend Blair.

resp.text: Thanks Ian. Our pleasure.

name: J Baker
text: I contacted Blair Exteriors to replace the roof on my home.  I was terribly disappointed.  They almost destroyed our beautiful scrubs, which had been growing for 15 years, by throwing the old shingles off the roof onto our scrubs.  It will take years to get them back to form.  Instead of having brackets for their ladders they placed their ladders against our gutters scrapping the paint and bending the gutters.  On top of that I noticed the workers standing on the gutters.  I reported this to Dan Aycock, the Blair representative, and when he finally came by the house all he talked about was how he was going to do something about this in the future.  They had the highest quote, but I wanted to support a local business and felt I would get a better job.  I hate that I am writing this, but others should be aware.  J K Baker

resp.text: Hey Mr Baker, I spoke with Dan and the installation crew about the issues you experienced. I want to first thank you for your business and apologize for the issues. This is not the experience we want to leave any customer  with. I believe our office staff has already reached out to you but if you need anything please reach back out to us. Reviews like this help us see where to improve. Thanks

name: Kelly Horwitz
text: In an age when everyone seems to have a bad story about finding a contractor, Blair Exteriors is a breath of fresh air.  We needed a new roof - a project I was dreading. Blair made it easy and efficient. They are the consummate professionals. They arrived on time and worked until the sun set to get our roof on in a single day. Then they returned the next day to make sure everything was fully cleaned up. Make them your first call when you need work done on your house!

name: Brandon Thompson
text: Blair replaced my roof last year and had an issue a year later that was not their fault but they were quick to help get it resolved. Great company and great staff. Russel was very helpful.

name: Hillary Cherry
text:
The salesperson contacted me and set up my appointment.  When he called the day of my appointment he stated he lived in Hueytown and did not want to travel an hour across town nor he did he want to drive an hour an half back home.  He then gave me an out of this world number and when I told him we received quotes much lower he said go with them.  How rude! For a company to have 4.8 stars out of 5 one would expect better customer service.

11/1/19:  I am upgrading my review to 3 stars.  I was contacted by the Director of Marketing at Blair Exteriors and he was very apologetic about my situation.  My husband and I would like to personally thank you and your team for reaching out to us and taking care of this situation.  This shows your commitment to providing excellent customer service.  We will definitely reconsider using your services in the future.  Again, thank you.

resp.text: We would be happy to work with you on a future project. Thank you for taking our call and letting us make it right!

name: David Counts
text:
Sales:  Jay was most informative.  Shared many options with us and respected our budget limitations.  He was never "pushy". Was able to find some affordable customization opportunities for us also.  He kept in touch throughout the process, not just after the sale was made.

Financing:  Jay also shared some financing options that were most helpuf.

Products;  We purchased new windows, siding for the entire home, gutters, and chimney caps. Everything looks great.  With the new windows and the additional insulation wrap that come with the siding, our electric bill has already shown an improvement (even with all the 90+ days we have had).

Workcrews:  Russell, the project manager kept us up to date for the times the different crews (one for the windows and siding, one for the gutters, and one for the chimney caps) would come by and kept us up-to-date with the progress of each crew.  The work was accomplished much faster than we anticipated.  The crews were professional,well versed in their craft, unfailingly polite, and were very careful to check with us for anything out of the ordinary before proceeding.  They answered any questions that we had and they were also very careful with their clean up everyday.

Bottom Line:  I would recommend Blair and commend them for their excellent service.

name: Nancy Prater
text: Love my beautiful new roof!  All my neighbors are talking about the efficiency of the crew.  They can't believe it was a one day project.  Everyone arrived on time and worked safely. Excellent support staff in the office setting up the installation date and selecting the matching shingles!

resp.text: Thank you! We have some of the best crews! Your roof looks amazing!

name: Brandon Parker
text: We were really pleased with the quality and professionalism of Blair Exteriors. Our roof looks really great and the crew was very polite. Thanks for doing such a stand up job!

resp.text: We strive to provide every customer with exceptional customer service.

name: Sarah Shelton
text: I have used Blair Remodeling for three projects. I have used them to remodel a shower, seal the shingles on my house and to finish an existing shed. The work looks incredible. The best part about this company was that when we gave them a budget they were able to come up with a way to do the work within budget. We will hire Blair for any future projects we have. We would highly recommend this company to anyone.

name: David Shepherd
text: We chose Blair to replace 29 wood windows with very nice modern vinyl windows - low e gas, double hung, reflective coating, etc. The sales team was patient, knowledgeable, respectful, and above all honest. The pricing was a very fair value for what we purchased. The installers were great to work with. Courteous, professional, & thorough. They took their time to do it right the first time and were focused on the job before them NOT trying to get to the next job! The exterior trim work was exceptional. Everything the salesman told me would be done was completed by the installers without me having to bird dog them to do it. Very happy we chose Blair.

resp.text: We are thrilled that you are excited about how your window project turned out! Thank you for sharing your experience.

name: Elizabeth Williams
text: Blair Remodeling did a great job restoring my house. My house was built in 1952 so it was very important to me to preserve the old world charm of the house. Blair Remodeling replaced wood siding with James Hardie plank siding. They were able to match and install new windows that are identical to those that were original to the house. They also replaced the roof. All of this was done without jeopardizing the character of the house and preserving the integrity of the structure. I will definitely use them again for future remodeling projects.

text: Blair put on a new roof on our house after we discovered hail damage.  They were a pleasure to work with through the entire process.  They helped us pick out a new color and helped us decide on the GAF golden pledge warranty.  The roof installation crew took time to answer my questions and did a great job.  They were courteous and cleaned up after themselves.   The new roof looks great and I am glad I went with the color change.  They were a little slow getting to my last post installation punch list item but my overall experience with Blair was positive and they did what they said they would do and did a top quality job.  I would use them again and highly recommend them.

resp.text: We are delighted that you had a great experience!

name: TriceUA
text: I had previously wrote a review stating issues I had with the windows I had purchased from Blair due to leaking problems and would like to revise my previous review. The leak issue was finally fixed from another contractor and the windows that Blair installed for me were never the issue. They actually remained in excellent condition! My contractor said it was amazing that the windows weren't damaged at all because of the leak; which was due to poor trim and frame installation of Signature Homes. The quality and craftmanship of Blair Windows is top notch and I recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: I want to thank you for the newest review of Blair. We will always be there to help our customers. Thank you for being a Blair customer.

text: Superior sales staff. Excellent installers. Wonderful office staff. You will not regret working with these people.

text: Can't say enough about the team at Blair.  They are without a doubt the most professional craftsmen around.  From start to finish the job was extremely smooth.  They show up when they say they will and the new windows we had installed are worth every penny and look fantastic.  Extremely happy with the results and I highly recommend Billy and his team!!

name: James Wilson
text:
Blair Remodeling replaced 26 of my old wooden double hung windows with Wincore vinyl windows.  I first met with Craig Blair on April.  He gave me a quote that same day.  He was very patient and was definitely not in a hurry to leave, even though it was late in the day.  He answered all of my questions.  After I thought about it for a while he came back another afternoon to answer more questions and show the demo window unit to my wife.  Again, very patient and in no hurry to be anywhere.

Made down payment in April.  He said they would install in early June.  That is exactly what happened.  The install took only three days.  They started on a Wednesday and finished on a Friday.  The install crew consisted of three guys.  They were extremely polite and cleaned up their mess each day.

There was only one major issue.  There were streaks and smudges on every window.  It looked like some kind of sealant that was not cleaned off during the manufacturing process.  I met with the lead installer on Friday morning and pointed this out to him and asked that he clean the windows.  He was very condescending and obviously did not want to clean the windows.  He said he would but I knew he would not.  I went back to work (my wife was home but said she would not enforce the window cleaning)

The project was finished when I got home Friday afternoon.  The windows looked great but . . . You guessed it.  There were still streaks and smudges on all the windows.  Not wanting to be a pain, I tried cleaning the windows myself.  The sealant was very difficult to remove.  It would not come off with glass cleaner alone.  I decided this should definitely be Blair’s responsibility.

I asked for a meeting with Criag Blair.  We met the following week.  He was very polite and patient.  He agreed to have the windows cleaned and address a few other minor issues.

It took a while, and to be fair, I was out of town for a week but we finally coordinated on having the windows cleaned.  The crew that did the installation came back out.  They came while I was at work.  My wife was home but declined to be the inspector.  They finished cleaning about 3 PM.  They waited for me to get home at 4:30.  We walked around and inspected all 26 windows.  There were a few touch ups but for the most part they did a good job.

In summary, I was very pleased and satisfied with the entire process.  I will definitely use Blair Remodeling in for any future projects.  Craig Blair is the best.  I totally trust him and I know that he will do whatever is necessary to make sure I am satisfied.  Hopefully, Blair will add cleaning the windows to their standard installation procedure.

resp.text: Thanks James!

name: Ed Guui
text: Blair Remodeling did an excellent job replacing the roof on one of my commercial properties. The job was very professionally done in a speedy manner.  The crew cleaned up the area as if they were never there.  The contract explicitly stated some shrubs or plants may be damaged due to the nature of the work. The building is surrounded with ornamental shrubs and trees. They took extra care to make sure nothing was damaged.  The job, the quality of the material, the speed the work was completed and the value for my money makes me happy to recommend Blair Remodeling. In fact, shortly after my job was completed, I had the opportunity to suggest to a friend to work with them on his remodeling project. He picked them and I followed up with him a couple weeks later to find he too had the same outstanding results.  I highly recommend Blair Remolding.

Four-five days later I write and ask "where you at?" so he says that he had "other appointments to take care of after I cancelled."  I CANCELLED??  It RAINED.  Ok, says he's coming out again... 10 AM.  At 4:30 he finally gets around to emailing me and says that he's "running behind" and not going to make it.  So giving the benefit of the doubt I allow him to reschedule yet AGAIN for Monday 3/12, again at 10 AM.  No show, no email, no call.  I don't care if he would do the job for $1,000 less than anyone else, I'd never use Blair for anything including roofing my dog kennel.

From the time the gentleman arrived I noticed he was very insightful and explained in detail about what he was about to do for inspection purposes.. He also went into detail about the possible insurance claim if the damage was sufficient enough and how that would all work out.. I also discovered that they are more than able to get most insurance companies to cover homes that need new roofs.. No out of pocket expenses for a new roof is unbeatable in my opinion. So if you or anyone you know is looking for a free quote and good company to back up the work then give them a call.. We've had so many roofers stop by home or call me about my roof needing to be replaced. Not all were too nice to deal with, but the customer setvser rep I spoke to  from Blue Angels Roofing, were very courteous and respectful and most importantly, respectful to my time and not pushy at all. The contractors were honest to work with from beginning to the end.  When I have had questions, they responded to my calls almost immediately and took their time to make sure I was comfortable with each step from the quote to the finished roof. They ensured the job was done not only to my satisfaction, but both to the quality that Blue Angels Roofing demands. I'm very happy and pleased I went with this company and my roof is an eye catcger when you turn the corner of my street.  I will enjoy my new roof for years to come. This company has a hard working, and dedication team. I'm very thankful for them giving me as a new homeowner, a wonderful experience.

I know, since my aunt lives in Alabama, she can be a little safer. Especially knowing how hard it is to get a Roofing company out to a home when those hard winds start blowing, and storms start to brew, I know all this because I work for a restoration company in Arizona.

I can definitely vouch for Blue Angels Roofing for their prompt timing during the emergency, in knowing there were more storms on the way in the next day or two, so they knew not to fix it right away. text: It took a few days to come out for the job but I later understood why. They must be in high demand due to their impeccable work and customer service! A few bricks from another area of the facade came off after repair and installation. They came and repaired it a couple of days later without a call having to be made. Our family will recommend and definitely use Isbell again for any home repairs!

name: Jason Polancich
text: Another example of an unreliable local Tuscaloosa home improvement company. Had them out week before Thanksgiving for a quote to replace/repair gutters on a historic home in downtown Tuscaloosa. Was told Id have a quote out by the next week and they'd be able to start within a couple weeks. Two weeks went by and no quote. I called them, was transferred to a rep named Mike "who handles all the gutters." He told me he'd follow back up with me by the afternoon. Now, first week of January, called back and got mike who said "We're not going to be able to help you on that job." Im guessing it was too low a cost threshold for them, but it would have been very nice to have known that back in November. Great people. Don't advertise gutter repair/replacement if you dont actually do the work!

They replaced some soffits, fascia and gutters after tree fell and damaged house. i was quite pleased with their work and their price. Their workers were courteous and knowledgeable of what they were doing. They got in and made  repairs quickly.  They are in demand so you may need to wait a week or two until they can get to you, but for the quality and price it is worth being a little patient. I will definitely call them again should the need arise. I do recommend them if you need their services.

I had Isbell Insulation come out again this week and add a board and batten siding product to part of the front of my house. Frank and Jeff came in the morning and work was completed by lunch time. I could have not been more pleased with their quality of work and professionalism. These technicians really take a lot of pride in their work and it shows. This product has about half inch insulation rigid backing that makes it more solid. Looks like actual wood when driving up to the house. It matches other wooden board and batten we have on front of our house. I was tired of painting and replacing weather worn boards. We ordered color that matches the paint we have on the house. No more on ladder for me on this particular wall of the house. Once again i do recommend Isbell. Really nice technicians that do a great job. As other time price i believe was real reasonable.

name: Judy Myers
text:
I recommended James Monroe of Monroe Roofing, to a friend to replace two skylights. James accepted the job and went to Columbus, GA this morning to pick them up in the horrible fog, came back and started the job. The shingles he had were not a perfect match to those already on the roof, so he went to town to try to find the exact match. Unfortunately, he couldn't find them locally, but did find that he could get them in Columbus, GA. James drove back over to Columbus, got the exact shingles needed, came back and finished up the job. It was absolutely PERFECT. Not only that, he noticed that the gutters had leaves in them and cleaned them out while he was up on the roof.  All of this, and his price did not increase from the quoted price.  That is amazing.

Needless to say, I HIGHLY recommend Monroe's Roofing, LLC and James Monroe. Please call him for any of your roofing needs. He WILL do you RIGHT!!! Thank you, James Monroe.

resp.text: Thank you Judy!

Out of the many roofers I have attempted to contact over the last 5 years, 2nd 2 none has been the only consistent, responsive, and efficient crew I have run across. When I have had companies outright ignore multiple voicemails and emails this means the world to me! It certainly doesn’t hurt that his prices are EXTREMELY competitive. And his schedule is within weeks instead of “oh, when we can get to it”. If you have roofing issues this should be your number one call!

Bryan

name: Gracie Elliott
text: Couldn't be happier. I'm selling my house, and buyers wanted a lot of minor repairs on the roof before moving forward with the purchase. Stressed out, I reached out to tons of roofers, many who didn't have time for me unless I was buying a whole new roof. Not the case with 2nd2None Roofing & Construction. Bryan contacted me right away and spoke to me on the phone about what I needed done. The same day he was at my property, evaluating the situation in person, walked me through his assessment and recommendation and he was able to bring a crew out within two days and get the work done. He was straight-forward, courteous, professional, and communicative throughout the process. And, the price was definitely fair. I owe Bryan, family and the crew a huge debt of gratitude for the outstanding service, especially in such a short time frame. Not to sound cheesy or anything, but it's great when a family-owned business treats customers like family. That's how it felt. I am so looking forward to giving them my highest recommendation to any friends and family in need of roofing services.

resp.text: We are happy to see you feel this way, and thank you for your business and recommendations! Bryan
