name: Jo Huffines
text: The day the third insurance inspector came to my home, Bryan, the owner met with him and he was able to explain why my roof needed to be replaced.It had been a battle up to that point. It took only 2 days for removal and installation of my new roof which is amazing because mine is very high pitch. Each day they cleaned up their debris (shingles, nails, etc..) and when the dumpster they used leaked hydraulic fluid onto my driveway, they pressure washed the spot. His crew even replaced a board on the side of my home that had a rotten spot. I cant tell you how pleased I am with the aesthetics of my new roof, not to mention how structurally sound it is. 2nd to None had the highest warranty (7 years) of all the companies I was considering which was also a deciding factor for me . Most only have a 5 years warranty and one had only 2 years. When a company can stand behind their workmanship, they deserve my business. Bryan also worked closely with me to make sure I had the right type of shingle (color, functionality). He also imparted valuable advice regarding which shingle manufactures are honoring their warranties. Also..it needs to be mentioned that before they installed the new roof, I had a portion of my old roof tarped but the wind blew it off. Of course heavy rains came and water was leaking in several spots on my roof and into my master bathroom/closet. It was raining and lightening when his crew got on my roof to retarp/stop the leakage. That was also a deciding point for me that I would be using his company for my new roof. I can tell you most companies would not have done that. Also Bryan worked diligently with my Allstate adjuster explaining the cost of the roof which they had initially underestimated. I highly recommend 2nd to None and I have been telling my coworkers/friends about his company as well.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your business and this wonderful review!!!
Bryan

name: Mack Haynes
text:
I couldn't have been happier with having 2nd2None Roofing and Construction do the inspection and roof/chimney repair work for my new home.  My realtors contacted Bryan Schram to do a detailed roof and chimney inspection for a home we put an offer on and eventually closed thereon.  We were fortunate that our realtors found a company in 2nd2None that could do both roof and chimney inspections.  I can't speak to the level of expertise of Yellow Roofing (the company the previous owner had do a second opinion and said the roof was fine); but I can tell you that I saw with my own eyes that the roof was in bad shape as noted by Bryan; and was very appreciative that 2nd2None Roofing was able to do the inspection on short notice as well schedule and complete the work so quickly after requesting the work to be done.

I called Bryan Thursday Dec 31st after closing and he was able to schedule a crew to come Wed Jan 6, 2020 and repair the chimney as well as replace the roof.  They brought in extra people and were able to get all the work done in one day because they knew it was going to rain today.

I am so thankful that they could do both roofing and chimney inspections as well as repairs.  If you need inspections and roof/chimney repair work, I would recommend using 2nd2None Roofing and Construction.

Mack
New Huntsville resident and homeowner

text: Patched my roof in September 2018. Started having a leak problem March this year. Called on April 2 was told he’d send someone out that day or next day no one ever showed up!! My husband is a disabled Veteran so he wanted me to request our money back so I did and Bryan has ignored our request. I also wanted to say he was very rude to me when I called on April 2 he proceeded to tell me after they came out I was never to call him again and that that whole side needed replaced. We were doing what we could afford! He has disrespected my disabled Veteran husband by not refunded our money or trying to fix it as leak was coming from his patch work.

You instructed us only to repair because of your budget. It obviously stopped the leaks for 7 months. I’m not responsible every time your roof leaks. name: S K
text:
Had a "roof inspector" check the roof in July after discovering mold from a continued leak the previous homeowners covered up. He found weak spots around the windows of two bedrooms and the area over the living room. In addition, chimney cap/cricket needed to be replaced. He quoted me $800 to which I agreed--though I'm a senior and disabled. He said they would have to "fit me in between larger jobs" over the next two weeks, but as of the second week in Oct., I hadn't heard from them and any rainfall meant water dripping in my living room. I finally got someone out here yesterday from SEC, but instead of fixing the roof, I was informed that the repair would now cost me $1500 (or more, depending on what else they found). I was assured "they were only charging me for parts" and of course, the worker's labor since the "inspector" wasn't the one doing any of the work.
I had trusted too easily and placed far too much faith in a company with a representative lacking experience/expertise in roofing as well as basic principles.  I will NEVER use them for any work as long as I am in Alabama.

name: Mac McNulty
text:
Mobile County.

Jessica Wilkerson and Ronald Massengale with International Construction Enterprises, Inc., or ICE Restoration, are charged with insurance fraud and first-degree financial elder abuse. According to their indictments, the two submitted a claim with a 92-year-old homeowner’s forged signature to Cincinnati Financial Insurance that stated $40,000 of roofing work had been performed by their company. The indictments also say Massengale and Wilkerson financially exploited the elderly homeowner in excess of $2,500 under a fraudulent contract.

According to court documents, five formal complaints about ICE Restoration had been submitted in Mobile County, and 20 complaints had been submitted in Baldwin County. The Mobile County victims suffered “general misrepresentations and deceptive omissions at the hands of [Wilkerson and Massengale].”

text: This company if you can call it a company they are scammers and first class Jokes. the great reviews they have  they had to buy them or they come  from themselves posting their own great reviews or friends and family who are willing to tell a bold face lie. These people are so unprofessional in 20 different languages. They made 3 appointments to come to our home to inspect our roof and missed all 3 scheduled appointments The first 2 appointments were missed by Brice who had mommy issues. Then David the project manager missed the 3rd appointment by calling and saying he is sending some paper to sign by email so he can send someone out to tarp our roof. first of all how convenient for him to send anything before he even looked at our roof  and who sign anything without at least meeting face to face or even in your office or at least showing up to the home owners home for the scheduled appointments. your entire team needs a real come to Jesus moment and some serious discipline in business. I am sure it comes from head this is why this crew is not disciplined in keeping appointments and being reliable. it will not take long before this type of behavior will have your entire team looking for the next Scam. These people will be getting a serious reality check soon from a lack of INCOME  I Thank God for all the signs first before we gave you our and family and clients business. it would have been a nightmare train wreck so praise God this entire team is a unprofessional train wreck soon to happen.

text: Had a free inspection of my roof done around 2 months ago that revealed hail and wind damage. ICE has been more than helpful throughout the process and the roof turned out great. David and his crew had the roof completed and cleaned up in less than 1.5 days.

name: Anthony Bennett
text:
The owner and employees of ICE Restoration are hands down a professional, economic and trustworthy organization. I had a complete roof replacement done 2 months before hurricane Sally literally T-Boned my home in Elberta, AL. The owner came and performed an inspection after I called them due to a small leak discovered on the ceiling inside. The leak was discovered the night that a tropical storm was hitting Louisiana and we had solid rain and some gusty winds. He found several locations of wind torn shingles. His company's process for handling insurance was thoroughly explained and he offers fighting the insurance company on your behalf for you, and this save a lot of headaches. He also explained how many roofing companies have a bad habit of "high nailing" shingles leading to typical thunderstorm gusty winds tearing them off. He also provided an excellent overview of the quality shingles he uses (IKO) and their second to none wind ratings. Besides, you get what you pay for! I signed his contract. His job foreman maintained constant communication with me on material delivery date, asked where I was ok having it placed closest to house. Job day came and let me express my amazement with his crew! Arrive 7am and depart 4:30pm....job complete!!! It looked like no one ever came! And trust me, I am one of those people that like to watch like an "inspector", and these guys know what they're doing. I also had Fortification completed on the roof, powered attic vent removed w/ridge vents and off ridge vents put in place. I never ever had to deal with the insurance! People just don't understand the process, want a complete new roof for pennies on the dollar....and folks unless you're ok dealing with leaks/missing shingles a year or two later, or doing the roof yourself...you are not going to find a company and roof products of this standard for that kind of money! I paid a small wind deductible and got a complete roof w/fortification and 45 year shingle, full wrap of gutters and ceiling repair (about 700sqft due to "continuous surface") for that small deductible! Then hurricane Sally hit. Not one shingle, ridge/off ridge vent even flinched!

If you want honesty, quality material and construction w/out fighting your insurance, and no concerns about future issues with your roof....call the folks with ICE Restoration and let them take care of you. The one or two reviews I read that were not so nice, clearly to me are folks that do not understand roofing or the process with insurance and think everyone is out to take advantage. This is NOT who ICE Restoration is by any means!

name: Tim Dummitt
text:
We had our roof and gutters replaced by USA Roofing. Overall we are pleased with the quality of roof provided by their team. I will say there was challenges along the way but at the end of the day they made them right.

Pros of the job
Quality of information up front and materials used was better than average. They weren't pushy like several of the other contractors I met with prior to selecting USA Roofing. They also worked closely with me during the insurance claim process and made things very smooth on that end. Finally, once they got started, they quickly completed the job and left little to no evidence they were there once they cleaned up the work site.

Cons

Unfortunately they started the job on an afternoon when it rained heavily into the night which caused some water leaks overnight but they were quick to come out first thing the next day to get things dried up and secure. The crew also dropped a hammer through our dining room ceiling during the job but they quickly took ownership of the issue and made the repairs accordingly. Communication at times with the scheduling and completion of the work could have been better is the only other criticism I would have for their mgmt team. I chalk this up to how busy they were at this time as hundreds of homes in the Birmingham area we damaged during this massive hail storm and they had a lot of jobs in flight at the same time.

text: We built a new home about 4 years now and the last 3 years whenever there has been major wind storms I needed a reliable and quick roofing contractor to come out to fix my roof issues right away. Kelbie roofing has been my go to contractor! Having a three story townhome makes it difficult to see exactly the extent of damage I have, but they get up there and provide photos for you to see the damage and then once granted permission to do the work they provide after photos well. This is the 3rd time I have called him as this is a yearly occasion with our "builder grade" roof quality and he will be sending a guy in the next day to repair the roof damage. Definitely recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Debra Ferguson
text: Great job during the entire project, the roof came out exactly as we were hoping and we've already recommended them to several neighbors who have asked.

text: Kelbie’s team members were highly specialised in the installation of metal roof, having a keen knowledge of how to carry out the work and completed in a proper manner. I will certainly use them for the dozens of complex roofing projects in the future.

text: Michael was easy to work with. His crew came out promptly to clean the gutters and downspouts on our townhouse. The pictures they texted to me showed a job well done.

text: We needed an emergency repair and Kelbie Home Improvement, Inc. was able to come out and repair 2 leaks for us the same day, literally saved us from thousands of dollars in possible damage. Thanks again guys!

name: J. Bar
text:
I’ve had Mike Kelbie put on more than a dozen roofs over the years, because his crew does a great job for a fair price.

This is a one-star review for a very important reason, however... integrity.  Mike sold me those roofs with 15-year warranties.  12 years later, when one develops a small leak, I call to ask for a repair and all of a sudden the warranties are only 3-year warranties.

Not cool, Mike.  Not cool.

If you choose to work with Kelbie Home Improvement, know one advance that you can’t count on them long term.

resp.text: Jeremy, we did multiple roofs on Hunter and if you’re having any leaks it’s probably due from wear and tear and it may need a simple repair or some preventive maintenance. If you want, I can go over and inspect the roof at no charge to see what’s going on since we did do the work back in 2007. Please give me a call.

name: Kyle Corfman
text: Inquired about gutter cleaning and power washing, got a very quick response and a quick quote from some pictures (which I found very convenient honestly). Got a couple lower quotes from other companies, but decided to follow up with Kelbie because they seemed to be quick to respond and were more local. I asked about matching the other quotes and was immediately met with hostility followed by a series of texts mocking me including a "you get what you pay for" meme as well as a threat of other companies sueing us without insurance. I was trying to stick with them because of the quick response and availability of quick service but I would not recommend this company after this experience, albeit without receiving any service from them.

resp.text: We are truly sorry that you weren't pleased with our response. There are many companies in the area that will offer much lower prices, and you truly do get what you pay for. We don't like competing with these fly by night companies, because we can't provide quality services and pay employees what they are worth AND beat these guys on price. We truly hope you found someone and have had a satisfying experience.

name: Gary Bernstein
text: Over the weekend my roof developed leaks in the bedroom.  It had been inspected recently and was perfect.  Well a tree limb fell during the storms and punctured three spots.  I contacted Kelbie by email over the weekend and then spoke to him Monday.  He got to my house in 30 minutes and then found  the limb damage in 10 minutes.  I had enough confidence in him that I paid him and went to work.  It rained horribly today and tonight.  When I got home I looked in the pots on the bed and they were bone dry.  No drops on the ceiling. It is supposed to rain like this the next few days and I have no worries now.  Exceptional response and the same for the repair.  This is the only roofer I will ever call.  Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you, Gary. We appreciate your kind words and business!

name: Nikki Jordan
text: Kelbie roofing fitted my roof replacement into their schedule when no one else could! Not only were they quick, but the work was also of high quality at a reasonable price. I also appreciate how responsive they were with all of my questions and concerns. To sum it up, great job matched by great customer service.  I will definitely consider them for future work!

resp.text: Thank you. We look forward to it.

text: I recently had to have my roof redone and with the state of the roof, it needed to be done quickly. Mike was able to provide a quick estimate in order to get the process moving quickly. He was great to work with and always available to answer my questions. His crew did the job quickly and left the area very clean. I am happy that I chose to work with Kelbie Roofing for my new roof project.

resp.text: We are happy you chose us as well. Thank you for taking time out your busy day to leave a review.

name: Ashlyn
text: Mike has been an incredible resource for us! We recently moved to the area and were struggling to find good, reliable service for things around the house! text: Very professional company   We had some shingles blow it off   Found out that the roof was not installed correctly   Kelbie helped us   Right away   We called early in the morning around 7 AM  within minutes we received a call back  within minutes we received a call back  within 45 minutes someone was here to inspect our roof and tell us what the problem was   Kelbie was able to work with our insurance company to help us get a new roof   Because of the wind damage   And the improper install   We was able to get it done    We highly recommend Kelbie   To anyone looking for a good roofer   A family owned business

text: We just had our roof redone. Mike was easy to communicate with and responded quickly to my text messages. Price was wonderful! text: "I needed to replace my slate roof on my townhouse and I made a phone to Kelbie Home Improvement and received a phone call back from Mike Kelbie, the owner. The job was completed in 1 day and they were great! They were extremely efficient and cleaned up after themselves. I asked if they could maybe leave a few slate tiles for me and they did! They even put them in a very neat pile on my porch :-) Kelbie Home Improvement is my go to company for all of my roofing needs. I am a Realtor and I only refer Kelbie Home Improvement (Mike Kelbie) to all of my clients. I am very pleased with all of the work that he has done for me and my clients. Plus his prices are GREAT!"

text: When you find a stand-up company that is about people first, you let everyone know about them!!! Thank you Mike of Kelbie Roofing for coming out today in the pouring rain to repair my skylight. name: Timothy Crowther
text:
After a severe storm in which I lost over half of my flat roof I began to call several roofing contractors in attempts to get estimates. The more estimates I got the more I began to get extremely panicked. The prices that I got were unbelievable. Doing a google search I found Kelbie Roofing. After speaking with Mike he took his time and did a thorough inspection of my roof, chimney and the ceilings inside that had water damage. Mike gave me several options from a patch to a full replacement and the price was really fair and reasonable. Talking to Mike I could tell he was extremely qualified and knew exactly what he was talking about. There was no pressure he even advised if I wanted to get more estimates he would expect no less never go with just one or two estimates. Mike sat down with me and completely went through the entire process that would take place to replace the roof from start to finish.  After speaking with Mike we decided that his knowledge and courtesy was the way we wanted to go.  After signing the contract we set up a start date, the crew he sent showed up on that date on time ready to work. The crew was very courteous and professional, when they began to tear off the roof the crew made sure that my property on the side of the house where they were tossing the trash off and my wife's flower beds were protected. If I ever had a question during this process Mike and the crew never hesitated to answer the question being as this was my first time with such a large repair. The crew went above and beyond to make sure the job was completed properly and that it looked very good. From the tear off to the minor finishing touches I am completely satisfied with the job Kelbie roofing did for me and I will not hesitate to use them in the future. Thank you Mike.

Tim from Baltimore

resp.text: Thank you so much for the fantastic review. We were happy to help and glad you're fully satisfied.

name: Hailey Wade
text: Terrible service and very unorganized. I found Kelbie's after a Google search when I was looking for someone to do a gutter cleaning job on a townhouse. The reviews were all great so i gave them a call to schedule an appointment to have the job done. I left details with a receptionist and quickly got a call from someone requesting more details about the job that I needed done. I explained the situation and urgency and the guy told me they would get someone there the next day. No time frame was given so I asked to make sure that we would be home when the Kelbie's team got there. I was told I would get a call the next morning and they would give us a time frame and to please send pictures of the home and my details in a text message. Slightly unprofessional, but whatever, I went ahead and did what he asked. The next day arrives and it's 2:30pm and we have heard nothing from Kelbie. I text the guy and ask for an update wondering when we can expect them. I get told they will be there after the crew finishes another job near by. 6:00 rolls around and no one showed up. I call this morning to cancel the job and the guy who has been communicating with me the entire time has no clue what job I'm even talking about! Relying on text messages to service your customers is completely unprofessional. It doesn't help that they don't schedule anything (not even an open time frame) and then don't show up when they do finally tell you that they will be there.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication. We were absolutely bombarded with gutter cleaning calls before and during storms. We do take pride in quick response and great service and are sorry we didn't live up to it for you.

name: Prophet Gam7ng
text: These guys were great was able to give us what we want to at a fair price was easy to work with did a really nice job took professional pictures before and after they came highly recommended by our realtor and we will definitely use them again we needed a roof certification right away and they were able to come out and help us we ended up just doing a new roof  we was able to get what we need it done right away on short notice without any problems the very next day they came out with the crew and materials and got the job done .

text: Kept saying they were coming out to do check a job for an estimate.  didn't show or call.  Finally sent the son the next day an hour after they said they would be here got a quote.  Check with other companies, agreed to do work with Kelbie.  Son had to come out to schedule, which I never understood.  Came out, Signed contract, took my cc number said it would be done by Saturday (this was on a Tuesday) Monday never heard from them.  Father said they have to email invoice which I never got nor a receipt from son.  Told him son took my cc number in his truck.  He said they never do that.  I said there must be a lack of communication between them then.  Father was even shocked by price quoted by son who came out.  Now he won't do the job said sounds like too much of a headache since I was concerned with my card number and said lack of communication and that I was upset they hadn't even started.  Don't trust them

name: Parke Smith
text:
We hired them two years ago to replace our roof and they did a great job!  We were extremely pleased with their work and that they cleaned up thoroughly after the job!!

After the recent storms we had, a tree branch punctured a hole in our roof and caused a messy leak.  So, we called Shipp Roofing and they had someone come out that day to look at it.  Tim got up on the roof and saw that it was 2 shingles that needed to be repaired, so he called his boss who told him to take care of it! When I asked them how much that it would cost, he told me "no charge"!  That is exceptional customer service and really caring for the client after the sale!

Thank you Shipp Roofing!!!!!!!

name: Gina Temple
text: From TJ ( our salesman) to David, who oversaw the roof to the crew, everyone was courteous, friendly, and professional. The crew arrived at 9 am on the dot and were here the first day until almost dark. Back at 9am the next day until 4, back on day 3 and done by noon. They cleaned up the entire yard , made sure every piece of shingles and sliver of metal was picked up. I highly recommend them to do your next roof. We now have a absolutely beautiful pewter metal roof and I couldn't be happier..

name: Jon Phillips
text: They did a great job on my roof, I'm very happy with everything about them. Their prices are much lower than everyone else. Their whole crew is very friendly and good people. text: Had hail damage and needed my whole roof replaced. Didn't really know of a roofer in this area and took a shot with these guys. Amazed of how friendly and quickly everything was done. They actually keep you up to date about what is going on and did a wonderful job with the roof. A++++

text: We used Shipp to do some work on our home in Greystone. They showed up on time and more importantly, they found the problem and fixed it. They were affordable and we would use them again.

text: Great company at first... super eager to get the job and $10000 but not eager to clean up their mess nor fix the job after done incorrectly. Super disappointed. You’d think better people would run this business since they advertise on a CHRISTIAN station (WDJC)...

name: David Cole
text: Roofing quality was fine except for the nails in the driveway and two flat tires!   Dead bush and they did not do the gutters as called for in the approved insurance approval.    The quote process was misleading and dealing with insurance depreciation claim was horrible.   Shipp quoted one amount and then demanded payment for another.   They made a mistake in their handling of the depreciation claim and would not make things right.     I would not use them due to their failure to address their mistake with integrity.

text: Love my new roof!!! They have great employees and get the job done quickly and professionally, will definitely recommend them.

text: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! HUGE MISTAKE! I have a friend that wanted a metal roof. The company "accidentally" installed a shingle roof. WHAT? The new shingle roof leaked worse than the old roof. The repair guys car broke down is the last I heard on the situation and the "foreman" refuses to call back.

name: Jack durham
text: These guys are really good.

name: Taylor Branham
text: WOW!!!  If You want Quality, Honesty & the BEST PRICE around I highly recommend Shipp Roofing.

name: Susan Johnson
text: If I could give this company 10 stars I would do so! I needed them when I was going through a difficult time in my life! I called them because I had a small leak in my ceiling; however, by the time they arrived I had a busted water pipe in my kitchen ( my kitchen was destroyed) and I was scheduled to have rotator cuff surgery! These kind, compassionate men came to assess my situation and went above and beyond to see that the leak was fixed, my gutters cleaned, and replaced the valleys in the roof, to prevent further leaks! These men are professional, competent, and caring; and they will get the job done right.  I cannot thank them enough for taking care of my roof and me. From the senior citizen in the white house  on the hill!!! Susan Johnson

name: G Roy
text:
Where to start with this place ..... DO NOT USE! So 2108 came with a cat 4 hurricane blowing into town. I was lucky with only damage to my roof and needed a new one. I reached out to my insurance adjuster who said he worked some with this place and suggested I reach out to them. I was contacted by Mark and he came right over and gave me an estimate I could work with. Mark was awesome and kept in contact as the process began. I then had huge issues with my mortgage company wanting 15 different forms needing this and that from this company. Mark went above and beyond to get this done for me.

Fast forward to the Christmas vacation......well mark is no longer with them, no idea what took place. I was then contacted by the new rep clay. Clay called and seemed to be on top of things. They were coming to set up the cut list appointment and I was finally ready to get my roof done. Well now clay won’t return any phone calls ? Guess he got lost or something. Well I reach out to the owner who Jospeh White who was very helpful at the time when mark left. Well he too forgot what the hell customer service was too as he too can seem to remember how to answer a phone or return a call left at the office.

These people came to our town in our time of need and took advantage of the damage caused in the area. text:
You do not give me enough stars.  How about 6 or 7 of them?  I have been through roof installation and repairs to that installation for several years and thousands of dollars.
Pickett Construction LLC was recommended to me by a home inspector (I am a real estate agent).   I ordered a brand new metal roof.  They have covered me up with service.    They do what they say they will do WHEN they say they will do it!  Such competent installers.  Each one is an expert.  The company stands behind its work and it is all guaranteed.  Take this from me:  Do it right the first time.  Use Pickett Construction and look no further.

name: Jammie Eldridge
text: This business is a great one especially making ur home look beautiful & it has homes u can buy or rent. The owner is a really good person he also makes sure it's exactly the way u want it

name: Michael Daniel
text:
8 years ago we hired Pickett Construction to install a new roof, gutters and downspouts, and vinyl siding on our home. The quality of workmanship was outstanding, and the work was completed in  only 5 days. My wife and I could not have been happier.

Then last month after a rain shower, we noticed water stains on the ceiling in two different rooms. Because Pickett installed the roof 8 years ago, we called them about the problem. Josh sent his roofer to our home to see if a cause for the water leak(s) could be found, because from the outside the roofing shingles were not damaged or missing and looked fine. However after a few minutes looking in the attic and walking the roof, it was determined that during construction of my home some 25 years ago, a handful of framing nails used to secure the plywood roof deck had missed the rafter below, and after all these years had begun to back out of the plywood deck, pushing up the roof shingle just enough to let water pass underneath. The roofer walked the entire roof looking for nails that were backing out (not just in the area of the water stains below, but the whole roof), removing all that he found, sealing the hole and making sure the roof shingle lay flat. Two days after the repairs we had a lot of rain, and no water leaks inside the house.

Once again, Pickett Construction has made my wife and I very happy, and I will not hesitate to call them in the future. It's nice to know that the quality of workmanship and professionalism we knew 8 years ago is still present today.

name: tb harvey
text: Hired these people to do light repairs and painting.  Took 3 weeks to complete the painting.  They did poor preparation work on several parts of the house.  They did not paint the rear door to my detached garage,though they painted the trim.  They bent the gutter on my garage and was balking at replacing it until I showed some video.  They did not remount one of my porch lights, nor did they reattach a lens to one of the driveway flood lights. They left trash in the yard and on the front porch and in the plants behind the house. They missed painting trim on one of the back doors.  They replaced a French door that was alarmed. They had to detach the alarm panel from the wall because the new door trim was slightly larger.  After they finished the alarm would not work nor did they remount the alarm panel...just left it hanging by the wires.  When I questioned them the reply was “we don’t do that kind of work.”  Overall the work was substandard and the post work cleanup nearly nonexistent. Cannot recommend these folks . I have pictures if you need to see.

resp.text: We are sorry you had a bad experience.  We don't ask for final balance until you are completely satisfied. Thanks for your input.

name: Linda Ackley
text: Over the years Pickett Construction has re-roofed our home, installed new windows, and re-modeled our bathroom vanity, and kitchen.  We were pleased with all the results.  That is not to say that everything always went smoothly or on time, but that seems to be the norm for the construction business in general.  However, as promised by the Better Business Bureau of which Pickett is a member, they will resolve any problems to the customer's satisfaction and did.  Pickett also re-roofed our daughter's house to her satisfaction.

name: Amelia Cothran
text: I hired Pickett Construction to replace all of the floors in my house. The workers did an excellent job. Everyone was prompt and professional, from Josh in the office to the guys who installed the tile.I appreciated the courtesy with which the workers treated me and my children. I would definitely use Pickett Construction again.

name: Peaches H
text:
Pickett Construction replaced my roof and gutters a few years ago. They did such a good job that I called them when I was ready to replace the siding on my house. It turned out beautifully!
Alas, it had barely been done 4 months when another company dropped a ladder against it hard enough to seriously damage it. That company denied culpability. Nice,huh? I contacted Josh Pickett and he made a few calls and found that they had some siding in my style and color already in stock so I wouldn't have to shell out $300 for another box of siding. He then called his installers to see how much they would charge to swap out the few pieces of damaged siding. Mind you, this is four days before Christmas. Then I got an email saying it had all been fixed and when I asked how much my final bill was I was told "no charge"! Now that is the kind of company I will keep calling when I need repairs done. They bend over backwards to make sure they do the job right and that their customers are happy long term. I am looking forward to my next home improvement project with Pickett Construction.

name: Derek Smith
text: Very Reputable, considerate and helpful.  Quality workmanship.  My roof was done in really cold weather and they finished it in record time but they took care of all the problems that was damaged by hail damage.  I would highly recommend this Construction firm for all your Restoration or building needs.  Top Notched.

text: Professional services for home remodel or new custom built homes.  Customer service is always on point... Licensed, insured and bonded!  They will work with you to make your vision become a reality!

name: Bud Pommer
text:
I've had three experiences with Pickett Construction. All of them great. First; in the process of selling my home an inspection revealed hail damage on the roof and the determination that the tiles had to be replaced. Called Pickett. They gave an estimate (which ended up being lower than insurance company was going to pay). I signed contract and they showed up when they said they would, completed the work when they said they would, job looked great, did a good job cleaning up and all this done in a respectful and empathetic fashion to meet my need of completion of job prior to closing date on house.
I've moved to the Gulf Coast but still have rental property in Jefferson County.  Insurance company review dictated the need of handrails for front steps. I had one month to get then installed or they would drop my coverage on the house. The Rental Management Company for that property got some quotes but I called Pickett Construction on my own. I gave them the contract knowing I would get quality work done on time. What I really gave them besides the contract was my trust. That's something that's hard to do these days. Again, they didn't let me down!
My third experience with them was to get a quote on electrical work at that rental property. They looked at the job, told me what needed to be done but couldn't do it do it because they were covered up at the time. So, they referred me to an electrician who was half the price of other quotes and also did a great job.
I highly recommend Pickett Construction.

text: After two decades of wind and rain, our Alabaster home's roof needed a re-boot.  I've driven by Pickett Construction's office nearly every day for the past couple of years, so I figured, "They aren't going anywhere!"  We contacted them, got an estimate, and within a week we had a brand new roof.  It looks great; the price was fair; and our insurance company was pleased to work with Pickett.  They knew Mr. Pickett by reputation!  Oh, I can't forget how thorough the actual roofing crew was when it came to cleaning up. The only thing different after they left was our beautiful new roof. I can't wait till we have the funds to set Picket Construction loose on our siding and deck and bathrooms....well, you get the picture! I trust them to do the job right whatever it is.

name: Kurt DeAngelis
text:
We decided to do a major renovation on our 30 year old split foyer in Alabaster. I had a huge wish list that far exceeded the funds I had available and had to prioritize needs, essentilas and desirables. Josh assisted me in mximizing the budget with a detailed proposal that enabled me to do this. Josh did a great job with my wife letting her see and select the tile, flooring and paint, etc.

Do you want to know if Pickett is versatile or can get the job done fast? Pickett did the following items in 17 days ... 350 feet of new privacy fence and gates, paint entire house exterior, re-roof covered deck, remove turbines and patch roof areas, repair rotted roof decking around chimney stack, re-flashed and re-roofed the area, installed new LED motion detecting security lights, installed new outdoor lighting over front door,replaced all windows with new double hung, double pane vinyl windows, installed new laminate/engineered word floors on the entire main level of the house, laid tile in both foyers, kitchen and den/study, replaced every interior door and all hardware, installed new ceiling fans in each bedroom and main foyer, removed wrought iron raining in foyer and replaced with wood and balusters, primed and painted all interior trim, scraped popcorn/acoustic ceiling from kitchen, repaired drywall issues in bedrooms and kitchen, textured and painted kitchen walls.

Any "extra" I asked about was repsonded with a written proposal so that there could be no confusion or disaggrement.

To get these things done in the time frame of 17 days ... including holidays ... shows excellent planning and execution. I was kept informed as to what was scheduled for the day, who would be there and what to expect. They arranged for the construction dumpster delivery and pick up. Pickett did a nice job on the site clean up as well.

Punch list items were few and far between and resolved promptly.

The only thing that would be close to a concern or a negative was the sub-contracting tile guy who was going through a diviorce while he did the job. He did not do a bad job but his distraction resulted in a couple of small punch list things that Josh had Tripp take care of. I was assured that they would not be using this tile guy in the future.

Would I recommend Pickett Construction to you? Absolutely. Want to see pics of the renovation? I have them. Will I use them again in the future? Absolutely. As a matter of fact, my daughter used them on a foreclosure she purchased in Calera. She got prompt thorough quality work done as well.

name: Tim Calhoun
text:
Pricing:
We contracted with Pickett to complete some work on our house to prepare it for sale. We were looking for some typical wood rot to be replaced and exterior paint. We also requested an interior paint quote. I think the quote was a bit high for the exterior work, but not so bad that I didn't go with their services. The quote for the interior painting was outrageous, so we opted for another painter. The other painter's quote was nearly $3000 less than the quote from Pickett. We were also having some plywood put in the ceiling of the carport, because the builder used interior drywall in our neighborhood. Pickett gave us a "complimentary upgrade" to beadboard instead of plain plywood. This really added a nice touch to the carport ceiling, and was an appreciated upgrade. They only requested 1/2-down to start the work, which we felt was certainly reasonable. They also honored their coupon they regularly have (often in the Alabaster Newsletter, or ValPack). We printed ours from the ValPack website.

Workmanship:
The quality of the exterior work was pretty good. There were a few spots where the painting got a bit "sloppy," but was overall good work. The beadboard in the carport made a great upgrade to our carport, and added a touch of "class" to an otherwise mundane area of the house. Unfortunately, due to our unusually cold winter, the holidays, and several bouts with rain, our work was regularly delayed. It took a bit longer than expected to complete, but didn't delay our schedule of listing the house. The little interaction I had with the crew was polite and courteous, though at times the project manager came across as mildly arrogant. Communicating with the PM via email was the best medium, although he sometimes took a bit longer than expected to return messages.

Post Work Follow-up:
Again, the delays in returning messages made for a challenge in clearing our post-work "punch list," but this was also around the holidays, so we conceded a bit.  Had there been more clear communication about workday expectations (e.g. workers will/will not be onsite today) this would have made for better overall feeling about the length of the job.
During our home buyer's inspection, they found more wood rot that was inadvertently overlooked by the crew. While I don't expect the painters to look over every square inch of the house (heck, neither did I!), it ended up being a significant portion of the chimney that had rotted out the edge of our masonite siding. One would expect that at least part of that might have been discovered and either repaired or at least alerted me to the potential change in an estimate so it could be repaired. When we approached our PM about correcting it, he gave us a price quote. After paying over $6000 for the original work, this was certainly unexpected, especially with their "1 year warranty." I spoke with Josh, the owner's son who is also in management with the company. He immediately started working with me to find a reasonable solution. I ended up having to pay a bit more, but we did come to an acceptable compromise on the final cost of the supplemental work. In the end, Josh personally stopped by the house to deliver the revised agreement and took pictures of the missed work. It turned out that the rot was more severe than even he expected. He opted to continue to honor that revised estimate and didn't charge anymore. Josh really worked hard to make a relatively displeasing situation wok out well in the end. Josh was absolutely committed to service and ensuring my end satisfaction. He even reached out after the supplemental work was completed to check in on my satisfaction, and knowing there was a bit of a sour taste, still wanted this Google Review. Josh knows what it takes to listen to customer concerns and immediately find a reasonable solution that works in the best interest of all parties. Had it not been for Josh's actions, my 4-star rating would have been a high 2-star, or low 3-star.

After researching on a metal roof versus shingle, I decided to go  with metal. I am very pleased with everything about this experience and would like to thank Steve and his hard working crew for making this happen, fast.

If you want a good finished product at reasonable prices, you'll be happy with the results. Seriously, Mario is talented and friendly but don't expect him to be prompt.

name: Steve Cooner
text:
Liberty Roofing Review
Grelot Road
Mobile, Al

Master Elite Certified by GAF

J E Gomez Mobile, Al-- New Roof March 2019

I interviewed and got 5 estimates from local companies on Mobile? Baldwin counties. I was most definitely impressed when Mr. Jeff from Liberty Roofing got up on my roof for review and also looked in my attic. (None of the other 4 did this)

I asked all the same questions to all the companies and listened closely. All came in around the same pricing with exception of Baldwin County company who almost did my roof Bronze Fortified wit estimate and the really gave me a Bronze Fortified Estimate which was way to high for me.

I reviewed Better Business Bureau, called County Inspector, GAF shingle manufacturer, Alabama State Contractor Insurance Division, and read several Reviews on each company. I also requested to have a warranty and liability statement from the companies for their employees if they did work.

After all, it was a NO BRAINER. LIBERTY ROOFING was a 3 years, the best contractor insurance possible, offered GREAT warranty and Liability statement for employees on the job. Plus MASTER ELITE CERTIFIED!!

Mr. Jeff, Roofer/ Estimator answered all my questions, seemed open and honest. Mr. Steve, Owner, I met at the office when going over some details,
also very professional and polite and answered my questions and visited the site on the first day job. Mr. Allan, crew supervisor was wonderful and accommodating on all job set up. clean up and roof review. Ms. Yadzia, office manager, a delight and very  efficient.
The work crew was polite, hardworking and did great clean up job and site was left as started . I received my GAF warranty within weeks of job being done.

IAM EXTREMELY PLEASED WITH MY NEW GAF LIBERTY ROOF.

J E GOMEZ

name: Demetra Hurst
text:
High quality work and products at a reasonable price.
Michael - professional manner, knowledgeable, and very helpful. Took care of everything.
Good crew of roofers and gutter men - hardworking, on-time, courteous and seem to take pride in their work. Clean up was excellent.
Very pleased and highly recommend Michael and Superior Roofing
A Plus and Five Star

name: Frank Mazurek
text: I had a fairly small job (20x22 detached garage) to do. Michael didn't try to inflate the price and gave me a fair and competitive estimate. They showed up early on the day scheduled and knocked it out. Very professional and did a great job. Very thorough clean up when they were done. Only way to tell they were there is by looking at my new roof. Highly recommend Superior Roofing.

name: Michelle Cummings
text: Michael and his crew were great.  They were able to take a difficult situation (discovery of no decking) and take the time to reassess in order to get the job done properly. When they started the job, they sent progress pictures throughout the job. They were done before you knew it. I was impressed with the workmanship and professionalism. I would highly recommend Michael sand his crew for your next job.

name: DH Test1
text:
I would like to commend the Superior Roofing team for effective project coordination and excellent craftsmanship while working under this summer’s high heat index weather conditions.  The Superior Roofing team replaced the shingles on our steep, tree-damaged roof, removed damaged gutters, installed new gutters with a perfect color match to our existing fascia trim, and expertly repaired our tree-damaged deck railings and steps.  We are very pleased with the results of all this multi-trade work and have received quite a few neighborhood compliments on the results.
A late spring storm with heavy rains and high winds had caused a huge, old poplar tree to fall on our house.  Once our insurance company had completed their initial estimate of repairing the damage, we made our list of potential service providers and included Superior Roofing.  The estimator returned our call promptly and set up a convenient appointment to come by our house to assess our situation.  After walking the site, he explained his estimate while talking around the kitchen table with us and provided a professional package of insurance and business license documentation.  We had previously talked with several other very reputable and capable companies, but only a few could manage all the tasks in a single installation window and even fewer were willing to stay within our preferred guidelines for deck repair rather than replacement.  The Superior Roofing estimator described how the team could do our preferred repairs and created a window of opportunity in the work schedule.  After weighing a lot of factors, we decided to do business with Superior Roofing based on the estimator’s straight-forward and professional manner, experience working with insurance claims, personal referrals from other trusted service providers we had used, the company’s excellent ratings on several web sites and with the Better Business Bureau (A+ rating), and the interesting completed projects described on the company’s web site.  The estimator personally showed up on site while the work was being done, made sure we were satisfied with the work, and followed up promptly with the close-out paperwork and insurance coordination.  As with so many home repair projects, some field changes to work already quoted were requested by us or suggested by the project lead on site.  The estimator and the project lead communicated promptly with us, gave us their candid assessments, provided cost deltas both plus and minus, and decisions that worked for all parties were made without delaying the work schedule.  Thank you, Superior Roofing - we enjoyed working with you and we appreciate the excellent results your team produced for us.

name: Sandra Stewart
text: Superior Roofing is transparent and dependable. We will recommend them to anyone asking about roof repair or replacement.

name: Mike Rodgers
text: Superior Roofing showed up at 7:30 and immediately got to work, non stop, at a fast but unhurried pace. I've never seen so many people working so hard and so steadily. They did a beautiful job. They left no nails or debris anywhere. Highly recommended.

name: Mark
text: I called Michael and discussed our roofing needs. He was very quick to give us an estimate and got our commercial TPO roof installed earlier than expected. I would highly recommend Michael and his company to get top notch service and results. He and his guys are first class!!!!!

name: Gabe Christian
text: Excellent & Value for money service from Superior love to recommend them to my freinds!!!

name: Dylan Jean
text: Very responsive, knowledgeable and friendly. Finished the job quickly and efficiently. Roof looks great and the clean up job was perfect. Would highly recommend .

name: Mary Brown
text: Mike & his team at Superior Roofing were very professional and helpful.  They did a great job installing our new roof.  I would highly recommend them to other people who may need their services.

name: sanford obarr
text: Be careful calling this company. Came out gave est.and signed contract, when roofers came back est changed from $4900 to $6200 (said they misfiguered material). Don't know if I was being scammed for more money or they are that back at giving estimates. Wasted my time, don't waste yours...

resp.text:
A mistake was made by a new estimator when the original estimate was given.  Management reviewed the estimate before installing the roof and found the total number of squares to be installed inadequate. As a result, we revised the estimate to the correct square count and adjusted the price accordingly.  The homeowner was given the option to continue at the new adjusted price. He declined saying that we should install the roof at the original contract price, even though the mistake was discovered prior to any work being done. As a result of our company not being able to be underpaid $1300.00 by this customer, he wrote a bad review even though we did no work for him whatsoever.
We make every effort to be accurate in our estimating. However, if a mistake is made we have a system to detect that miscalculation prior to work being performed.

name: Laurie Brandon
text: They did a great job. Plus they were prompt, courteous and cleaned up any debris from my yard.

name: Joshua Cook
text: This is a profession company that has the customers best interest in mind. I will be a repeat customer

name: Joe Fair
text: Tyler was very professional and Javi worked super quick to get the job done. The cost was reasonable for the scope and size of the job (especially when compared to a couple of other companies). Hopefully their services will not be needed again any time soon, but when there is another roof issue down the road, I’ll know who to contact.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Fair. We appreciate the opportunity.

name: Wes Willoams
text: Tyler Poole is an true professional with skilled knowledge of his trade. The service he and his crew provided was superb and I would recommend White Oaks Construction to all my friends and family.

name: Bill Seckbach
text: White Oaks Construction does the job right the first time.  I've been in property management for 25 years and know quality and attention to detail when i see it.  5 stars!  Thank you Mr Pike, we will do more buisness in the future sir.

name: Lane Hyche
text: Where to start? Professional, honest, punctual reasonable, basically everything you want in a company who will be working on your most valuable asset. Tarelton arrived on time and on my schedule, while having numerous jobs already on the books. He took the time to point out the issues with my roof and even helped tarp it to prevent water leaks until it could be repaired. Longest wait was with the insurance company but afterwards, he had the repairs done in a very timely manner. I highly recommend him and will be using them in the future if needed. Thank you for making this easy.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity mr. Hyche

name: Dr. Amanda Poole
text: The guys at White Oaks Construction did an AMAZING job on my roof!  They answered all my questions and walked me through the process of submitting the claim to my insurance.  The crew was efficient and my yard was cleaner after they finished than it was before they started!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Tal Shiflett
text: The crew did an amazing job getting me taken care of in an extremely timely and professional manner. 10/10, will definitely use them again!

resp.text: Thank you mr. Shiflett. We appreciate the opportunity

name: Karla Thornton
text: They were great!  Very nice guys, answered all our questions, nice selection of shingles to choose from and price was better than expected.  Work crew was prompt, polite and very clean.  Would highly recommend!!

name: J. Taylor
text: Quality business all the way around. Everyone was super nice and did quality work for a good price. My roof needed some repairs; and that’s what I had done. Sheldon explained what a good roof job is suppose to look like versus how my roof was installed. I will definitely use them again when I need a new roof in 5 years.

resp.text:
Thank you Joe for your business and the five star review. We really appreciate you giving us a call and trusting us with your roof. We really enjoyed meeting you and working for you and we look forward to working for you in the future.
Sheldon Harper
F&H ROOFING

name: Mary Lib Baxter
text: These gentlemen did a fantastic job on our roof. Not only that, but they kept in touch with me every step of the way and fulfilled every statement with action, whether it was a return call or workmanship. I literally called six other companies. Four companies told me they would be out there the next day to give me a quote and never showed. The other company quoted for asphalt shingles and there was negligible difference in cost for the metal roof from F&H. If I could give more stars, I would!

resp.text: Thank you Mary. We appreciate your business. Thank you for taking time out your day to give us 5 stars.

name: Janice Davis
text:
Best roofers in the area. Sheldon and Michael were extremely knowledgeable, polite, answered all my questions and did not leave one piece of trash in my yard. I cannot say enough nice things about them..They definitely exceeded my expectations. Thank you again Sheldon, Michael and crew.
~Janice Davis

name: Brittney Harper
text: My husband and I love our new metal roof! Sheldon, Michael and their crew were all very nice, professional, clean and they finished in 2 days like they said they would! So very happy we chose them and will definitely be referring them to our friends as family.

name: Scott Sullivan
text:
** HUGE THANK YOU to John and Team **

Social media is a double edge sword, that unfortunately recognizes poor service more often than good service.  I wanted to take a moment to let y’all know what a “ GREAT” experience we have had with Complete Roofing Solutions LLC

From the initial estimate ( done by drone ) to the installation is was world class all the way.  John Manis who kicked off the process with the estimate was involved all the way through to the end and hasn’t missed a beat on getting us the information that we need.  We upgraded to a metal roof from shingles and it was seamless…..

resp.text: Scott, thank you so much for your positive review!

name: Adam M
text: I had a leak in my roof and they came out and repaired it. So far everything is good. They did everything in a few hrs. The price was better then other roofers i got quotes on. I def recommend  Complete roofing solutions. Will use again in future.

resp.text: Adam, it was our pleasure! Thank you for your business and feedback!

name: Shawn Doll
text: Had a metal roof put on. They tried to gouge us for more money and say they weren’t suppose to do a section on our roof when it was clearly covered in the contract. One of the workers hit on my wife. The clean up was terrible, I found a grocery bag worth of screws and nails and I have a small child. But hey if you can look past ALL of that the roof looks good... don’t know if it was worth all that trouble.

name: Cynthia McLeod
text: Doug is a professional, polite and friendly person.  He's experienced, knows what he's doing and helps you get the roof you want.  Our metal roof looks beautiful and we are very happy with it.  A special thanks to Francisco and his crew.  Thanks, Complete Roofing!!

resp.text: Cynthia, thank you for allowing us to complete this project for you!

name: Jake Framon
text: Cannot say enough about this company.  I was updated on every aspect of the job.  Communication is key when I do home improvements.  When they were finished the cleanup was great.  Highly recommend this company.

resp.text: Jake, we really appreciate you taking the time to leave us a positive review. Thank you!

name: Derek Najdowski
text: Not only is Doug (owner of Complete Roofing Solutions) a great roofer!  Doug is a great, trustworthy guy!  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Derek!

name: Doreen Springer
text: Great for ASAP services Had s complete roof done in 3days great workers and Josh was on point as promised go Complete Roofing Solutions.

resp.text: Doreen, thank you for your feedback!

name: thesells1
text: May 2019, complete redo of 2800 SF home, RV garage, and storage building. Finished in 2 days, crew worked safely and the roof looks great. Their bid was competitive and clean up was OK, not good. We received the bronze roof certificate and will receive $475/year discount on wind insurance. Lowered my rating because of a leak around one of the exhaust pipes in the roof - the leak was repaired, but no response to my request to repair the wet ceiling in the kitchen. I hired a drywall guy and paid for the repair....

name: Chris “CS in Alabama” Scaife
text: They roofed my rental house in Talladega.  They gave a good, accurate estimate and did the job on schedule.  The work is very nice.  They installed roof ends and drip edges to make sure your job stays nice.  They cleaned up after themselves.  The company used a membrane under the metal and not just felt as most around here do. They made this old house look very nice.  Highly recommended.

name: Billy Lee
text: TG Roofing very professional. They did an awesome job on my roof. I would recommend them to anyone! My roof looks great.

name: Thomas Parker
text: TG roofing did an awesome job on my gutter repair. Give them a call. Great work.

name: Susan Brown
text: T.G. Roofing installed my metal roof when I built my house 13 years ago. SInce then I have had multiple leaks and cannot get them to return my phone calls or come out and look at it. I have hired another company after trying to get several roofers to come out because no one wants to touch someone else's work. FInally I got a highly rated company to come out and they took pictures and showed me where the metal was cut short in several places and patched, most all of the screws are halfway or more out, the edges are patched together causing leaks and overall the work after seeing pictures is very poor. What is really sad is that the original company is not willing to look or stand by their work. so after spending the money and putting a metal roof I now am going to have to replace the whole thing not to mention the wood in several places from the leak. They put screws in the flat part of the metal instead of in the ridges which means water is constantly running over them and slowly leaking into my house. I could understand the metal needing to be rescrewed but because they did not screw it on properly the first time in order for it to be correctly done it will have to be replaced. This company has been around a long time which is one of the reasons we chose to use them in the first place but apparently they have so much business they no longer care about the quality of their work. So sad that  a company would take advantage of people and their hard earned money. I would not recommend them to anyone.

name: Brenda Martin
text: Excellent job...very professional. Highly recommended!!

name: Andrew Thompson
text: TG Roofing completed work on my home -- very professional, looks beautiful.  Did a good bit of repair work to my roof and eaves as well, all for a very reasonable price.  Very, very satisfied, and will/would recommend to anyone interested in a quality metal roof!

name: Hope Mclaughlin
text: Beautiful roof for a great price! All the guys were super sweet!

name: Rebecca Lourdin
text: Talked to me three times, visited my property, promised me an estimate and then never called me back. If I can't trust them to call me back on an estimate I sure will not trust them with my roof. Next roofing company I called (after TG Roofing quit calling me back) got the job done. TG Roofing and Shed Co uses the same number so I don't know what that is all about either.

name: John Jayroe
text: TG Roofing gave fair estimates and did quality work. They even replaced rotted wood in several places so that the metal roof would have something solid to screw into. I would not hesitate to give Tony a call!

name: Randy Weldon
text: Very professional my new roof looks very nice and was done in a day and the roof technicians was very nice and pleasant to

name: Paula Sharp
text: My experience with TG Roofing was horrible.  We called them for two weeks to get someone out to the house to look at a possible repair on our roof.  I was told that they would call me back. NEVER HAPPENED.  And it was right before Thanksgiving.  So I let that one go.  So I called back frist thing Monday morning and got a person that actually set up an appointment and they would be out to the house on Dec 1 after 3:00 pm.   We took off work to make sure that we would be there for the rep to  stop by.  IT NEVER HAPPENED. I called the office at 338-0490 and spoke to office person and she said that she would call this person to see where he was and call me back I told her I prefered to hold.  So she called and laid the phone done (no hold) and he said that the did not have a 40 ft ladder on him and he was in Odenville.  So she said that she would call another rep and call me back.  So Charles called and said that he would be out at the house Friday at 9:30 and take a look.  Well nobody was home and we had no clue if he had some out or not.  So I called Charles this morning and asked if he came out and looked at the roof.  He said the took a ride out and then said that they were covered up and could not get to my repair.  I'm totaly blown away at this business practice and will not recommend them to anyone.  Word of mouth is costly sir!

name: Bridgett Lovell
text: i would  highly recommend them to anyone. Great price on roof and they got the job done very quick.

name: Tim Maddox
text: Great bunch of guys excellent work would recommend them anytime

name: Andrea Thrall
text: Best work I ever seen quality  work I ever seen I would  reccomend  them to anyone

name: Jeremy Gossett
text: Tony is great to work with.  These guys are pros

text: I called and spoke with his wife she was supposed to call me back within an hr no phone call came they had been out and got an estimate I called left several messages and called and got no answer don't bother with them a man is only good as his word

name: Tina Glass
text: Awesome guy's do great work

name: Billy Deputy
text: There the best roofing company in town

name: Michael Stano
text: Excellent crew

name: Randy Weldon
text: Very professional

text: I received an estimate from another gutter installation company that was two times higher than Hinkle Roofing. My request for an estimate was handled quickly by Jase. I gave 4 stars instead 5 because it took several calls before I received my invoice to submit payment but overall I would strongly recommend this company.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Robinson for the review. I apologize it took us so long to return your call. We appreciate the feedback and will work on this issue moving forward.

name: Justin Lindsey
text: Hinkle did a great job installing gutters on my house. They were quick to come out and give me a quote and their prices are very competitive within the Birmingham/Central Alabama market. Jase had a great team come out for the installation and they got the job done right. I highly recommend Hinkle Roofing.

name: Bruce Eckert
text:
Hinkle was great - very responsive and professional.
Jase quickly came out and did a roof inspection on our new house then got me the report and a quote in a couple of hours.
Highly recommend and will use again!

name: Tony LaRussa
text: Hinkle came out to my house today to check my roof after the tornado hit Fultondale.  Jase Buttram was the tech and he was amazing.  He was honest with me and told me that my roof was in still in good shape.  I so appreciate his honesty.  Thank you Jase.  A++++

resp.text: Thank you Mr. LaRussa for the review. We pride ourselves on providing honest and fair evaluations.  Please let us know if you need anything in the future.

text:
Hinkle came out during our home purchase to give us a roofing inspection (which as free!). They identified an area of repair and although I thought it would take 4-6 weeks to get a team out there to do the work, they had an opening within a few days.

Grateful for Hinkle!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Kynes for your business! It was a pleasure to work with you on this repair.

name: Stephanie Lee
text: I wish I could give them ten stars.  This company does the best work and charges a fair price.  I will never even consider using anyone else.  I love it that this company is over a century old with deep roots in the communities it serves.  Also, they are the only company I know of that warranties repairs.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review! We are proud to have served Birmingham and the surrounding area homeowners for so long for all their roofing and home improvement needs.

name: john shelfer
text: Very professional outfit. I had heard from friends  how good they were but assumed they would be expensive. Insurance was paying for my new roof and I needed 3 estimates. They were the least expensive and they did a great job and cleaned up very well after they were done.

name: Teena Herschowsky
text:
I am interested in a specific home to buy and wanted the roof inspected by a reputable company.  I asked many people and they told me to call Hinkle.  Jase responded very quickly and immediately came out and inspected the roof and wrote a very professional, detailed report.
I would absolutely recommend this company and will use them if and when i need a new roof.  Jase was on time, early in fact.
Go ahead and call this company.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Herschowsky for your review!! Please let us know if you need anything else.

Doug and his team and professional. courteous and very knowledgeable.  I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. George for your review. Please let us know if you need anything else.

I would recommend Jase and Hinkle Roofing to anyone. A++

name: Evan Smith
text: I had a great experience with Hinkle Roofing. Due to rain in the forecast, my appointment for an inspection wasn't scheduled until later in the week. He even talked me through the inspection report, instead of just forwarding it my way. I will definitely be using this company again and recommend them for anyone!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Smith for your review. We look forward to doing more business with you soon.

text: I needed some gutters installed on a new covered back porch.  The installer was professional and made sure we were on the same page as to what we needed before he started and was detail oriented.  Very pleased.

resp.text:
Hey Mr. Turmer,

Thank you for choosing Hinkle Roofing to handle this project for you. It was our pleasure to work with you.

name: D Smith
text: I'm buying a house and utilized Hinkle Roofing for an inspection and estimate.  They quickly came out, easy to work with and provided everything I needed quickly and professionally.  And responded with great information on my follow-up questions.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Smith for your review!! Please let us know if we can help you with anything else!

name: David M Jones
text: We got a great price on two separate roofs in Tuscaloosa.  I no longer have to worry about leaks, and my power bill is actually lower with the white roof.  They were professional, fast and even came back to fix something they didn't like, but I didn't know was not perfect.  I highly recommend Hinkle Roofing for any roofing needs.  We have used them for over 40 years, and these projects (2019) were the fourth roof they have installed on three different buildings.  I could not be more pleased with the product, the workmanship or the quality of the roof.

resp.text: Thank you for being a returning customer of Hinkle Roofing. We strive to provide an excellent level of service with each appointment and look forward to working with you again with anything you may need.

name: Mark Hill
text: Nice people.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mr. Hill!

name: Scott Crawford
text: Very pleased. Had some shingles gone and needed them fixed. Spoke with the office and was then contacted quickly to go over the particulars. There wasn't an emergency, but I felt they got to my job quickly. Roof looks great - they matched the color of the existing shingles well. Area was cleaned after the job. They are now my roofing people.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Crawford for the kind words! We try our best to get to each job as quickly as we can. Please let us know if we can help you in the future and thank you for choosing Hinkle Roofing.

name: Brandon Best
text: Excellent company. Responded immediately the first time we contacted them. Staff was extremely professional, knowledgeable, and helpful. Would definitely recommend.
