name: Peter Noel
text: Setting up a time for a roof inspection was a smooth and easy process.  The folks at Hinkle were courteous and helpful.  The inspection took place one day after my original phone call and I received a written report shortly after.  I highly recommend Hinkle Roofing.

name: Bert Pitts
text: Inspected roof and gave great detail about roof condition and recommendations. i was very impressed!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Pitts!! It was a pleasure working with you.

name: adrian burch
text: Hinkle did an excellent job on my roof and the job was completed sooner than I expected. Several of my neighbors have given me compliments on my roof as well as the quality of service. We need new windows and I will definitely be purchasing them from Hinkle. I highly recommend them for any roofing needs!!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Burch for the kind words. We take pride in delivering a quality experience with each homeowner. We look forward to estimating your windows when you are ready.

name: Lindsay Cochran
text: Professional, prompt, and reliable. Would use again!

name: Debbie LeCroy
text:
Hinkle Roofing replaced our roof in 2009. This past week, 9/16/19 we made use of our extended warranty for a minor issue. I called Hinkle around 9am, and my problem was fixed by 3pm. The service rep listened to my concerns and was easily able to figure out and fix the problem.

I highly recommend Hinkle Roofing company- they produce  a good product, and stand behind it with reliable service.

name: Vincent W
text: One of the most expensive quotes I have received for my roofing request by far. Scope of work is comparable to several other bids on project. In the event that "materials" are to be referenced as an explanation for this difference in cost it would be interesting since those specifics were not provided with the the RFP.

resp.text: Mr. Whatley, We strive to deliver an excellent experience from the moment you contact us to the day our crew leaves the job. We know that we may not always be the lowest bid, but we give our customers best warranty on the market, include flashings that are often overlooked by others, and provide managed work under constant supervision to ensure the most professional finish. All of these elements together lead to 5 star worthy interaction. Sorry you were only able to experience the bidding portion.

name: Michael Tremba
text:
We needed part of our roof replaced, and they did a good job.
We were very pleased with Jace's responsive and accommodating manner, and recommend this contractor.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review!  So glad you are happy with our work.

name: Theia Preston
text: We were looking for someone to come and repair our roof from the last storm that came through and Hinkle came to our rescue! They were working on my neighbors roof and when we asked if they could come over to our home to repair ours,they did it with no hesitation. Thank you Hinkle!!

resp.text: So happy we could help.  Please let us know if we can do anything else for you.

name: Peter Suomala
text: I have a dining room bay window with a copper roof that three other local roofers did not want to deal with because it's much easier to work with asphalt than sheet metal I guess.  The Hinkle crew arrived on time, removed the old flashing and custom cut, bent, and installed new step flashing - a much better job than was done when the house was built 20 years ago.  It's obvious these guys know sheet metal and how to work with it.

name: J French
text: They did right be me and my family. Quote was in line with other companies we had contacted. They seemed the most responsive and answered every question we had no matter how silly. Glad we went with then.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! It was our pleasure getting to work with you. Thank you for choosing Hinkle Roofing.

name: Molly Buttram
text: Great experience! Very easy to work with and provided great quality work.

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Gallian, for your review. We strive to deliver a great experience with all of our customers.

name: Lynda
text: 110 years says a lot. I interviewed many roofers, and most want to charge over the insurance estimate, some as much as 2800.00 more. Jim King came in, looked at the estimate and said sure thing! Two weeks later we have our beautiful new roof. It will pay, if you are looking for a roofing company to give them an opportunity to look at your roof. One happy customer!

name: J. Bart Rose
text: Outstanding service! Would recommend them to anyone. Very professional and responsive.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Rose for the review. We do our best to respond as quickly as possible, but the weather has slowed us down.

name: Daniel Gallegly
text: Keep up the good work guys.  Jeff Baker and all the folks at Hinkle Roofing are exceptional, just plain exception. And I've known Jeff for years and Hinkle always does top notch work.  They do great work and I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Daniel! We would not be the company we are without our fantastic employees.

name: Richard McBee
text: great job done in miserable conditions.  The temperature hit 96 degrees. Now I understand why they needed to get started super early.   I don't know how hot it was on the rooftop but the crew kept working only to stop to hydrate and to have lunch.    I'm so thankful that the Hinkle Roofing crew put my new roof on before the rain got here.  Awesome workers and company.

name: Timothy Richey
text: Had someone come out and do a quote on my roof, when they showed up they never knocked or let me know that they were here. They just went up on the roof, and acted like I was inconveniencing them when tried talking to them about what was going on. They never explained anything and just handed me a card with their phone number and told me to call in a couple days to find out the quote. Their quote was one of the more affordable ones, but I ended up going with a different company just because how they treated me.

resp.text: Thank you for your comments. Hinkle Roofing knows that this is a people business and customer satisfaction is top of mind with our company. After speaking with you yesterday, I researched your project and spoke with the estimators involved. As it shows in our system you called 3/22/17. Due to our heavy call volume from the storms we were not able to get to your job immediately. You called back on 09/01/17 and requested someone to come out. A team of estimators visited your home that day.  They knocked on your door and after a few minutes of no response proceeded with measuring your roof. It is not uncommon for us to measure properties without the homeowner there, but we do call the property owner first to let them know we will be there. Even though this was a year ago, we understand your complaint and have taken note of the issue. We will apply this to how we approach jobs in the future and appreciate your feedback.

name: Lisa misad
text: Went above and beyond. Was on time for appointment and offered to do mine repairs for a great!! discounted price

resp.text: Above and beyond is what we strive for. Thanks so much for choosing Hinkle Roofing.

name: Margaret Cleveland
text: My roof was completed Yesterday…the weather is very hot but it did not hinder the completion of this roofing in two days.  I was very pleased with the young man who gave me the estimate, very pleased with the young man who saw that the job was done efficiently and in a satisfactory manner.  I would highly recommend Hinkle Roofing if you want your roof done with complete satisfaction.  Thank you Logan and Dustin.  A big thanks also to the men and especially the young Eskimo man who was the grounds keeper.  EXCELLENT JOB!

resp.text: Glad you are happy with our work.  Thank you very much for your review!

name: Tyler Higginbotham
text: I had a great experience with Hinkle Roofing!  They were very responsive and showed up to my house when they said they would so I didn't have to miss much work.  I was extremely impressed with how professional they were and their willingness to go the extra mile to make sure the repair was done correctly.  Hinkle Roofing will be the first roofers I call in the future and I would highly recommend them others.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review.   And thanks for keeping us in mind for your future roofing needs!

name: someone
text:
Edit: I did hear from Hinkle Roofing, they apologized and said the time I called was extremely busy. Hinkle has now responded, came to my house, spent a good amount of time, tying to resolve a leak issue. I am changing my rating from 1 star, to 5 stars.

Contacted Hinkle Roofing months ago, representative took my info and said someone would call back. I waited a month and called Hinkle again, received the same call back promise. Now many months later, I still haven't received any call from Hinkle. This makes me wonder how they would treat me, if we hired them.

resp.text: Thank you for updating your review. Please let us know if we can do anything else for you.

name: Michael Forster
text: They did an outstanding job in getting our job done as we were putting our house up for sale.  They completed it much sooner that estimated and I was extremely pleased with their sales team keeping me up to date with the status of the job.  I would not hesitate to use them again

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review Michael.  We appreciate you choosing Hinkle Roofing!

name: John Wallace
text: Woke up this Saturday morning at 745 am to POUNDING on my apartment roof. Who ever decided these guys should wake every tenant at my apartment complex up first thing in the morning needs their head examined. So very rude. Also just left slippery and dangerous debris everywhere.

resp.text: Mr. Wallace, we apologize for any inconvenience our work has caused you. We were scheduled by the apartment complex to begin work this week and during those times. Unfortunately, we are not able to check with every tenant on when they think it is okay for us to start and to finish the work on the building we have to start early. As for leaving the "slippery and dangerous debris everywhere", I will discuss with our site manager and review the process. We work to keep sidewalks and entry ways clean of debris so you may come and go from the property safely. If you have any other concerns please contact us at (205) 324-8545 and we will gladly address them for you.

name: Katie Belser
text: These guys are the bomb digitty!!!! They were here at 7am as promised and done 2:30 pm!!! Wow! Work was fast and efficient! Clean up was great and the crew was fun to chat with! Highly recommend!

name: Ginger Carpenter
text: Very quick to resolve a roof damage issue! Nice and always attentive to get the job done as quickly as possible. Also did a wonderful, and fast roof replacement on my neighbors house as well

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review!  We appreciate it.

name: John Clift
text: Don’t waste your time! I called three days ago and was told someone would call me back to schedule  an appointment. I called again  yesterday and was assured that someone would return my phone call immediately. No response. They obviously don’t need my business or my business is not good enough for them.  Plenty of other roofers out there that will gladly take my money.

resp.text:
Mr. Clift - Apologies for the delay in response.  We certainly can do better and per my phone call would appreciate you reconsidering using Hinkle Roofing.  Not an excuse...but to give you background, we had a bad technology day yesterday as our phones were down for most of the day.  We still could have returned your call sooner, but we were in catch up mode yesterday.

Jase Buttram
Hinkle Roofing
205-324-8545

name: Nicki Harper
text:
We have a roofing issue and asked if someone could come out to advise us on the best course of action.  Within a day, Jeff Baker was out to look at our roof and attic beams.  The advice he gave us was priceless as we were heading in a totally different direction. The consult was free and there was no obligation.  However, when we're ready to replace the roof, Hinkle will be doing the work.
I would absolutely recommend the professionals at Hinkle Roofing for your roofing needs.

name: Matt Gray
text: We had a leak appear and called Jeff & the team at Hinkle. He sent out a team member who immediately found the issue and gave me a quote on the issue. They did a great & timely job at repairing the leak with excellent results. Many companies in this industry are not reputable. This company has a great reputation & I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks Matt for the review! Our reputation is important to us and a big reason why we have had the pleasure of serving the Birmingham area for over 110 years.

name: Alan Marchman
text: A sudden burst of storms back in June of 2018 brought down a tree onto our home, damaging our roof and chimney. Hinkle Roofing was very prompt and efficient in repairing both the roof and rebuilding the chimney over the space of two days. They did an excellent job, and I would gladly call on them again if the need occurred.

name: Debbie Ramseur
text: I called to get am estimate...sometime in late January and was told an estimator would call me in a day or two....took almost a week...and when he called me he was very rude and Impatient...I told him the owner was not home, and he said no problem.  He called me when he got to the house and said there was another roofing company there doing an estimate.  ( I always get several estimates )...He acted disgusted and he said  " well, I guess I will wait until they leave "...I said great....which is what he should have done.  It has been 2 weeks and I have never heard from anyone again.    Not the way I like to run my business

name: Tanya Harris-Haynes
text: The team was very quick to come out and had us an estimate in the mail within a couple days. Also they were professional and the gutters look great. They cleaned up their mess and we wold recommend them to others as a great company to work with.

name: Sara Allbritton
text: I have all good things to say!  Hinkle roofing was helpful, attentive and completed the job quickly.  It was a fast and smooth process!  Thank you for fixing the problems we had so efficiently!

name: Allison Phillips
text:
No question that these guys know what their doing. I started asking friends and family about a roofing company that I could call on. Hinkle came up time and time again. From the first call I made I realized that this team of men and women were professionals in the roofing industry.
I never felt pushed to buy their product but I did and I couldn't be more pleased. From my initial call to set an appointment for an inspection and estimate to the final cleanup on the job site the entire process was made easy for me. It is with true appreciation that I can recommend the Hinkle team as a roofing contractor that can be trusted to do exactly what they promise. Great job!!

name: T Wright
text: I remember my dad using Hinkle many years ago when we needed our roof replaced. So when I realized i might have roof damage from a hail storm, I remembered Hinkle and called. So glad I did: they checked my roof, and helped me provide everything I needed to wade through the insurance claim. So easy today work with...excellent workmanship!!

resp.text: Thank you! We love knowing that some customers choose us, because their parents worked with us years ago.

name: Jean Lorino
text: I give Hinkle Roofing the highest possible rating.  They were quick to respond to my phone call, quick with an estimate and excellent with the work performed.  I highly recommend this company.  Chris was the representative that I dealt with from Hinkle and he was awesome!

name: Ronald Shinn
text: We had to wait (very patiently) several months before getting our new roof due to the huge amount of rain this summer and also the hail damage we experienced last spring was not so bad that it caused any leaks. Consequently we were in no specific hurry. Well worth the wait! Two full days of intense work left our home with beautiful new architectural shingling, a great cleanup job and a friendly crew with whom to work. My contractor friend also looked over the job and cleanup today and he was very impresssed with the quality of the job. Our house is strikingly more impressive with this great shingling and excellent work, and I thank the owners, supervisors and great crew for this workmanship and quality of materials.

resp.text: This rain has been incredible.  Thank you for your patience and glad you are happy with your new roof.  Thank you very much for the review!

name: Ivory Kangah
text: Awesome piece of history.  Food was very good.

name: The Eaves Family
text: I am glad everyone else had great experience with them. We have gone back and forth with them for months. It took 4 weeks, calling every week, just to get someone to even come out and check. Now we have a huge water spot on our bedroom ceiling, due to a rotting chimney that they claimed they would give us an estimate within a day. THAT took us calling them and still not getting it until 2 weeks later. They have yet to get back in touch with us still  for the corrected estimate. It's been 3 months total waiting, almost four. Now we have an even bigger problem on our hands. It's partly our fault for waiting around. We have learned our lesson, and will not use them again.

name: Jeff Odom
text: Hinkle Roofing did an outstanding job. They meet me early and repaired my roof, and even tacked up a loose piece of siding, and finished before the heavy rain started. I only missed a few minutes from work that morning. I recommend Hinkle Roofing to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review and recommendation!  We appreciate your feedback.

name: Alex Casey
text: I've had nothing less than a great experience with Jeff. He shoots you straight and the quality of care of work is great. You can trust his company to get the job done and help you through any questions you may have through the process!

resp.text: Thank you Alex! We understand that the process is a whirlwind, but we love providing as much information as possible to help the customer through the job.

name: Rab Stewart
text: Hinkle roofing put a new roof on my business. They were fast, friendly, and very reasonably priced. Will defiantly use them for any and all roofing needs in the future.

name: Frank Taylor
text: Have called on Hinkle Roofing to put on roofs and check on my home roof for damage as well as installing rain gutters. The Hinkle team is professional and honest, a combination that is hard to find in our modern world. I have and continue to highly recommend them to friends.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Frank!

name: Gordon Gregory
text: Highly recommended Hinkle Roofing. Recently had a great sales guy(Jase) come out to give me a quote on a house im renovating in Northport. Got measurements and gave me a prompt quote at a reasonable price for my roof and siding. Cant go wrong with this company if you are in the West Alabama area!

resp.text: Thank you Gordon for your review! We pride ourselves in taking care of our customers in a prompt manner.

name: Rich Haynie
text: We had a roof leak from the last storm, so we called Hinkle Roofing.  Jeff Baker stopped to inspect our roof .  He found the leak and they had it repaired in record time.  Jeff Baker was on time, courteous and efficient.  We highly recommend Hinkle Roofing.

name: Hannah Tucker
text: Hinkle came out and inspected my roof. They were extremely professional and gave an honest assessment of what needed to be done. I would trust them with any project in the future.

name: John Nelson
text: Called Hinkle Roofing when I noticed signs of leaks.  I expected to be told I needed a new roof but was informed I had a couple vent pipes that were leaking that could easily be repaired.  During their inspection they also found a small section of roof that had been damaged which they also repaired.  When they left you could not tell, by looking, that any repairs had been made.  It has been about six months all is dry.  I will use Hinkle in the future when the need arises.  Great company, people & service.

resp.text: Thank you so much John! Here at Hinkle, we want to be honest with our customers and not sell them something that they do not need.

name: Andrea Hays
text: Hinkle Roofing provides excellent service! They were very helpful and did high-quality work. I would highly recommend!

They didn't call back to set an appointment 😮

name: Jennifer Hargreaves

name: Clay Forman
text: Nothing but good things to say about Hinkle. Great service. Timely work.

name: Keith Keller
text: Great team, great leadership, dependable folks. Give them a call to experience their great service!

resp.text: Thank you Keith for your review!

name: Mike Seals
text: Great folks who work to earn your business.  I highly recommend the great folks at Hinkle Roofing.

name: Stephen Keith
text:
I was chosen by our little town home complex's HOA (eight units, in Highland Park) to coordinate the installation of a new roof.  The complex was built in the early eighties, so had two layers of roof needing to be scraped off before the new was installed.  We got quotes from three roofing companies and decided on Hinkle.  What a great decision it turned out to be!

From the finalization of the contract with the salesman, Logan, to coordinating the work with Billy, the project manager, to the completion of the work by Sergio and his crew, we could not have been better served.  These guys are good.  The work was done quickly, efficiently and professionally, and with a minimal of inconvenience.  They protected the property from damage while they worked, while fastidiously cleaning the debris as it was generated.

We chose the 50-year architectural shingles.  The change is dramatic.  The old buildings look new again.   And aside from the long-life shingles, the roof comes with Hinkle's five-year guarantee against leaks.

Hinkle has been in business in Birmingham for over a century.  I can see why.  They are very, very good at what they do.  Highly recommended.

name: B C Dorough
text: Had hail damage & their crew came in & replaced our roof quickly with minimal mess. Roof looks great.

name: Charles McClellan
text: Fantastic company with high ethical standards doing quality work at a very competitive price!

name: Bo Farlow
text: Hinkle has helped me twice with minor roofs leaks over the past several months.  The first time, I had someone tell me that I had hail damage and needed an entire new roof.  Hinkle came out, fixed a few bad shingles and saved me thousands!  All of their employees have the highest integrity and I won't be using another roofer.  Cannot recommend them enough!

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out to Hinkle for your roofing needs.  We appreciate your review!

name: James Kerr
text: Hinkle did a great job replacing a rotten eve at my home!  I would highly recommend them for roofing, windows, gutters or other home repairs.

text: Hinkle Roofing did an excellent job on our roof. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

text: Quality dependable service, they fixed our roof after a tree fell on the house.  The fixed the damage before any further damage was caused by the hole in the roof.

name: Logan Greene
text: Called Hinkle Roofing to set up an estimate on a roof leak. Scheduled for 4 PM the next day.  On that day the gentleman did not show up and by 4:40 I called him and I was informed he was to busy to come out to do my estimate and forgot to call to reschedule. Very poor customer service.

resp.text: Dear Mr. Greene - Apologies we were not able to make it out at the scheduled time.  You definitely should have received a call from us when we knew we were running late.  We do our best to keep to our scheduled appointments and to keep our customers informed when schedules change.  We've been fixing and replacing roofs for over 100 years and a majority of the time we get it right.  But we fell short this time and apologize for the inconvenience.

text: I hired a roofing contractor to do my roof i found out that he didn't have a license after he went up and cleaned my roof luckily i didnt sign a contract with him the rain was on the way. I call hinkle they came out they was honest gave me a great price and did a wonderful job take it from me call the professional hinkle is the best company around

name: Amanda Harmon
text: We are very happy with our new roof. David Dailey was prompt and professional. He kept in touch to let me know of any changes in our installation date. They were able to complete the roof in one day. Cardinal cleaned up all materials and even came back the next day to make certain no nails were left behind. I would recommend Cardinal Roofing to anyone looking at repairing or replacing their roof. Call David Dailey. He was wonderful to work with.

name: Bryan Whitehouse
text: I contracted Cardinal Roofing about two years ago to replace my Roof due to some storm damage. The process was extremely easy with my cardinal rep and they worked directly with my insurance company to setup the replacement And handle the paperwork. I’ve never had a roof replaced and I was worried that the replacement would take 5-7 days like my Next door neighbors roof. However cardinal’s crew finished my roof within 24 hours (start to finish). Let me say my roof is huge so I was shocked. This part was the bonus the benefits for me was speed, warranty and the product used.  I was so impressed I recommended to my neighbors to uses them (four) and each of them had nothing but good things to say about their work and quality. So if you’re looking at a replacement i would encourage you to speak to these folks first. Sincerely BRYAN in Hoover Alabama

name: Megan Morton
text: Cardinal Roofing recently replaced our roof in Pelham and did a fabulous job. Very professional, friendly, and efficient staff. Ryan was super nice and so easy to work with. He was very accommodating to our work schedules and he also gave us step by step before, during, and after the job. He then followed up to be sure we were satisfied with the job and answered last minute questions.  The clean up crew was also awesome! Matt did an wonderful job cleaning up our property. He made sure all nails and any evidence of them being there was taken care. He even blew off the whole yard and driveway for me. I definitely give this company a fully satisfied 5 stars 😁👌🤗

name: Susan Lee
text: I called and had to leave a message and heard back from someone the next morning.  Sales rep came out and needed to send someone to get on the roof to determine the quote.  After waiting 5 days from initial call, the worker came out and got on the roof and then left.  I did not hear back from the rep, so two days later I called them.  The rep was not aware the worker had even been out and assured me he would call back with a quote that day.  That was a week after the initial call.  I never heard from him again.  Later that day I called another company and they came out the next morning and fixed the issue.  I waited a full week for Cardinal to call me back so I could inform them that it was already fixed another week passed (2 weeks from initial call) and no one has called back with a quote or any other contact.  It was an easy fix, took the other company less than 30 min to fix.  Poor service.  I did call the office today and spoke to the manager and he has assured me they will do more training with my sales rep to ensure better service.

name: Ashton Horton
text: Cardinal Roofing were great to work with. Very quick and knowledgeable. I am a young home owner and was honestly putting off replacing my roof because it seemed more daunting then it had to be. Ryan and his team helped me through the entire process. Literally put my roof on in a day, when I’ve had neighbors with teams working for a week. If you are looking for fast, friendly, reliable service give Ryan a call!

name: jonah allen
text: I had gotten approval from my insurance to replace mu roof and was hesitant on who to call, trust and ask questions. I was referred to Ryan Vidischak by a friend. He took the time to come out and go over the insurance scope of work, answer all the questions and gave me an incredible price on upgrading to a premium roof. Highly recommend him and Cardinal roofing.

name: Cory Spradlin
text: We had a very good experience using Cardinal Roofing. They helped us with our claim and were always available to answer questions. Our contact, Josh, was a huge help and kept us on track through the entire process  Highly recommend

name: Jason Horvath
text:
Salesman Kevin was very knowledgeable and convincing that Champion Windows is the best option and we would have no issues so  I cancelled my appointment with a competitor for the next day. Kevin mentioned it would take 6-8 weeks (possibly as little as 3 weeks) but there was absolutely NO communication from Champion the whole 8 weeks. On week #6 half the bill was charged with interest with NO work being completed and no communication on when it would be completed/started. When this was addressed with Charlie (owner) it was ignored and not resolved. There was no mention of us being charged BEFORE work was completed. We called the Champion local office twice with no response. On the 3rd time we called corporate and Damon (installation manager) quickly returned my call.
The installation guys were 40 minutes late from appointment time, again with NO communication. I had to call to find out they needed to stop and get caulk on the way to my house. I would think they would have been prepared with the proper equipment prior to the customer's appointment time.
The installers were polite and professional, however I brought up some quality issues during the installation process that did not get properly taken care of until they said they were leaving causing them to stay longer and redo some of their work. (Gap in the J-molding, they wanted to caulk the gap, not fix it) Corporate called me wanted me to sign a form stating the job was done even though the installers were still here finishing the job.  When I mentioned the issues regarding some other problems (window & screen defects) Damon called me to come out to resolve the issues.
Bottom Line: Customer service and apologies goes a long way. I feel that I had reach out and try to communicate to get the work done that costs thousands of dollars. As a customer, I should not have to work as hard as I did to get the job done properly which is still in progress.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Jason. We use this feedback to make sure our services are nothing less than the best for all our customers. We are sorry to hear that you had a poor experience with us. If you would like to reach out to us in national customer care to speak further, please call us at 513-327-7338. Thank you.

name: James Tynan
text:
5 Stars -They did a great job in 2017 when they installed my sunroom.
0 Stars - In the last few months (April-May 2021) I have been trying to get in touch with someone, anyone, at Champion anywhere from Huntsville Alabama to their offices in Cincinnati. I have spoken to a few people that have given me nothing but a runaround. Several promised they would work out my issue and follow it through to a satisfactory conclusion. Nothing happening so far and based on recent past experience, I'm not holding my breath.
All I am trying to do is get a pet door that fits the wall in may 3 season room. I'm willing to consider buying it out right or having them install it. Can't even get anyone to talk to me about it.

resp.text: James, We want to sincerely apologize for your negative experience with us. We want to make things right. Please call us in our national customer care office directly at (513) 327-7338 at your earliest convenience. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Todd Long
text:
Called Champion after some siding was blown off the house in a storm.  Quick to respond (unlike other companies, who just didn't seem to have the time), came out, gave me a quote.

Their representative (Matt) was on time, very friendly, explained the entire process to me (including payment options) and by the time he was done, I felt comfortable about signing on the dotted line.

They'll be coming out to do the work soon, but so far, so good when it comes to dealing with Champion.

resp.text: Todd, we are delighted to hear we provided a top-notch experience! Thank you for taking the time to write this review. It is wonderful to hear we were able to provide you with excellent service.

text: I scheduled my consultation appointment online and got text and email reminders, which I appreciated. Michael showed up on time today to walk me through a plan for my (future) sunroom. He explained the options, showed me pictures and samples, explained warranty information, answered all my questions and described next steps. He provided a cost estimate and showed me all the applicable discounts, and I am happily moving forward. I can’t speak to the final product yet, but I was very pleased with my consultation. Thank you Michael, especially for the times you said “if this were my house...” which really helped me make decisions while we were going through options.

name: Judy Shockey
text: I have lived in a home with Champion Windows before, and I really enjoyed their performance and ease of use. So when I bought another home that needed window replacements, I naturally decided to go with Champion Windows. They were installed just prior to a hard freeze, and suddenly I had no more drafts. The installation was very professional as well, and I was impressed with how many times the windows were measured to insure that the replacements would really fit properly. I'm very pleased with the appearance of the windows inside and out, and I look forward to lower heating and cooling bills, based on my previous experience with them. I'm confident the new windows add tremendous value to my home, and I highly recommend Champion Windows.

I'm not the original owner so I am required to pay a $99 service fee just to have them come and look at it. I was told by them it was probably "just a bad batch," so there is no way I'm paying a fee for them to come and tell me that in person. We have 10 more windows that will eventually need to be replaced and based off our current ones, we will absolutely go with someone else.

text:
Update:  I have called their cooperate office twice this week.  Once on Tuesday and once on Thursday.  Both times I got voice mail for two different people. One is damaged (again) and I haven't heard back from anyone as to when the replacement will arrive or when it might be installed.  Since I still owe you over $8,000 maybe when you reconcile your books someone will take notice.  I have no idea how on earth you stay in business while conducting business in this manner.  No one ever answers at the Huntsville AL office and clearly people at the cooperate office do NOT return calls, nor do they seem at all concerned.  I'm regretting this whole deal.

name: Cat Taps
text:
We contacted the toll-free number for Champion Windows (please know: this # is not your local Champion dealer but just a service...I hope!) for 6 months!  We just wanted a person to come by and talk to us about a new sunroom. This phone system service (meaning=the "trained" people manning the phones) is highly disorganized! Perhaps it is because of the virus? Leaving messages or even setting up appointments to meet with a representative and that representative never showed is very disheartening. (0 stars for that set-up-an-appt craziness.) Corporate office? You need to get that fixed! Perhaps employ another phone service to answer your toll calls? 🤔

FINALLY...after months of calls...we got our Champion reps at our home.

Matt and Charles came to us in East Limestone from the Huntsville office which is by the airport. Having already had sales presentations by two competitors, we knew what to expect in their presentation. They immediately realized we were most interested in quality and price for our new sunroom.

Matt was thorough in showing us the construction of their unique products. He even had samples to demonstrate the sunroom's best attributes.

We were surprised at the price. Matt was precise and clear on it. One contract, too, one price. Never additional hidden fees. Perhaps we contacted them at the correct time since it is December after all. 😁 Good price for the quality...the sunroom we chose actually can be added to our home square footage.

Charles invited us to come by their showroom. I suggest everyone do this! Seeing several sunrooms already set up truly helps in your decision process versus just seeing magazine quality sunrooms in their catalogs.

Charles even brought us to the back of where products are custom made for every sunroom. These are not kits. We went for the 6in depth walls. Seeing the sun rooms in the office and showroom also convinced us to go ahead with additional products. Charles was not pushy at all. We made these decisions on our own.

Both Matt & Charles also gave us their personal cell phone numbers and we have called them several times. They have always been available -immediately-. We appreciate this courtesy! (Those 5 ⭐'s for them.)

Having read 1-🌟 reviews from a year ago...yikes! We decided to see for ourselves and really tested our sales team. We also detected this Huntsville office was working to improve themselves. So far? We are off to a good start. We are waiting for construction people to come and measurable are sunroom. Hope to bring you up-to-date after this happens.

resp.text: Hello Cat, We really appreciate the time you took to leave such a detailed and thoughtful review! We hope we can continue to provide great service throughout your project!

name: Jeffrey Cole
text:
The other Google reviews they have are accurate! We worked with Matt Jackson to get a quote, but he kept changing pricing every time we asked him to calculate it for us. He lied to tell us about what the windows would look like, and told us the installers were all Champion employees - which they are not. Champion will contract your job out to unprofessional, inexperienced, cheap laborers. Their sub-contractors repeatedly left our house completely open to the elements for hours and even days at a time which led to many issues for which Champion refused to accept responsibility. We spoke to Corey, the install manager, Rob McCauley, the regional manager, and even a national customer service manager - all who insisted the issues we experienced were not Champion's fault. Corey's temper when we involved Rob in communicating our concerns was completely unprofessional. Rob offered to give us a gift card for dinner as a compensation for the trouble we experienced (what a joke!). The national customer service manager threatened me and swore at me when I insisted Champion make the right the issues we experienced.

This company is full of dishonest, unprofessional, and unexperienced people charging high prices for a product of average quality.

UPDATE IN RESPONSE TO CHAMPION'S RESPONSE: If nothing else, please take Champion's sarcastic response to my feedback as a token of their lack of professionalism. You can see from the reviews of others that our experience is not an outlier, but rather the norm for how Champion operates. Of course we noted our windows had just been replaced - WE SPENT OVER $12,000.00 ON THEM.

CHAMPION WILL LIE TO YOU, SEND SUB-PAR CONTRACTORS TO INSTALL THEIR AVERAGE-QUALITY WINDOWS, AND THEN STEAL YOUR MONEY AND DO EVERYTHING THEY CAN TO MAINTAIN THEIR FACADE TO TRAP OTHERS - DO NOT FALL FOR IT!

name: Steve Palmer
text: Excellent Product, Install and Service! This is a good long read. We have a home that has 32 windows. These windows were from the original build back in 1999. Over time these windows failed, broke internal components, were loose, didn't stay up and let so much air in between them; it really hurt our HVAC bills. We decided to look at new windows. We went through the hoops and ringers with various window companies in the area and the big box stores. The price ranges were all over the place and the functions, options, features and price points were the driving factors in this big home reno purchase. We called Champion (CW going forward) and had our salesman Whit come out and give his sales pitch. He did a great pitch and was at our house for 4 plus hours. Going over every detail and question we had. He was not afraid to say "I don't know, but I will find out" and called ahead to ask with us on his speakerphone right in front of him. He never stepped out to his truck to ask; he just did it right in front of us. We wanted an answer and he went and got one. Good bad or indifferent there was no empty promises or sugar coated answers. We were explained all the finance options and the promo they were having during our consultation. We beat him up pretty good with our wants and needs for the windows. After that was done, Cory then came out a few days later and walked me through the measurement process; again answering my rhetorical questions and others I missed with Whit. He took meticulous measurements of ALL my windows and explained what my casements would be and how they would sit in the frame. I walked through the house with and he asked questions to me about each room as he measured and took detailed notes. We discussed the order that was first taken to verify everything was right...the first time. He explained the install and what was done with that process from top to bottom. As well as what to expect with financing options again. Making this as streamlined as possible. He explained our order, what timeline for delivery was and the timeline of the install process once the windows arrived from the factory. Once our windows arrived in Huntsville, we were given a few choices on the install. We picked the date that worked on our schedule and a timeframe that made sense for the install. Once again, were explained the who what when were and how on the install team. The install team was on time the first day with everything ready and planned out so they could hit the ground running. Jimmy Mashburn and Brandon Clark were the install team and they were incredible. I have OCD about fit and finish and so does this install team. Jimmy talked with my wife so she would get the understanding of the install and what she could expect. He didn't make her feel silly for asking and was very professional with each question. We, of course stayed out of the way, but if either side had a question about a window, my wife and or Jimmy/Brandon made sure both parties were on the same page. They took their time and set everything right the first time. We didn't care how long it took and they were very meticulous and detail driven on each window. They were not in any hurry to just set 'em and forget 'em. It was done right the first time. I'm no installer but I'm a homeowner that bought 32 windows so I was wanting to find something wrong or find a shortcut that I saw...NOPE! I couldn't find anything that I felt was incorrect or not done in a make sense manner. Everything was top notch work. All my old windows were removed and stacked out of the way. Drop cloths were placed inside on each opening to make sure the removal was as clean and clutter free. All of the windows were set correctly, openings were cleaned from past dirt and debris. Professional 100%!! I felt that my money was going to the right company for our home. These are big decisions to make when getting new windows and the value of the CW product met our families need. We are truly very happy with our windows and would recommend CW to anyone!! We are very happy we went with Champion!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to leave this great review. Enjoy your windows! -Champion Customer Care

resp.text: We are sorry you are having issues and would like to speak to you about those issues.  Can you please provide your contact information or you can reach us at 888-395-0041 National Customer Care.

name: John Tyler
text: What a miserable experience working with this company. They do not care about their customers or the quality of their product installation. Look for another company and do not use Champion windows huntsville.

resp.text: Champion apologizes for not meeting your expectations and would like to hear how we can improve our service. Please call 888-395-0041. Champion Customer Care

name: Ronald Bunnell
text: Straight forward salesman.  Quick response.  Joe is the guy to talk to.

resp.text: Ronald, thank you for the positive review.  Joe will be happy to hear.  Champion Windows Customer Care.

name: The Stever’s
text: Prices are crazy high we found better deals else where

resp.text: We are sorry we were unable to accommodate your expectations.

name: James James
text: Had a VERY bad experience with this company. Will definitely never use again!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving your feedback about your experience, we apologize we fell short of your expectations and would love to discuss the issues that occurred. Please contact at 888-395-0471

name: George S
text: There is not one positive thing about this company. I will never use Champion Windows again and I encourage you to look elsewhere also.

name: Joshua Adams
text: Such a terrible experience with this company. I will never use them again for anymore home improvement.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Champion we will like to discuss further with you about your experience. If you could please  contact us at 888-395-0041. Thank you, National Customer Care

name: John G
text: My elderly parents selected Champion to perform a number of exterior projects on their home. I had to get involved as the salesman took advantage of them and the installers did more of the same. The management turned a blind eye to the issues and hung my parents out to dry. My parents will never use this company again and I want to make sure no one else does either.

resp.text: Champion apologizes and would like to speak to you about the issues your parents experienced, Please contact 888-395-0041. Champion Customer Care

name: Patricia Fernandez
text: Thank u michelle for ur quick response to my window breaking. Champion deserves 5 plus stars. They have alwsys taken good care of me for my house with all champion window.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Patricia. Thanks for the review! -Champion Customer Care

name: Marie Held
text:
Customer service at Champion is extremely poor.  After waiting 9 weeks for a replacement for a single panel of a patio door, that was busted during a home robbery,   the installer was upset because I was going up to Flint, MI for my daughter's graduation.

Champion works on their own time with absolutely NO consideration for the customer.

name: Mark A
text: This company does not deliver the quality or service that they promise. Highly disappointed by Champion Windows.

resp.text: Champion would love to make everything right, Please contact our Customer Care 888-395-0041 so we can address you concerns.

name: Matt D.H.
text: Terrible quality and customer service. Waste of money using this company.

resp.text: Champion apologize that we feel short of your expectations, if you please call 1-888-395-0041 we would love to discuss the issues. Champion Customer Care

name: Nancy Manning
text: I tried to use the chat option on the website. Very rude person. Would never use them

resp.text: Thank you for contacting Champion and we are very sorry for your experience.  If you could please provide your contact information or contact us at 888-395-0041  Thank you National Customer Care

name: Brigitte Clark
text: Highly recommend! They installed a very nice roof, which is much appreciated. Thomas Babington, is very through, competent and diligent in his job.

name: Cindy Beets
text: We had a Sally damaged roof. BMC put tarps on it in a timely manner. They were swamped with requests for help so there was a delay on doing the new roof.  The roofing crew arrived at 7:30 am and proceeded to remove the old roof. They finished that, installed the new roof and did an excellent cleanup in 10 hours! We would highly recommend Ben Murphy Roofing.

name: Denise Launius
text: Never completed the job. Would not even meet with my husband and I to go over the issues that we had. Very unprofessional and workmanship was the worst!

name: Nathaniel “Ryan” Bowman
text: Disconnected gas vent pipe but did not reconnect.  No return call when asked for them to send someone out to reconnect.  I planned to do some work changing out lights in the attic and just happened to notice.  I could have died of carbon monoxide poisoning.  Very serious.  Very dangerous.

name: Michael Mitchell
text: Sometimes pictures speak volumes. Some day I will get this matter corrected. As a proud and thankful homeowner who believes in the safety and well being of his family, I had to share my dissatisfaction after contracting the BMR. This work was "completed" in December of 2017 and yes I've tried to get things mitigated to no end. In the meantime, "Go Navy"!

resp.text: Hello Mr. Mitchell, we sincerely apologize for your experience. We have been taking the steps with you to make you a completely satisfied customer.

name: teresa lawson
text: Ben Murphy subcontracted a job to my company. We did the job. Then we were given change orders. Ben Murphy did not pay us $1500 on one change order. He asked my business partner to do more work as a Christmas present to him, & not charge him. We told him we do not work for free. When we pressed him for payment, he acknowledged we did excellent work, but said he was not paying us the $1500 he owes. The trim guys told us he did not pay them either. Do not trust this man.

resp.text:
Mrs. Lawson,
We would like to extend a sincere apology regarding this recent issue. The foundation of BMC is the production of the exceptional results based on the highest expectations. Unfortunately, this standard was not met during the project. If you would like to discuss any further concerns, please contact our office at (251)943-7144

name: Aileen Fountain
text: Ben is great to work with.  Honest and dependable I highly recommend!!!  He built a house for me and he did a wonderful job.  Everyone commented on what a beautiful house and the amazing quality of construction.  If you want a great local builder that will build a high quality home, then Ben is the contractor to call.

resp.text: Thank you for your great review Mrs. Fountain!

name: Rob Bantivoglio Jr
text: I having been working with Ben and his company for the past several years and could not be happier. Ben and his Team helped me completely renovate my beach front home in Gulf Shores. The work they do is very meticulous and pride is taken to every detail. Ben’s Team did it all from new bathrooms, new exterior doors, carpets, repaired ceilings and walls, kitchen upgrades, repaired decks and whole house painting interior and exterior and more. Ben stands by his work and will make sure that everything is done right or he will make it right. Ben and his Team are a top notch and a true pleasure to work with. I highly recommend Ben for whatever project you may have in mind.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. Bantivoglio! We are so happy you are completely satisfied with our work! We couldn’t be more proud of the job we did and working for you!

name: Archie McMillan
text: Couldn't be happier with the work Ben Murphy Roofing did on my house.  Very professional and excellent attention to detail.  Would certainly recommend to anyone needing work!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. McMillan!

name: Karen Willemsen
text: Ben Murphy just completed my roof. His team is very professional. They did an excellent job replacing my roof in a timely manner. They also did a excellent clean up when the job was done.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Karen!

name: Jason Jarrell
text: GREAT COMPANY, BEN AND HIS TEAM ARE VERY PROMPT AND PROFESSIONAL

resp.text: Thank you Jason for the great review!

name: barrett bischoff
text: They put a new roof on for us and it is absolutely beautiful. Good communication and quality work.

resp.text: Thank you Barrett! We appreciate your business!

name: Bill Stone
text: quick efficient service,very professional.was also quick to respond when we had questions or concerns

resp.text: Thank you for your great review Bill! We appreciate you!

name: Nathan Lippincott
text: Amazing company! Great people to work with!

resp.text: Thank you so much Nathan!

name: mark underwood
text: Prompt and professional.  Ben Murphy Roofing did a fantastic job.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mark! We appreciate you!

name: Mandy Haber
text: Professional and timely with great attention to detail!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Mandy! It was great working with you!

name: Alan Dykes
text: Great company to work with.

resp.text: Thank you Alan!

name: Michael Beauchamp
text: Great to work with.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Micheal! It was our pleasure!

name: Lindsay Ellinas
text: Consistent SPAM FAXES from this business.  I have requested to be removed from the list and treated with condescension and disrespect.  And then continued to receive the faxes.

name: Tara Delegram
text: This entire company is professional, courteous, and good at what they do!!! From the first SSR employee I came in contact with to the final, each were informative and handled things well beyond a timely manner. I will always recommend them.

name: Christopher Herrington
text: Doing business with Jagris Has turn my whole family’s life around plus mine if you need anything for a reasonable price with the best quality around town or the Quad cities I would talk to my boss man we are always on time and we always keep a positive attitude and the homeowner is always happy with our business. It’s either Jagris inc or keep a leak. Free estimates and life time work

name: Jerry Wilson
text: Workers were prompt and very good.Cleaned and picked up all trash. I recommend this company.

name: Ana Maegan Knight
text: Our gutters were installed a year ago by John. Our gutters were then broken in the snow/ice storm. (We had between of 4-5 inches of ice on our metal roof. They did not fall, they were badly damaged, but still standing. That says a lot about their quality of work.) John went above and beyond to help with not only the gutter removal and then reinstall, but also with the insurance claim. He personally emailed and called our insurance agent, insurance adjuster, and met the adjuster on site.

name: David Fretwell
text: Matthew Jr. and his crew did a outstanding job very pleased with their work and communication I would refer them to anybody.

name: Jeff Conley
text: If you need any kind of roofing or gutters Johnny Grissom is the one you want doing the work for you or to help you get it done

name: Jack Vetra
text: We do the highest quality work for the best price around. All of our work is guaranteed

name: Jerell Kearse
text: This is by far the best roofing company in Alabama. Amazing customer service and very outstanding workers in this company. They came out to my house fast and prompt in my time of need and handled business. GREAT PRICES !!!!

name: Trey Harrell
text: A company of their word. Very professional company that does amazing work. Thanks guys!

name: Albert Peterson
text: Cool people there

name: anthony givens
text: John Grissom has a good company, and will keep his word and make any problem you have right.

name: John Grissom
text: GREAT WORK! GREAT PRICES!

name: Duane Cass
text: Frank is amazing he really knows his stuff and has great pricing from roofed to framing to floors even full construction on addition I would highly recommend them very responsible and professional

name: Allen Jones
text: Frank is very professional and knows his stuff. He also takes the time to explain everything and show you pictures of the issue. I'd definitely recommend them for all your roofing needs.

name: John Chesnut
text: Frank and Amanda did an excellent job. They were very thorough in explaining what was going on.The job was completed in about an hour at a very reasonable price. I would recommend them for all of your Roofing  needs

name: Richard Ring
text: They are professional and courteous always on time I'm very friendly I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Jessica Weathers
text: Frank was excellent. He was very informative and reliable. I couldn't ask for better service.

name: Shelia Wood
text:
I had to have my breaker box replaced and Frank went above and beyond to make sure that everything was perfect even added extra outlets on the outside and rates were reasonable he and his helper were very respectful, and caring when the job took longer than anticipated they did not complain and stayed with it till job was done I would highly reccomend them to anyone for anything you need done.
I would like to say thank you so much Frank for changing my breaker box out it was well worth it it lowered my power Bill by almost a hundreds dollars a month

name: Andy Befort
text: I was an employee that was relieved because of someone else opinion. An email was read to me from the owner cursing and calling me names. How immature! He never met me or had a conversation with me. A MAN, would have said it to their face if they choose to talk like that. Management very poor. You got a 18/19-year-old running a crew ,that's been fired before form this company. The only reason he's a leadman is because his daddy's a manager ! What is that? I wasn't a customer like I said an employee. They have so many crews doing so many jobs they can't keep up with things. I'm grateful it was short and sweet for me.

name: Chelsea Davis
text: This is a great company with good morals and even better customer service! Bobbie (the owner) is a honest man and would do anything he could to help you!! I highly recommend this business!!!

name: Michael Maser
text: Best place to get trusses

name: MISTY R
text: Extreme water damage from rain while they worked at my grandmothers home. She was 83 and could have been hurt badly when her ceiling fell down in several rooms. Thay did not cover the damages. Not licensed or bonded.

name: David Allen
text: Did not return phone calls

name: J316
text: Jerry did a great job repairing my missing shingles. Very nice man.

name: Deborah Tankersley
text: Mr. Goodson is a straight up good man. My roof was damaged during bad thunderstorms and high winds. Ins paid and I paid my deductible. Just met him today 3/20/2021. My dad, Jack, has been knowing him for years. Great workmanship, great employees, great prices.  I highly  recommend!

name: Jerame Burke
text: Wonderful business, very hard working employees.  Very affordable, it cost less to put a metal roof on than shingles with many other businesses.  Highly recomend!

name: dugc
text: Had Mike Goodson Roofing do our metal roof installation. From start to finish they did an excellent job. The crew was very professional and knowledgeable. The price was reasonable. Very pleased with the finished product. I highly recommend using Mike Goodson Roofing.

name: Jacob Lawrence
text: Mike goodsons team did a great job on my roof a few months back. Great quality metal roof installed by a team that definitely knows there stuff. There was quite a bit of structural damage to my roof and they repaired and replaced it all with ease. Great price as well. Thanks guys

name: Bonnie HCG
text: Awesome roofing job done by very nice people.  Price was a great deal for the amount of work and the quality.   Workers  made sure the area was cleared of any debris and cleaned up before they left.  Very pleased and would highly recommend Mike Goodson Roofing to everyone!

name: Rob Trujillo
text: Excellent job re-roofing my home.  Top quality work with beautiful results.  Price better than other estimates obtained.  He even made good on a driveway repair from cracking where the dump truck was parked on the edge of my driveway.  I would recommend him to anyone needing roof repairs.

name: Pop's Garage
text: Said he was going to come and give me an estimate on a roof repair made a promise on two different occasions and didn't keep either one of them

name: KEITH JEWELL Straight-Line PARKING LOT MAINTENANCE
text: locally own family operated mike has been in business for years great service to quality work

name: Christy Gamble
text: Great work Kind service

name: Chris hawkins
text: Awesome staff. 5 stars

name: Luke Thurman
text: The best roofers around here

name: Johnny Dillow
text: It's good, good people, it's good business, it's good qaulity!!!

name: Todd Chancey
text: Great job No problems

name: Cathy Thomas
text: Beautiful installation  of the rool

name: Samantha Howard
text:
Continental Roofing Company is very professional and cares about their employees and customers. The training week was very helpful and gave me every opportunity to do my very best. The other members of the staff care very much about one another and the sense of family is apparent when you enter the front door. I highly recommend working here if you are interested in working for a company that cares about their employees and is very professional. Also Trey Gilbert is a very caring manager and inspector, he has been so helpful during my training and making sure I can do my very best!
- Samantha Howard

name: M P
text: Continental was quick to come out when a tree feel on my house.  Fortunately, there was only a dent in our gutter and no damage to the actual roof, which Continental had recently repaired.  Great company!

name: Tanner Wilkerson
text: This being my third roof replacement in my lifetime I cringed thinking about something this major and of cost.  I chose Continental and can say it was the best home repair/improvement experience I have seen.  Jorge, company rep, came to my home and we hammered out the details and expectations in 5 minutes.  He was very professional and, most importantly, personable with a friendly attitude.  I was further impressed with the quickness they got my roof on after that initial meet.  The crew on site worked quickly but thoroughly.  My roof looks great, the work is quality, and my perimeter was cleaner of debris after they left  than when they arrived.  10/10 I would recommend from my recent experience.

name: Harmony Gilbert
text: The roofing academy is different from any other recruiting I’ve used through. They are professional, helpful & they honestly treat you like family! Great place of employment if i could give 100 stars i would.

name: Michael Anthony
text: From day one, Zee was so professional and made this big decision a breeze! Communication, work, on time, know how...all of it with Continental.  Do yourself a favor and let these guys come out and inspect your roof and see if they can help like they did us! 5 stars isn't enough

name: Pascual Rico
text: It was a pleasure working with such a professional team to install a roof. From the initial meeting to discuss requirements to installing the roof to the cleaning up during installation and after completion of the job it was done it such a way that it exceeded my expectations. It amazed me how they kept the place clean and protected my landscape while performing their tasks. Brandon Watkins kept me informed of what was being done along the way and the installers showed me the additional minor repairs they were doing to keep the roof in top condition. Thank you Brandon, Ana, Lucio and the rest of the team.

name: Skye Haggenmaker
text: Continental Roofing has been the most professional place I have yet to be employed. Not only is it professional, it's a very welcoming environment, everyone is friendly, and they all make sure you feel welcome every time you walk through the door. You can tell their customers are the most important aspects of thier business, and it shows in every conversation you have with anyone who is employed there. The Continental Roofing Academy was very thorough, and they always took the time to make sure everyone had thier chance to ask questions or speak thier price about the topic. I would recommend anyone to jump at an opportunity to be employed with Continental Roofing!

name: Phillip Mcguire
text: The roofing academy has been so informative! I feel so much better prepared to start a new career!

name: Pastor Trey Gilbert
text: The roofing academy here prepares people for the best possible outcomes. The instructors, information, and presentation is phenomenal. This the best place t work if you’re interested in going into this field of work!

name: DeAnne Emerson
text: Zee was polite, responded to my calls and texts immediately.  We would definitely use them again and recommend them to friends!

name: Brad Solomon
text: Zee was excellent to work with and coordinated well with our USAA insurance adjuster to get us a good deal. Would recommend the company and Zee personally for future work

name: charles swofford
text:
I guess a simple mistake can lead to more
I would to take what i said before back and would give them a chance.

name: c smith
text: Jorge Sanchez was professional and responsive.  He was well-prepared for our appointment and did a great job explaining all of my options.  Ultimately, I did not use Continental to replace my roof at this time, but Jorge was such a good representative of the company that I wanted to review my experience with him anyway.

name: Dave Nugen
text: Continental roofing have been top quality since we hired them in 2009. Jermel Logan was very professional and listened to our issue and completed the minor repair and inspection in a timely manner. I know we can count on this company and it’s professionals to do a great job every time. Thank you guys for helping us out!

name: David Douthat
text: Had my roof replace last week. The whole process was so professional from the estimator working directly with the insurance company’s estimator   To the high quality of installation. Zee Topadze, the project manager did a great job of keeping me informed to inspecting the work at least 2-3 times a day. Very pleased with all aspects. Definitely recommend Continental Roofing

name: Jacob Shook
text: Zee Topadze and the team that came out were great. Worked very fast and hard to replace our roof. The scheduler also worked with us to get our replacement moved up due to some deadlines we had. Will use again.

name: Sara Hardin
text: My client at work (I'm a caregiver) is using them to replace their roof. This company was very nice at consulting us. I will update. After the work is done!

name: Ming Sun
text: Kevin responded quickly and was very professional!

name: Andrew Schwartz
text: Kurt Faulk was great to work with.  He was quick to answer questions and gave us a fair and reasonable price for the work we needed done.

name: peril _203
text: Professional company to do business with! Very well educated and friendly staff to work with!! Recommend 100%

name: rabelaisian
text:
About 10 years ago Continental Roofing replaced mine and several other family members roofs. All excellent work! But recent  storm damage from a tree limb broke a couple of my shingles. Thank you so much Zee and Jason for coming out this morning and repairing it so quick and like new. Zee made the command decision not to charge me. Excellent way to treat your customers.

Thank you so much,

Jeff Manus
Madison, Alabama

name: Nancy R
text: We had our roof replaced by Continental Roofing.  Zee was the representative I dealt with and he was fantastic from beginning to end.  He made the process very easy.  Texting was our mode of communication which made it so easy.  And, he stays with you through the whole process so he knows exactly what's going on and you don't have explain to anyone else at the company what you need.  After the roof was replaced, if you walked around our house you would never know anything just happened.  It was so clean!  I definitely recommend Continental Roofing.

name: Jonathan Tatum
text: The roof looks great! Zee provided great service!

name: GloJean Aldridge
text: They installed my roof 2011, no problems. They scheduled an appointment recently to do a well check, all was fine.

name: Marlene Phillips
text: Thanks so much to Jose Murdock and Continental Roofing for doing an amazing job on my new roof. I was very pleased with the workmanship. Jose was great to work with. A friend of mine recommended them to me and I would recommend them as well. Thanks again

name: Heather Mitchell
text: I love this company.  Ever since Continental Roofing put a new roof on many years ago they have been willing to come inspect my roof for free and fix any little blemish or when the squirrels ate a whole in my roof they fixed it with no charge for labor just the materials.  They have always taken care of me.

name: Brandy Olander
text: They are wonderful company. My roof looks amazing. The staff was wonderful to work with and very knowledgeable.

name: Dinah Porch
text: I called 3 roofing companies.  One never called back, the second flew over my house with a drone and told me I needed to replace the entire roof.  Continental sent Zee to my home the next day and he actually went up on the roof to inspect.  All I had to do was replace seals around the vents - the shingles are still good!  I will definitely use Continental when the time comes to replace the entire roof.

name: Dan Clark
text: Great team did complete 58 sq roofing in 2 days. Very pleased with Jorge and the team he had install the roof. They were very attentive to the job and did a wonderful job protecting plants around the house and did a thorough clean up .

name: Chip Lang
text: Very pleased with Continental roofing!  Had our roof replaced in 2008 due to hail damage.  Called about a small leak in 2020 and they sent someone immediately to take a look.  Brandon Watkins was very professional and after inspecting advised that we had two shiners (nails that had worked their way out and were rusting).  He pulled the rusted nails and caulked and didn't charge us anything!  We'll definitely use them again when the time comes for a new roof.

name: Gozzy
text: Roof replaced a few months ago by Continental did a nice looking job and cleanup was great. My roof continued to leak in the same place. Charged me 550 dollars to fix something that should have been taken care of while my roof was being replaced. I now have inside damage as a result. Very Disappointed. My concern is that they will not stand behind the workmanship. Prove me wrong

name: Tyrone Thomas
text: Zee found the problem quickly, explained the issue and how to fix it, then provided me a very reasonable price. Zee and his crew were very professional, prompt and thoroughly cleaned up after the job.

name: Brian Knowles
text: Continental Roofing replaced our roof in 2011. We had one small issue within a few months, which they promptly fixed. Since then we haven't had any issues despite many heavy and wind blown rain storms over the years. They appear to have a strong focus on flashing and water-tightness. They actually called me recently (Jan 2020) to schedule a free inspection just to see if the roof was holding up properly. They confirmed the roof is still in great shape. I highly recommend Continental Roofing.

name: Phyllis Dixon
text: I recently had a small leak due to leaves on my roof.  Continental  personnel are very thorough and helpful  . Thanks for a job well done.  I  will recommend you to my friends  if they have problems.

name: Mike Giles
text: After getting the recommendations from my neighbors I called Continental Roofing after a storm damaged my roof.  They were very prompt and accommodating to meet with my insurance adjuster the day after the claim was filed.  Jose, the sales manager was quick to respond to emails and text messages and did a great job keeping me informed as the process progressed.  They handled all the insurance paperwork and the roof was removed and replaced in a day.  The crew was fast and efficient and did a great job cleaning up after themselves.  Jose was great at keeping touch for the after roof work also of replacing gutters and window screens.  All in all I highly recommend Continental Roofing for your roofing needs.

name: Tom Mitchell
text:
Not sure about their work. They did say I definitely had enough hail damage to file a claim with my Insurance company and they would be at my house when the insurance adjuster came to inspect my roof just in case adjuster said I did
not have any damage. Guess what they were not here after I told them well in advance.  Adjuster did not find anything to pay for a roof. These guys were not here to help after they said they would.  Said they over slept... Thanks telling me I should file a claim and  not helping with providing the evidence..

name: TK Amund
text: Continental Roofing are the best! They helped us identify the reasons for leaks in our roof and made sure the proper materials were used to fix it. We highly recommend them for their roofing work and professionalism.

name: Erica Harbin
text: Our sales rep Jorge was awesome to work with and I am glad that we chose Continental.  I had in mind to use a previous company for our roof because we were pleased with them. However,  when we had let this task of the repair fall by the waste side because of our busy schedule, Jorge was the only sales rep that followed up with us. He was consistent but not aggressive. Jorge was able to educate us and help us with some of the process of the insurance claim that had become challenging and frustrated. Jorge's knowledge and  experience was super helpful. We highly recommend Continental based on our experience.

name: heavenly benn
text: I would highly recommend Continental Roofing.  They were very professional and came when they said they would and cleaned up after the install.  They also followed up to make sure I was happy with job.  Excellent customer service!

name: Paul Moran
text:
My roof suffered some hail damage over the past few years, and a small leak finally motivated me to start the process of getting it replaced. I did my homework. I got three estimates from reputable roofing companies. All the estimates were fairly close in price. The one thing that stood out with Continental Roofing over the other two was the sales representative, Keith Lewis. Keith’s knowledge and professionalism was impressive. He explained everything in great detail – the damage to my roof, the types of roofing material, warranties, cost, etc. He also took the time to meet my insurance adjuster at my home to assist him with his inspection.

The crew that came out to do the repair was just as impressive. They were very efficient and good at their job. I needed some custom work on my sun-room skylight and they were able to easily handle that while the bulk of the team was working on the main roof.  The new roof turned out awesome! I am very happy! I’ll also add that the team done a very good job cleaning up.

I highly recommend this company. At least ask them for an estimate if you’re considering a new roof and go with your gut feeling. My gut feeling proved to be correct.

name: Randal Knight
text: I had a good experience replacing my roof with this company. Their estimate was fair and the workers finished in time. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is that the workers did not pickup their lunch trash and it blew away in our neighbor’s yards.

name: Justin Chism
text: Tried having them fix my roof in the summer of '17. Quoted $1300 more than their competitor. In May of '18 I called again to have some touch up work done and they didn't keep their apt. When I called to see what the estimate was they quoted the original job. After, was told that they'd do the job for $350. I agreed and then they went and looked and said oh sorry we can only do it for $500. They refuse to go back to the original quote even after saying that's what it would cost.

name: Gordon Brown
text: I would like post this review due to  some recent statements that were posted inadvertently from another 3rd party internet private organization's  conversations toward Continental Roofing.  These inadvertent statements were taken off by Google at my request after learning of these statements.  I sincerely regret what was posted and Continental Roofing is graciously agreed to affect repairs to the roofing system on my home.  I am a previous customer customer and was very satisfied with the workmanship, quality of materials, followup customer service. So with that said, Thank You for working through this!!

name: Robert Erickson
text: Did an excellent job in completing the job in one day for my average sized house. They worked from Sun up till dark. The roof looks great, and they did a great cleanup getting all of those roofing nails which is a hassle. The continental estimater answered all my concerns.

name: Allen Krell
text: In and out in 1 day, great quality and cleanup.

name: Mary Beth Meadows Bulman
text: Wonderful people. They will work hard to do a great job and make sure you are pleased.

name: Gregory Brown
text: Second time I've used Continental Roofing.  Would use them again and would recommend them to anyone.

name: Mark Hancock
text: Good job and service

name: David L.
text: They refused to honor warranty on my mothers roof.....very disappointed in this company....poor customer service

name: myagotchanana
text: At first they were great. They worked with my insurance and got my roof replaced. But it turns out they did not seal properly around edges and the leaks started rotting my eves within a few years. By the time I discovered what was happening, several areas of my eves were totally rotted from the inside. To make matters worse, I can not even get them to give me an estimate to pay them to fix their mess.

text: I needed a roof leak repaired and the ceiling repaired from the leak. Chasity was extremely quick to respond. Her pricing was excellent. Will definitely hire again.

This company is excellent!  Very good people.

text: I really love this company and I will refer them to anyone that needs roofing work done! They were very professional and a whole lot cheaper than the other roofing companies that came out to give me an estimate.They explain to me what they needed to do and how they were going to do it. They were hard at it and didn’t stop until the job was finished. Thanks Xtreme!!!!

name: Summer Foster
text: I am so pleased with this company! These guys are the best. They showed up early and I mean 6:15 to get started and I really liked that because I am a early bird myself. They where very professional. Didnt try to put all of that fancy sales tactics that most people try to pull on customers just to get you to upgrade to make more money. I got a very  nice roof for alot less than 3 other companies I called. They finished my house in a day. They didnt leave till 8:30 but that was because they spent alit if the last hour or so cleaning my yard and made it look better than it did before they even showed up. I cant say enough good things about this company. If you want a reasonable price, great quality and top notch customer service then you need to call these guys.
