text: Very professional work! I couldn’t be more happy with their work! They came out & answered any questions I had. They talked to me in detail about what all was going to need to be done so that I fully understood what they were going to have to do. I haven't had any problems since! And my roof looks beautiful!

resp.text: Florence Stewart we are so sorry for the inconvenience  and at the moment not offering these services of metal roofing of you have any other need please dont hesitate  to call que can come out tomorrow  and look at for you if you would like please cal me thanks

text: If you have needs from gutters, roofing, flooring etc you definitely need to contact Mark with "All Around the House." He will come and give you an estimate which can't be beat for the quality of work they provide. They work with your schedule, work in a timely manner, strive for perfection and stay in contact to make sure you are pleased. I will definitely be using them again for future work.

Mark arrived to give the estimate and it was dry that day but he was on point as he explained where we would an could have water troubles with draining issues by the layout of the landscape an he was on point as we’ve seen the same issues on rainy days.
The crew he sent was a pleasure to work with, hardly even knew they was outside.

text: Quality service! We needed gutters on the back side of our house and reviews were good for All Around The House, so we decided to contact for an estimate. Mark came out while we were away and gave us an accurate estimate for lower than we were thinking, so we booked a time for him to come out and install. We only needed a small amount of gutters, but Mark and his team came out and completed the job within a couple of hours with no problem. We will definitely be using them again for any more house projects!

name: Pam Jones
text: I cannot say enough good things about All Around The House. I was in need of someone to assemble two pieces of furniture and did an internet search to find someone in my area. I found All About The House, left a voice mail, and within minutes Stephen returned my call. Luck was on my side as he had some time that same day to help me out. He and Kayla arrived on time, and they quickly got to work assembling the furniture. They worked fast but did a very thorough job, even disposing of the boxes and trash after completion. They were friendly, capable, and the price was very fair and reasonable. You never know what you are going to get when you blindly reach out to someone, and I could not be more pleased with my experience with All Around The House. I highly recommend them for your home needs!

name: Paul Fife
text: They did a beautiful job with my house I had them paint inside and outside I will have them come back and do more work for me very soon

I highly recommend AAA roofing - They are the best!

Thanks for everything
George Moore

name: Janice Hogan Franklin
text:
Flanagan Construction/TFK Roofing replaced my roof last month. I can't possibly express adequately how pleased I was with everything about the job the company did. But the key to all of it was the owner Terry Flanagan. I became aware of him through some very strange circumstances when another local company was illegally using his insurance forms to claim they were covered by his workers comp insurance. (I guess they didn't think I would verify their insurance! )
I was so impressed with Terry when I called to verify the insurance coverage that I asked him if he wanted to give me an estimate on my roof even though I was about 90+ minutes away. He did and everything that has happened since then has been flawless. He even came all they way to meet with my insurance adjuster and I think was instrumental in getting my insurance claim approved. He was on site overseeing the entire installation job. He is very impressive as a business owner as well as a person. I think he is extremely honest and fair. I highly recommend him and his company!!

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Great service they we're very polite and helpful

name: Krickkett2
text: For two days I texted them, I called the number from his truck, then I called the number on Google. No communication what do ever. Guess he's no longer in business or doesn't need the work. Next! 💁

name: David Hunter
text: We have used Roofing Chattanooga a few time for minor repairs and then a new roof on shed we turned into an office for when I work from home!

resp.text: Thanks, I am glad we were able to help you!

name: Patricia Evelsizer
text: They did a great job for me. Gave me an estimate, then found a couple of other small problems, fixed them, but stuck to the original estimate.  I like honesty.

name: Joe Messervy
text:
In short, they were awesome! William and his crew did an excellent job and made sure I was happy when the job was done! Longer review below.
Contacted William to replace my metal roof after the tornado had damaged it. My father in law had used him to do repair his roof, soffit, and facia boards when a tree fell into his house he was pleased with the results and recommended William. William came out, measured my roof, and left me a sample pamphlet along with the written estimate. My wife called and told him what we color we wanted. He came by, picked up the check for part of labor and materials and got the metal ordered. The metal was delivered 2 days after that. He and his crew removed the damaged metal roof and the old shingled roof below it. They fixed the ripples in the roof decking and replaced the old boards that weren't good anymore. They cut in around the chimney and installed the flashing properly. Thank you William for your attention to detail and for listening to my concerns and talking me through the process! You made a stressful time and process easy!

name: Philip Rasmussen
text: Mr. Berry is professional, prompt, easy to work with, and does quality work. Our roof looks great! We are so pleased. His life is an example of the American dream. He has pulled himself up by his bootstraps to build a successful business. We love our new roof and am glad to be able to support local small business.

name: Donnie Ford
text: William Berry is very reliable and prompt.  He is very knowledgeable and very professional.  The quality of his work is excellent.  I highly recommend William and the Berry Great Construction company.

name: Randall Coleman
text: Mr. Berry is a hard working observant professional individual. He knows his business very well. His wok is good quality. He is efficient and doesn't mind working hard to do a good job. He is a good example of being true to his work and customers.

name: Dennis Hundsdorfer
text: Brad runs a truly professional operation from inspection thru job completion.  For a quality, competitive roofing job delivered as and when promised I would recommend BP to everyone. It doesn't come any better.

name: Mim Fer
text:
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!
They don’t finish there job! I had a leak they came out and “put a new roof on” but didn’t sorriest workers and the owner has an attitude when I text him and asked him about the missing shingles and drip edge and why is there a gap between my roof! This company will cost you more in the long run because they skip steps and don’t finish! I’m calling another company out to fix this!!

name: J J
text: BP Roofing put a new roof on my home. Very good. Reasonably priced. Guaranteed their work for 10 years with a warranty which came in the mail. They cleaned up the debris afterwards and swept the yard with a magnet. (Safety note: Always check your yard again yourself. The more eyes the better.) Very pleased. However, a little slow to respond - may be due to just how busy they are.

name: Jennifer WIGGINS
text:
A small 2 bedroom house took over a month to complete. The job was supposed to start on a Thursday did not start till the next Wednesday. They left a section off the roof that I saw and took over another week to get it fixed. I asked for the facing to be done the day the job was done because I thought it would be included. I am not sure why, this company
Would not have told me it was not included.Due to it had to be done and they do that.  I still do not understand that.  So, after a month I have given up and hired someone else. I still have not gotten my warranty from them.  Adam ignores text and does not answer the phone 90% of the time after the job starts. Very unprofessional business.  I would pick someone else for sure.

name: Stan Gowen
text: Very pleased with the timeliness of getting to our roof after a Tornado and the quality of work done in leveling several dips in our roof, replacing necessary truss framing, and doing a quality flashing job around our chimney.

name: Michele Messer
text: Awesome folks.  They walked me through the process from start to finish.  I'm very pleased with the job they did,and  they cleaned up the area when they finished.  This is the first time I've had to have anything done to the house, and they made it easy.  They also guaranteed their work for 10 years.

name: Farmer37
text: Very pleased with BP Roofing. Mr. Adam, Jeremy and Tyler were attentive and took the time to explain the overall roof replacement process. Our experience with this company has been hassle free. I never once felt like we were being taken advantage of. The materials used were of high quality. My roof replacement date was pushed back a few days due to weather (can't control Mother Nature). The customer service I received during this project has been exceptional. I received a call once a day from the owner updating us on our project. I highly recommend BP Roofing as my husband and I are very pleased with our new roof. Thank you!

name: Jana Walker
text: These guys did a wonderful job replacing my original roof. The showed up when they said they would and communicated with me during the entire job. They also did a good job cleaning up considering how messy taking an old roof off can be. If you are shopping for a roof, give them a call.

name: Tambra Greene
text: Absolutely wonderful experience. Made it a breeze re-roofing our remodel that is over 3 hours away. Communication was great with very personalized service. And a job well done in an extremely timely manner! Thank you for making this an easy task to be completed!

name: Roger Ray
text: I am very pleased with the results from our re-roof and would definitely recommend this company.  We were going to just repair the leak around the chimney (been fighting that battle for 20 years), but after discussing with Jeremy and Adam the owner, we decided to go with a new roof.  great decision.  Adam, Jeremy, Joe and the team were professional throughout.  They were courteous, diligent in their work, and did a remarkable job with cleanup and haul away.  They went above and beyond even what was promised.  Adam came by and called to check on our satisfaction during the work and after completion.  I am a very busy man and have never written a review before (it has been 2 weeks since the roof was put on and I am just now getting around to writing the review) but I felt impressed to write one this time.  And by the way, we have had 3 thunderstorms with pouring rain, and we are completely dry.

Lastly there is a lifetime warranty on my roof with a 10 year free repairs warranty. He kept us posted at all times on the status of the job. You dont find many honest companies, but I believe this is one of them.

Oh and as long as the roof is up they can keep the sign on my lawn!

Adam was the only roofing company that talked about a warranty (5years) that was one thing that got my attention, they were able to get to the job in just a few days, Adam and his crew were always very respectful, also the price we agreed on was the price i paid. Some people in  the Jacksonville tornadoes were being quoted really low prices and then being charged a lot more, Adam is in Calhoun county, so I felt good about using him, I have nothing negative to add, it's good to do business with someone that does what they say their gonna do, go check their work out
At 41 and 42 B. Street Jacksonville Al.
Thanks Adam

You can tell that BPR&C really care about their craft and doing the job right the first time. I highly recommend Adam and his crew. As long as we are in the Jacksonville, Calhoun County area, I will call Adam for help.

name: Faith Clayton
text:
We called yesterday to get someone to replace the boot on our roof vent. We had noticed a leak from the last couple of times it had rained and we were told to call Henderson. When we called they told us a guy would be out at the house at some point that day and that he would call us before he came by. We never got a call. We tried to call and got in touch with NO ONE and They were not closed yet. They never called us to let us know that they would be unable to get to us that day. We could have called someone else to help had they done that much, at least. Not even a courtesy call. We are very upset since it looks like today was the only day we might be without rain for a bit and our roof vent is leaking into our little boy's room through the ceiling!
We will be calling again at some point tomorrow and we expect an answer for this. It's unprofessional to not even give a client a courtesy call if something comes up and the repairman can't make it. Now, tomorrow and Saturday will be rainy and our little boy's room will be dripping...and we may be dealing with mold if this is not fixed fast. I would NOT recommend this place if this is how they treat people.

resp.text: I believe there to be some confusion. Both Google and our Customer Resource Program show the call wasn't placed on Wednesday, but Thursday. Our inspector was coming today (friday). After speaking with your husband, we have agreed to cancel the appointment. Thank you for considering Henderson Roofing to Protect Your Greatest Investment!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the kind words and the opportunity to work with you!

name: Ralph Killen
text: Not recommended for repair work. Contacted them in March for a leak in roof.estimated repair was 1495.00.  Signed contract on line.I called 4 times in the next 6 weeks and was given no date when they would start. In May 2 of their workers showed up tore off some shingles and told me I needed a different type of shingle. New estimate 3250.00. The next day they outsourced it to 3 Spanish men ( they were the only good experience in this ordeal) i noticed part of new roof wasn’t sealed properly.i informed them when I payed my bill.was told someone would be out to check it out. That was may 27. I haven’t seen or heard from them since.

resp.text:
We're terribly sorry you had a bad experience!
We were really backed up on repairs at that time, due to the almost three straight weeks of rain. The best we could tell everyone was that we would get to them as soon as possible, but drying every customer in, until we could complete the repair.
We also had to wait until we could schedule two repairmen to work on your roof. When the two started work on the repair, they discovered after opening the area, more issues that couldn't haven't been identified at the original inspection. That's when Mark Henderson and Josh stepped in to review and reprice your job, which ended up being three times the size of the original area and a much higher quality material.
The day after the job was completed, we had an inspector come by to make sure the roof was completed properly and to take photographs. Everything looked completed to our standards.
As far as no one coming back out to reinspect your concerns, we deeply apologize as we did indeed drop the ball and will correct this immediately!
Thank you for your business and the opportunity to work on your roof!

text: Henderson Roofing installed a GAF Timberline Roof on our home and did an outstanding job, the roof looks fantastic and they were professional and great to work with. name: Anastacia Handley
text: We had our roof replaced last week by  Alabama Discount Roofing, LLC. The new roof installation was amazing. We are very happy with our choice to pick Birmingham Roofer as our roof replacement company. Great job.

name: AMBER TOLBERT
text: I had several roofers come out to give me a quote on a roof replacement for our house. Marc and his team were the best price, best product, and best response time. How can you beat that? Marc was very thorough in making sure I understood everything they would be doing and what the cost would cover. They were able to quickly get us on the schedule. The team worked hard all day to get our roof replacement completed in one day. When they left, they left a clean yard because they tediously cleaned up during and after the project. Overall, this was a 5-Star company to work with. I will be recommending them for any one’s future roof projects.

resp.text: Thank you very much for posting your thorough and enthusiastic review. I am very glad to know that you are so happy with our roofing installation service and thank you in advance for recommending us to your friends. Marc.

name: Knee Deep
text: If you ever need a roof in the Birmingham area don't hesitate to contact Alabama Discount Roofers! They are very professional and trustworthy.  The experience was great from the beginning of the process getting a quote through completion of the project.  Even better is that I worked with them from out of town!  I was updated daily with texts on progress and pictures.  Thanks to Marc for the quality work and a wonderful customer experience!

resp.text: Trusting a business when you're out of town can be scary, but we promise our best work -- no matter what. Your trust and confidence mean a great deal, and we thank you for choosing us. It was a pleasure working for you. If you need anything else, please don't hesitate to reach out. -Marc, Owner

We are very glad to know that you are so very happy with our work and we really appreciate you recommending us to anyone that may need our service. Thanks again for the enthusiastic five-star review. text: Marc's team did a fantastic job on my roof from start to finish. Marc is an excellent communicator, had a great price and his team had great attention to detail! name: Bill Terrell
text: Best  price, great follow through, schedule met as agreed and the roof looks fantastic.  From the opening bell the Operations Manager was on top of the process discussing the steps that would be taken and what we should expect prior, during and at the finish line.  Site clean up was important and it was treated with the proper level of attention to ensure our complete satisfaction !

name: Janna Parris
text: Not long after submitting a request for a quote, I received a call from Marc. He was very professional and got all the information before coming to my home. When he arrived, I was late, he was very professional in waiting on me and extremely courteous. He provided me with two estimates, one for what we had (3 tab laminate) and one for the HD 3d roofing. There was not a large price difference between the two, which is normally marked up with other roofers. He also presented his business license and insurance up front without me having to ask. He was extremely easy to get in contact with and answered any time I called, by name. He made this an amazing experience where I never had to wonder what would happen next. He came in $3000 less than the other two estimates we received. There was never any pressure for us to go with this company and we have a better warranty than other roofers for labor and materials. The price was exactly as quoted with no hidden fees. Everything happened as he said it would. Seamless process for an otherwise hectic problem of having to have a roof replaced. I would recommend him to absolutely anyone. Several neighbors have had new roofs put on and ours is by far the best in the neighborhood. There aren't enough words for the appreciation I have for him. I am also a homeowners insurance adjuster, which makes it even more impressive to me.

name: Faith Boone
text:
Response to the owner’s “reply”:
So your hostile response and assumption on my character are highly unwarranted and attests to your character. A review is simply that, my opinion based on my experiences. You, however sir, have turned this into something else and are taking a path that I choose not to follow. It is not that I did not want to “do the work”. I do not have to list my credentials to prove something to someone who in the grand scheme of things does not matter. I have 10 millions things going on in my life. From speaking with other people who had roof repairs, I was informed that the repair company does that part. So I based my expectations off of what many people, including people in your profession, explained to me about the process. In MY OPINION, which is what this is, I felt it could have been handled better. As stated before, you seemed disinterested from the beginning of the conversation but I chose to continue on because of the amazing reviews you received. At the end of the day, I am above this. For the record, I have contacted a company who will come out and assess the damages and give me a quote that I plan to pay for myself if that is what it comes to. Lastly, I have adjusted the ranking because clearly “stars” are more important that people. I am in no way here to damage anyone’s reputation. Some people take constructive criticism better than others. I’m sure that as successful as you are, you neither need or desire my business. I truly wish you much success in all that you do and pray you have an amazing evening.

I was highly disappointed with my experience, especially considering all of the amazing reviews. I called and left a message with a representative who said I’d receive a call back. True enough, I did; however, everything seemed rushed and the gentleman seemed disinterested from the beginning. I explained that I had some leakages that an inspector felt could have resulted from hail damage and that I was interested in getting an evaluation. I feel as if the man I spoke to felt that I had no point of reference just by some of his questions and comments. After telling him that I had another company come out weeks prior who did an inspection and said I had a valid claim, the man I was speaking with all of a sudden seemed interested in what I had to say. Further conversation revealed that my policy was transferred to a new company and that there may not be a storm that I could link the damages to under my new policy, which is understandable. From that point on, all conversation had a negative undertone and seemed as if it was a race to end the call. My biggest disappointment came in when he recommended that I personally look for a storm with a date that correlates to the damages and call him back if I find one. He said he’d do the same. Needless to say, that was 3+ weeks ago. I do not feel that it is my responsibility to find a storm. The other company did all of that for me. I did not go with them due to poor communication and failure to call back in a timely fashion (like more than a week passed when I was supposed to receive a return call within 24 hrs). I am glad everyone else had a great experience and am sad to say that mine was quite contrary.

resp.text:
This negative review is in no way reasonable or justified. I do appreciate that she acknowledged that we promptly returned her call, which we always try very hard to do, but beyond the truth in that, her complaint against us is totally unwarranted.
This person wants to file a claim against her insurance company for hail damage to her roof. She told me that she changed insurance companies at the end of last year. I explained to her that in order to start the claims process her present insurance company will want to know the date of the hail storm that damaged her roof, in order for them to confirm (or deny) coverage. I told her that I am unaware of any hail storms that occurred so far this year that would help her to start a legitimate claim against her present company. I told her that I could be mistaken, and encouraged her to do some research and maybe she will learn of a storm that I am not aware of. The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is an excellent governmental reference point for weather history.
The issue is not whether she has hail damage on her roof, but rather whether she can make a claim for the damage against her present insurance company, so it will pay for it. It appears that she can't.
Her complaint against us is clearly rooted in her notion that she didn't want to be bothered to have to put any effort into the fact-gathering element of making a claim with her insurance company. She didn't want to "… personally look for a storm with a date that correlates to the damages and call him back". This is her "biggest disappointment". She obviously feels that someone else should do everything for her. I simply explained to her that there can be no claim for hail damage against her present company without a hail storm that occurred while insured with her present company. This is a person who has shot the messenger who brings disappointing news.
We have a long list of hard earned and well deserved stellar reviews. This solitary negative review has nothing to do with our work product or our customer service. This review comes from someone who simply wants what she wants, and who got offended by the suggestion of having to put any personal effort into getting what she wants and gets mad at the person who explains to her why she can't have what she wants.

text: I couldn't have asked for a better roofer.  We were under the gun on needing a new roof before a pre-set closing date for our house and Marc really came through for us!  The workers were quick and did a great job on our new roof.  I would highly recommend them!

text: Great experience, did exaclly what they said they would do in two days time. and also repaired rotten facia wood I had around half the house. But after I paid in full for the new roof and facia repair I found an area of facia wan't repair. This didn't surprise me they missed it considering it was early February when discussed the areas of facia that needed to be repaired and because of the weather it wasn't till mid-March they started job but  I was concerned that they wouldn't put a probity on  fixing it considering I had already paid them in full..But after I brought it to their attention they came out the next day (to my surprise) and completed the job. So, in conclusion if any needs a new roof I do recommend Alabama Discount Roofing

name: Mark Hamblen
text: Quality work at a good price. Create communication every step of the way. Would definitely recommend.

name: Kelly Creel
text: My husband found this roofing company through an online promotion and from the time we got them to give us a quote to the final follow-up after the job was completed, we were very impressed with their work.  The range of shingle choices they offered us was comprehensive, and we ended up choosing an architectural shingle that made our house look like a completely different house - in a good way.  As a matter of fact, we sold our house within 24 hours of putting it on the market, and we think the brand-new roof helped our house's appeal in a big way.  After the installation, we had lots of questions for the Operations Manager, because we have been burned in the past by roofing companies who did a shoddy job and left us with problems (we are on a shady lot with lots of tree waste, and we get rough rain and windstorms on our property).  But the Operations Manager handled all of our questions with care.  After several weeks of typical summer weather including some torrential rain, we are still very pleased with the condition of our new roof and feel confident that it will serve our home and its new buyers for years to come.  Very satisfied customer here.  Thanks!!!

name: Kevin Jones
text: Through careful due diligence and selection, I decided to use Alabama Discount Roofing because their prices were the best, customer service was A+, and their Angie's List reviews were tops in roofing for my area.  I had already had two other estimates done by other roofers when Marc at Alabama Discount Roofing emailed me my roofing estimate (which he did by satellite).  Along with this estimate Marc provided me with a list of additional references that I could call and verify their good work.  I admit I was sort of inexperienced when it came to roofing; however, I can assure that all my questions were answered.  Proof of insurance was provided when I asked for it and the workers were non-stop.  My new roof was finished in a day (including cleanup).  Alabama Discount Roofing replaced all damaged decking, painted my piping to match the roof and there were no cost over the estimated amount.  **My roof looks amazing **

text: This company did a great job from the first contact to the clean-up job after the metal roof installation.....could not be happier with the entire process......$$$$$!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for making the time to post your enthusiastic review. We are extremely pleased to know that you are so happy with your new metal roof and with our service to you.

name: Tracey Nash
text: I would highly recommend Alabama Discount Roofing. Marc was very friendly and courteous to work with and the job was done in an extremely timely manner for a really moderate price.

name: Vincy Lwanga
text:
Replacing a roof is not a routine job and neither is it done frequently.  Referrals by mouth are rare and I did not have anyone I knew who had replaced their roof recently. Searching the websites was my only option. I decided to call roofers nearby or within my Zip Code.  Alabama Discount Roofing and three others were on the BBB website. I read the reviews and settled on three.  I called Alabama Discount Roofing and Marc was very nice to agree to meet with me on Sunday to accommodate my schedule. When Marc came, he was professional, respectful and did not put pressure on me to make a decision. I had prepared a list of questions to ask him but I only asked a few questions because he was very well prepared; he brought all his paper work for the licenses and insurances.  He also had prepared three different estimates: one for the 3 tab Asphalt Shingles, Architectural Shingles and the Metal roofing which he left with me and also samples of the shingles.  This gave me an idea what is available and what it will cost me. In addition, he brought with him a reference list with 17 names to contact if I had more questions. I told him that I had two other companies I wanted to meet with and then will call him back once I get their quotes. One company left their estimate on the door and I was not able to talk to them in personal but communicated by phone. The other company came in and we met but did not have all the details of paper work as Marc had prepared for me. I relied on what they told me. One had a lower price but did not tell what shingles they were going to use. Alabama Discount Roofing also gave me a five year labor and workmanship Leak Free Warranty while the other two gave me a two year Warranty. I made a choice to go with Alabama Discount Roofing and the Architectural shingles. The materials were delivered a day before and the next day, on 11/09/ 2016 before 7:00 am, the workers arrived. They were organized, worked fast and each one seemed to know what he was doing on the site. I had a few question and they answered my questions or I called Marc and he explained.  Since I was at work, Marc made sure he sent photos of the progress and at the end he sent me more pictures of the completed job. Marc did not ask me to pay up front and this made me more comfortable. The cleaning was amazing. I have not found any nails or debris left behind. It seems like they were never here. At the end of day, I met with Marc and he made sure I had no further questions or concerns. Would I recommend this company to any one? Absolutely yes, this is a professional company with a personal touch. Excellent customer service and my estimates and the actual cost were not far apart.
VL

text: I had active leaks from storm damage that went unnoticed until water began running into my home. I needed help taking the right steps to quickly stop the damage that was occurring and I did not know who to ask.  I happened to mention my plight to an ICS employee who had dropped by the business where I work, and the ICS team literally did the rest. My project manager, David Prejeant, contacted me,  took the time, and made every effort to baby step me through the proceedures with little worry on my part.  Once the day was set, their install team efficiently and professionally installed our new roof. Once the job was complete, the install team left very little evidence that anyone had been on my roof and my property other than the roof was obviously new and the leaks had stopped.  Then,  the thing that was the ultimate reward for having done business with them, ICS sent an inspector back out after completion to insure the work met their high standards of quality. name: Vasquez Family
text: Billy Crews was very professional.  Kept all appts, arrived on time, took every call, answered every question..... no complaints.  Having gone through a storm for the first time in AL, and not being a native from here, I wasn't too sure what to expect or how it worked; he was awesome at walking us through the process and whatever came next.  Just the fact he took my every call and responded to every text - that was awesome and made me feel great about my choice in working with him.  He kept us up to date on our project and MY FAVORITE PART was that he got us back in our house on the date he had estimated.  That alone was a blessing.  I definitely recommend Billy and his team @ Cardinal.

resp.text: We’re so glad to hear you had such a great experience!  We completely agree...Billy is one of the best.  We’re lucky to have him!  Thanks again for trusting us with your home!

name: Alan Watson
text: Mr. Billy Crews was a great help to me. He was able to make it to my house the same day that I called and requested an inspection. We had a leak in the older section of our home. He knocked out the inspection and even repaired the leak while he was there. We will be doing business again.

resp.text: Great to hear, Mr. Watson!  I'm glad Billy was able to help, and please let us know if we can be of any further assistance.

name: Mike Coop
text:
From start to finish the entire roof replacement experience was seamless. Anthony Gioiosa did the initial inspection and recommended the roof be inspected by my insurance for possible hail damage and he was correct. He helped me process the claim and in a little over a month my roof was replaced. The roofers came and finished in one day. Amazing! Great Gob Cardinal Roofing. Will recommend to everyone who needs a roof replacement in the future.

I wanted to add to my first review, because I needed to add to how great my experience has been with Cardinal Roofing. I have had two roofs replaced now with Cardinal Roofing. Both were done with the same crew but a few months apart. The second roof was my personal house. The crew came early and worked hard all day long through hot temperatures, muggy conditions, and rain off and on. With only one small break in the middle for lunch the crew worked until they could see no more, then came the next day and finished the job up. The roof looks amazing. The crew worked with precision and accuracy that I have not seen before. I have had roof work done in the past to some of my rentals and the experience was not good. This time was different. From beginning to end I was treated with respect and valued as if they were replacing someone in their own family’s roof. Anthony Gioiosa, who is a representative for Cardinal Roofing, saw the job through from beginning to end, handled all of my concerns with professionalism and grace that has exceeded all of my expectations. I will be using Cardinal Roofing for all of my future roofing needs and will be recommending them in the future to everyone who needs roofing help. Great job Cardinal Roofing! I appreciate all of your exceptional work and dedication to excellence. God Bless.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike! Let us know if we can help in the future!

name: Roger Bournival
text: I decided to use Cardinal Roofing after 2 of my neighbors had their roof replaced by them, and I never regretted my decision.  Greg Cunningham was assigned as my contact person, and he was great.  Never had a problem reaching him with questions.  Never missed an appointment.  Easy person to deal with.  I would recommend Cardinal Roofing, and hopefully you'll get Greg as your contact person.

resp.text: We're glad you had a great experience, and we will be sure to pass along your kind words to Greg.  Thanks for sharing!

name: Jamie White
text: Our salesman Ernie Jonseof, delivered on every promise he made. There were 7 guys that started on my roof and had the job completed in a day and a half. They did a terrific job cleaning up after themselves. There was a quality control manager that came by the following day to pick up any unused materials and make sure the work was done properly. I would recommend Cardinal Roofing to anyone that needs a roof.

name: Madelyn Vera
text:
Richard was great to work with! He kept me up to date in everything that was happening and helped me understand the insurance process which awesome.

We had our roof done in one day and had 3 sweeps for nails/debris.

Definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing!  I’m glad we could help, and please let us know if we can do anything more to help.

name: Charles Batchelor
text: Upon discover on a couple of leaks I called Cardinal roofing for repairs. I filed against my insurance company and cardinal roofing suggestion was to replace my roof. My insurance company agreed to pay for it and work started promptly and was completed quickly. After a few storms I noticed a leak in the same spot I originally filed for. Upon further inspection by Cardinal roofing it was discovered that roof in that spot was not replaced and was told it was in bad shape.  Now every storm I have to put towels down on my hardwood floors as no action has been taken since . I will change review if it gets fixed but as of now my hardwood floors are getting more water damage and drywall eventually will fall off ceiling.

name: Blondell Floryance
text: It was a great experience from beginning to end. Anthony was my point of contact and went over everything with me to include advising me on the different materials, going over the contract, and letting  me know what to expect during the installation process. The installers did a great job and made sure the area was cleaned up. After the installation was complete Anthony came back and made sure I was satisfied with the job. I would recommend this company to anyone looking for any type of roof repair or replacement.

resp.text: Blondell, thank you so much for this kind review. We are so thankful you chose and trusted us with your roof! Anthony is a great one! Please let us know if we can do anything for you in the future!

name: kathy carr
text: Allstate insurance denied my claims for a total roof replacement for 3 years. Tgey wanted only to replace a few shingles Calling Mark Wesson was the best decision ever! Mark and Cardinal Roofing took care of Allstate. I have a total roof replacement.

name: Andy Gagliano
text:
Cardinal Roofing has done a couple of repairs on my roof for me over the past several years. I found their prices to be very reasonable and their service times surprisingly quick.
I've been so impressed with them that I have referred them to friends, family, and clients, and they all reported to me that they had the same experience I did.
I highly recommend Cardinal Roofing.

resp.text: Andy, thank you so much for your kind review, for using us, and for referring us! We are so thankful that you put your trust in us to repair your roof. Let us know if we can do anything for you in the future!

name: Richard Tolbert
text: I would HIGHLY recommend Cardinal Roofing!! Worked with Devin Roberts from Cardinal Roofing on our roof inspection in Dothan, AL. We need our entire roof replaced on our home, and have severe damage on our carport roof with rain pouring through. Devin came out and inspected our roof, then covered all our options with us. We are saving up now to be able to pay our our deductible. When we're ready, we will definitely be calling Cardinal Roofing to do the work!

resp.text: Thanks, Richard.  We’re lucky to have Devin on our team!

name: Alishia Potter
text: Cardinal Roofing just replaced our roof after storm damage caused a leak and they did an excellent job! We spoke with Anthony and David initially and then David took over finishing out our contract. The whole transaction has been seamless! They work on the roof was done phenomenally well. The workers were efficient and skilled, tearing off the old roof and installing the new architectural shingles only took their team one work day to complete! The company exuded professionalism from beginning to end and even though we won’t need a new roof anytime soon, we’ll happily continue to recommend them to anyone who asks.

resp.text: Alishia, thank you for choosing and trusting Cardinal Roofing. We hate your home suffered from some storm damage, but we're glad we were there to be able to help fix the problems. Thank you for this kind review and for referring us to others! We appreciate it!

That's been a week ago.
Save yourself the headache and dont use this company.

text: The team at Cardinal Roofing is incredible. They are very professional, honest, committed, and use the best materials to protect your home. name: Sadie Goodman
text: I am so glad that I picked up the phone to call Cardinal Roofing to take a look at a roof leak I had adjacent to some skylights in my dining room. Jason Smith was always more than punctual, helpful with every step of the process, and laid out every minute detail for us as this was a roof for a multi-level 4,500 sq. ft. house. If it had not been for Jason Smith, we might not have our brand new roof in the fast amount of time it came together. He noticed extremely significant hail damage to my roof that likely meant replacing the entire roof. I was surprised that a roof on this size of a house could be completely torn off, plywood repaired or replaced, with all new shingles, flashing and vents put on in one single day, but that is what happened. A week later we were visited by inspector Mac, who answered questions I had concerning 2 spots on the roof where I saw some materials I had questions about. He got on the roof, took pictures, and came down to explain theses to me, and I was totally satisfied. It can be scary as a homeowner to take on such a massive and costly project, move the family and animals out of the house for a couple of days, and hope you've chosen the right company for the job. After my first meeting with Jason Smith I had no doubt that I could cancel all other roofing contractors I had called for appointments and go with Cardinal Roofing, due to his extreme efficiency, professionalism, and thorough knowledge of all aspects of the roof repair. From consulting with insurance (which he has immense amount of experience doing) to the step-by-step process of the installation, even down to telling me how and when to have my TV satellite dish reinstalled (and not on our beautiful new roof due to leaks/damage the bolts could cause), Jason brought us all information we never even knew we would need to know about a roof installation. Our satellite dish now lives happily installed in our yard on the ground. There was an army of persons installing our roof in 90 degree heat, and they worked very efficiently and very hard. Within 2 days after the roof was on and complete, someone had swept my entire property with large magnets to gather up roofing nails and other debris scattered about from the install. I did a thorough look over my driveway when I returned to make sure no nails were left that could cause my car to get a flat tire. They had gotten every single one. Within a week after the roof was completed all materials - extra tarp, shingle boxes, plywood, etc., were removed from my property by Cardinal Roofing. I cannot express enough that Jason Smith and those at Cardinal Roofing were professional, punctual, and always available to answer any question I had, via phone call or text message. Jason Smith is invaluable to the company. We are so grateful to give our house a much-needed update, better living for our family, more equity, a facelift due to a change of color from a dated orange roof, and most importantly, zero leaks. I am forever grateful to Jason and Cardinal Roofing and would highly, HIGHLY recommend them to anyone and everyone whoever asks me about a roofing job on any scale. Also, Jason never asked me himself, but I contacted him and insisted that he put a Cardinal Roofing sign in my yard when they were completed, so that others in the neighborhood knew who did this beautiful and very fast, excellent quality job on such a large house.

name: Kevin Webb
text:
Awful company.   The actual work contracted, putting on the roof, I guess we'll see in the years to come but the behavior and ethics of this company are known and it is not a good story.  Originally they did not think the Insurance company was going to fully pay out the policy so they gave me a cash quote and fully expected to leave that in place after the insurance company decided to pay fully (after repeated harassing by me).    Mary Margaret spoke of it while standing in my front yard as the third inspection took place.   That even if they did decide to pay out fully that the original quote was valid and that we were "technically" committing fraud.  She had no issues with it, even mentioning that I would make out nicely.   I admit I was ignorant and perhaps complicit about learning the subtleties of the arrangement.   I got scared when I fully realized what was at stake and full disclosure was weighing my options at that point.  I had decided that 1500 bucks or whatever it was going to be was not worth the penalties and possible ramifications.  Cardinal needed to send in a completion certificate.  After avoiding my calls for two days Mary finally answered the phone.  I needed to know what they needed to send in the certificate and what was the final total given the insurance company estimate.  Mary encouraged me to call them and defraud them by telling them I could not wait for the certificate.   I immediately sent in the full amount to Cardinal as I knew at that moment Cardinal was without ethics and could not be trusted.  CYA was in full effect.    Then to put the cherry on top, they did send in the certificate but now my insurance company notified me that the full amount, or what I thought it was, was not correct.  That I had overpaid Cardinal.  My insurance company told me that, not Cardinal and they had no intention of telling me.  So I called them and let them know that I needed my refund immediately.  The owner, Jody, feigned ignorance and defiantly "objected" to my insinuation of impropriety.    The problem folks?   I have every text, every document and most importantly every phone call documented and recorded.  I have the audio.   This is not a question of right and wrong.  Cardinal was going to defraud my insurance company and complicit or not initially, I was not.  I was however not going to allow them to defraud me.  I would stay very far away from these people.  If you see them chasing ambulances in your neighborhood understand these people are not ethical nor honest.

Jody, I have the audio.  Feel free to ring me up and give me your email address.  I'll be happy to send you copies.

If you read this far and are confused at all the other positive reviews notice one thing.  They haven't responded to this review to refute it and I never heard another peep from them when they realized I had the proof.

Finally, look at the review profiles of the reviewers on here.  Lots of them Cardinal is their only review.  Doesn't take a genius to understand why.

Had to let them in to hook up the new electric exhaust fan when they came to get the final payment but that was easy.  I recommend them.  Quality work, quality product.  5 year labor warranty as well as a 30 year shingle.  Can't go wrong with that!

First roof replacement for me and cannot fathom a better firm to work with.  From their field rep, to their work crews, to the owner.  First-rate service and satisfaction.

His team was dependable and professional and we are very pleased with their quality of workmanship. Each and every day, Steve’s team arrived when we expected them and thoroughly cleaned up all areas before leaving. We met with many roofers and contractors, as well as, reviewed many bids before deciding on Bill White Roofing & Specialty Co. They reasonably priced our project and they came highly recommended.

name: James Harris
text: Great service and fair price for repairs to my storm damaged roof.  Really top notch folks!

name: John Garwick
text:
Good people
Easy to work with as far as explaining priorities of necessary repairs
Very good pricing
My wife loved that they cleaned up so well she was not sure they had been there yet.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!  We appreciate your business and are glad we could help!

name: Frank Watkins
text: Fantastic employees and they did a wonderful job

resp.text: Thank you Mr. and Mrs Watkins

name: Robert E
text: We selected Bill White Roofing (Steve White) to put a new roof on our home and replace the rotten boards, which included some facia, soffit, cornice, trim and sheathing boards.   Steve also corrected a water trap area.   Finally, we elected to replace the gutters and install ridgeline/soffit vents to our older home.  On Steve Whites initial visit, he listened to our concerns and needs and did a thorough roof inspection.  He came off the roof and laid out what and how his team would complete the work, which also included the quality of materials they use beyond just the shingles/paper itself.   All the work was done by Steve and his crew.  We were most pleased and recommend you give Bill White Roofing (Steve White) a call if you have roof issues.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Robert.  We greatly appreciate your business!

name: Ethan Difatta
text: Great work.  Professional.  Did the job right.  Cleaned up the yard afterwards.

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your business!
